Isimo sezulu esibi kumane kuyigama elilula elisho isimo sezulu esiyingozi esinamandla okudala umonakalo, ukuphazamiseka kwangempela kwenhlalakahle, noma ukufa kwabantu.
Isimo sezulu esibi kakhulu singenzeka noma kuphi emhlabeni, futhi kunezinhlobo ezihlukile zaso, ezingaxhomeka ekumeni kwezwe, esimweni sendawo, kanye nezimo emkhathini.

Imimoya ephakeme, isangqotho, isimo sezulu esidlulele, kanye nemililo yasendle ziwuhlobo nomphumela wesimo sezulu esibi kakhulu, kanjalo neziphepho, izivunguvungu, izishomo zamanzi amuncwa yisivunguvungu, kanye nezihlwithi.
Izimo zezulu ezimbi zasendaweni nezenkathi ethile zihlanganisa iziphepho ezinkulu zeqhwa, izivunguvungu zeqhwa, isichotho, kanye nezivunguvungu ezinothuli.
Izihambi ziyalulekwa ngokuqinile ukuthi ziqaphele noma iyiphi ingozi yesimo sezulu esibi kakhulu esithinta indawo yazo njengoba singathinta noma yiziphi izinhlelo zohambo.
Imozulu embi ligama nje eliqukayo layo nayiphi inkcazo yemozulu enamandla okwenza umonakalo, uphazamiseko olukhulu, nokuphulukana nobomi kubantu.
Imozulu embi ingenzeka naphina ehlabathini, kwaye izindidi ngedindi, ezixhomekeke kubume, kwi-topography nakwimeko zezulu zayo.
Imimoya emikhulu, isichotho, ukunetha kakhulu, kunye nemililo yamadlelo ziintlobo kunye nemiphumo yemozulu emandundu, njengoko kunjalo ngeendudumo, iinkanyamba kunye nezitshingitshane.
Imozulu yengingqi neyenzeka ngamaxesha athile onyaka iquka uqhwithela olunekhephu, isaqhwithi esihamba nekhephu, isaqhwithi esihamba nomkhence kunye nesaqhwithi esihamba nesanti.
Abakhenkethi bayacetyiswa ukuba baziqaphele ingozi zemozulu embi echaphazela indawo zabo nanjengoko zinokuchaphazela izicwangciso zokuhamba.
Imozulu embi nje elula ilizwi kuba ezinobungozi ukutshintsha kwemozulu ukuba sele kwezo meko ukubangela umonakalo, i-real loluntu isiphithiphithi, okanye ukufa humans.
I-eyona imbi imozulu ingaba kwenzeka naphi na Emhlabeni, kwaye kukho iifomu ezahlukeneyo kulo, apho unako kuxhomekeka Ucingo, Ucingo, kwaye atmospheric iimeko.

Phezulu nemimoya, elifanelekileyo nemimoya, extreme imozulu, kwaye wildfires kukho uhlobo kwaye ukusebenza ka-buhlungu imozulu, njengoko ingaba hurricanes, typhoons, whistles amanzi umlimi ngamnye abe nekopi yi-isichotho, kwaye cowars.
Ezoyikekayo lwengingqi kwaye ngamaxesha athile iimeko zemozulu ziquka nzima snowstorms, snowstorms, hailstorms, kwaye nxenye zisebenza eluthulini storms.
Travelers ingaba ndivuma kakhulu advised aqonde nayiphi na ingozi extreme imozulu ukuba ichaphazela zabo indawo njengoko oko unako kuchaphazela na ukuhamba izicwangciso.
Isimo sezulu esibi lilizwi elilula elithetha imozulu enobungozi enokubangela ukuphazamiseka, ukuphazamiseka okwenyani, okanye ukufa.
Isimo sezulu esibi kakhulu sinokubakho naphi na emhlabeni, kwaye kukho iintlobo ezahlukeneyo zaso, ngokuxhomekeke kwijografi, ijografi, kunye neatmosfera.

Umoya omkhulu, ubushushu obugqithisileyo, imozulu eyoyikisayo, kunye nemililo yasendle ziluhlobo nefuthe lemozulu eyoyikisayo, kunye neenkanyamba, iinkanyamba, izikhukula ezinamandla kunye neenkanyamba.
Iimeko zemozulu nezasekhaya ezibi zibandakanya izaqhwithi ezinzima, iiqhwa, isichotho, kunye neenkqwithela ezinothuli.
Abahambi bacetyiswa ngamandla ukuba bazi naziphi na iingozi zemozulu ezigwenxa ezichaphazela indawo yabo njengoko zinokuchaphazela naziphi na izicwangciso zohambo.
Imozulu embi inegama elilula elithetha imozulu enobungozi obunamandla ukudala umonakalo, ukuphazamiseka kwentlalo, okanye ukufa kwabantu.
Imozulu embi inokwenzeka naphi na ehlabathini, kwaye kukho iintlobo ezahlukileyo zayo, ezingaxhomekeka kwimeko yelizwe, kwimeko yomhlaba kunye neemeko esibhakabhakeni.

Imimoya ephakamileyo, isonka, imozulu egqithileyo, kunye nezililo zasendle zolwalamano kunye nomphumo wemozulu embi kakhulu, ngokunjalo neziphepho, iziqwenga, iziqwenga zamanzi ezixutywa yiqhwithi, kunye nezihlwithi.
Iimeko zezulu ezimbi zasekhaya kunye nexesha elithile ziquka iziqhamo ezinkulu zomkhenkce, iziqwenga zomkhenkce, isichotho kunye nezivunguvungu ezinothuli.
Abahambi bayacetyiswa ngokungqongqo ukuba baqaphele nayiphi na ingozi yemozulu embi echaphazela indawo yabo njengoko sinokuchaphazela naziphi na izicwangciso zohambo.
Imozulu embi igama elilula elithetha imozulu enobungozi enokubangela ukuphazamiseka, ukuphazamiseka okwenyani, okanye ukufa.
Imozulu embi ingenzeka naphi na ehlabathini, kwaye kukho iintlobo ezahlukeneyo zayo, ezingaxhomeka ekumeni kwehlabathi, kwimeko yendawo, kunye neemeko emkhathini.

Imimoya ephakamileyo, isangqotho, imozulu esidlweni, kunye nemililo yasendle zizinto kunye nemiphumo yemozulu embi kakhulu, ngokunjalo neziphepho, izivunguvungu, izishomo zamanzi amuncwa isivunguvungungu, kunye nezihluthi.
Iimo zezulu ezimbi zasendaweni ngexesha elithile ziquka iziphepho ezinkulu ikhephu, izivunguvungu ikhephu, isichotho, kunye nezaqhwithi ezinothuli.
Abahambi bacetyiswa ngamandla ukuba baqaphele nayiphi na ingozi yemozulu embi enokuchaphazela indawo yabo njengoko sinokuchaphazela naziphi na iinkqubo zohambo.
Isimo sezulu esibi kunye negama elilula elithetha isimo sezulu esiyingozi esinamandla okudala umonakalo, ukuphazamiseka kwangempela kwentlalo, okanye ukufa kwabantu.
Imeko yemozulu embi inokwenzeka naphi na emhlabeni, kwaye kukho iintlobo ezahlukeneyo zaso, ezinokuxhomeka ekumeni kwehlabathi, kwimeko yendawo, kunye neemeko ngamaxesha.

Imimoya ephakamileyo, isangqotho, imozulu egqithileyo, kunye nemililo yasendle ihlobo kunye nefuthe lemozulu embi kakhulu, kanjalo neziphefumlo, izivunguvungu, izishomo zamanzi afunxwa ngumvunguvungu, kunye nezihlwithi.
Iimeko ezibi zasendaweni kunye nexesha elithile ziquka iiphepho ezinkulu zekhephu, ikhephu, isichotho, kunye nezivunguvungu ezinothuli.
Iindwendwe ziyacetyiswa ngokuqinileyo ukuba ziqaphele nayiphi na ingozi yemozulu embi esichaphazela indawo yazo njengoko sinokuchaphazela naziphi na iinkqubo zohambo.
Ngokukhuluma nje, ukuziphatha okubili kungahlangana njengoba abaphathi beqala ukuhola amawembu ababesebenzisana nabo.. Omunye uzama ukuba “ingxenye yabafana” (noma amantombazane).

Lolu hlobo lwemenenja luba nobunzima uma kufunanele lwenze izinqumo ezingathandeki, ukuqondisa izigwegwe zabasebenzi, ukuhlolwa kokusebenza, ukwabiwa komsebenzi, nokwenza abantu baziphendulele ngokwemisebenzi yabo.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, umuntu uyaguquka abe ngumuntu ongasabonakali ukuthi ungubani ozizwa sengathi kumelwe ashintshe konke obekwenziwa iqembu futhi akwenze okwakhe.
Ngemva kwakho konke, abaholi ibona abonomthwalo wangempela wemfanelo wokuphumelela nokuhluleka kweqembu.
Le ndlela yokuziphatha ezikhathini eziningi libangela ukwahlukana phakathi kwabaholi nethimba lonke.
Ngokubanzi, iindlela ezimbini zokuziphatha zinokuvela njengabaphathi baqala ukukhokela oontanga babo bangaphambili.esinye isiphelo somboniso uzama ukuhlala "omnye wabafana" (okanye iigals).
Olu hlobo lomphathi lunobunzima ekuthatheni izigqibo ezingathandwayo, ukwenza amanyathelo oluleko, ukuvavanya intsebenzo, ukwabela uxanduva, nokwenza abantu baphendule.
Kwelinye icala, umntu utshintsha abengumntu ongamaziyo ocinga ukuba kufuneka atshintshe yonke into ebikade isenziwa liqela aze ayenze eyakhe.
Kuko konke, inkokheli isoloko inoxanduva lokuphumelela okanye ukungaphumeleli kweqela layo.
Lomkhwa uthanda ukuba nemiphumela edala umsantsa Phakathi kweenkokheli neqela liphela.
Ngo ngokulula ukuthetha, u-qhuba unako zidibane njengoko administrators begin ukukhokela izipani baya cooperated kunye.. Omnye ezama ukuba abe "inxalenye boys" (okanye girls).
Olu hlobo umphathi sele iingxaki xa bathe ukwenza undesirable izigqibo, basebenze omkhosi, umsebenzi ukuhlolwa kokusebenza, umsebenzi unikezelo, kwaye ukuthembeka, ukwenza izinto elubala.
Kwesinye isandla, umntu eguquliweyo i kwi-i-engabonakaliyo umntu owenza uziva ngathi usasebenzisa ukuba umele utshintshe zonke ukuba iqela sele kwenziwe kwaye ingaba abakhe.
Emva zonke, iinkokeli bona abo bathe lokwenyani uxanduva kuba impumelelo kwaye ukungaphumeleli leqela.
Oku ukuziphatha rhoqo kukhokelela izahlulo phakathi iinkokeli kwaye lonke iqela.
Ngamanye amagama, ezi ndlela zimbini zokuziphatha zinokuhlangana xa abaphathi beqala ukukhokela abo badlala nabo.Omnye uzama ukuba “yinxalenye yamakhwenkwe” (okanye amantombazana).
Olu hlobo lomphathi kunzima xa kusenziwa izigqibo ezingalunganga, ukuqeqesha abasebenzi, ukuvavanya intsebenzo, ukwabiwa kwemisebenzi, kunye nokwenza abantu baphendule ngoxanduva lwabo.
Kwelinye icala, umntu uyatshintsha kwaye abe ngumntu othanda ukunyanzeliswa oziva ukuba kufuneka atshintshe yonke into eyenziwe liqela kwaye ayenze eyabo.
Emva kwayo yonke loo nto, iinkokeli zezona zixanduva lokuphumelela nokusilela kweqela.
Oku kuziphatha kuhlala kukhokelela kuyantlukwano phakathi kweenkokeli kunye neqela liphela.
Ngokuthetha nje, izinto zokuziphatha zinokudibana njengoko abaphathi baqala ukufumana amaqela abaye basebenzisana nabo.. Omnye uzama ukuba “inxalenye yabafana” (okanye amantombazana).

Olu hlobo lwemenenja luba nobunzima xa kufuneka lwenze izigqibo ezingathandekiyo, ukuqondisa amagwegwe abasebenzi, uvavanyo lokusebenza, ukwabiwa komsebenzi kunye nokwenza abantu baziphendulele ngokwemisebenzi yabo.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, umntu uyaguquka abe ngumntu ongasabonakaliyo ukuba ungubani oziva ngathi kufuneka atshintshe yonke into eyenziwe liqela kwaye ayenze okwakhe.
Emveni kwakho konke, iinkokeli zibonile uxanduva lokwenene lokuphumelela nokungaphumeleli kweqela.
Le ndlela yokuziphatha kumaxesha amaninzi ibangela ukwahlukana phakathi kweenkokheli kunye neqela lonke.
Ukuthetha nje, ukuziphatha ezimbini kunokuhlangana njengoko abaphathi baqala ukuhola amaqela abasebenza nabo. Omnye uzama ukuba "inxalenye yabafana" (okanye amantombazana).

Olu hlobo lomphathi kunzima xa kwanele ukwenza izigqibo ezingathandekiyo, ukukhokela goso zabasebenzi, uvavanyo lokusebenza, ukwabiwa komsebenzi, kunye nokwenza abantu baya kusabela ngokwemisebenzi yabo.
Ngenxa yoko, umntu uyatshintsha ukuba abe ngumntu ongabonakali ukuba ungubani oziva ukuba kufuneka atshintshe yonke into eyenziwa liqela kwaye ayenze eyabo.
Emva kwakho konke, iinkokeli zezona zixanduva lwempumelelo kunye nokusilela kweqela.
Le ndlela yokuziphatha ngamaxesha amaninzi ibangela ukwahlukana phakathi kwabaholi kunye neqela lonke.
Ngokuthetha nje, ukuziphatha ezimbini kunokudibana njengoko abaphathi baqalisa ukukhokela iimbumbumbu ababesebenzisana nabo.. Omnye uzama ukuba “inxalenye yabafana” (okanye amantombazana).

Olu hlobo lomphathi lunokuba nobunzima xa lufuna ngokwaneleyo ukwenza izigqibo ezingathandekiyo, ukuqondisa amagwegwe wabasebenzi, uvavanyo lomsebenzi, ukwabiwa komsebenzi, nokwenza abantu baziphendulele ngokwemisebenzi yabo.
Kwelinye icala, umntu uyaguquka abe ngumntu ongasabonakali ukuba ungubani na ovakalelwa ngathi kufuneka atshintshe yonke into eyayisenziwa kwiqela kwaye yenzeke kuyo.
Emva kwakho konke, iinkokeli zibona abo banoxanduva lokwenene lokuphumelela nokungaphumeleli kweqela.
Le ndlela yokuziphatha ngamaxesha amaninzi ibangela ukwahlukana phakathi kweenkokheli kunye neqela lonke.
Singaqala ukuphila singoni indawo esizungezile, singajoyina imikhankaso wendawo esizungezile, futhi singaba nangabalweli ukuze sinciphise ukuhlupheka kwesikhathi esizayo ngezinga elithile.
Kufana nekhambi nje lokwelapha izimpawu zokugula ezimweni eziningi. Nokho, uma singafuni isisombululo sesikhashana, kumelwe sithole umsuka wenkinga bese sinqanda wona.

Kusobala ngokwanele ukuthi umhlaba ushintshe kakhulu ngenxa yokuthuthuka kwabantu kwezesayensi nezobuchwepheshe, futhi izinkinga zibe zinkulu ngenxa yokugcwala kwabantu kanye nempilo yesintu yokuhlaphaza.
Singaqala ukuhlala sinobuhlobo ngakumbi nendalo esingqongileyo, sinokujoyina umbutho wendalo esingqongileyo, kwaye sinokuba ngamatsha ntliziyo ukunciphisa ukubandezeleka okuzayo kwinqanaba elithile.
Lena ifana nje nokunyanga imikhwa kumaxa amaninzi. Kodwa ke , ukuba asifuni sisombululo sexeshana, kumele sikhangele oonobangela, ukuze siyekise bona.

Kuyacaca ukuba umhlaba utshintshe kakhulu ngenxa yenkqubela phambili kwezenzululwazi nakwezobuchwepheshe, kwaye iingxaki ziye zaba nkulu ngenxa yobuninzi babantu kunye nendlela yokuphila duru kwabantu.
Sinako ukuqala ubomi ngaphandle sinning ngokuchasene-bume yethu, singakwazi ukungena yokusingqongileyo campaigns, kwaye singakwazi kanjalo azame ukunciphisa elizayo esiva ukuba iqondo.

Kubalulekile nje njenge amkele impiliso kuba imiqondiso ye ukugula ngeendlela ezininzi amatyala. Ukuba asikholwa ufuna sexeshana isisombululo, nangona kunjalo, kufuneka sibe nokufumana ingcambu ka-ingxaki kwaye yeka ke.

Kucacile ngokwaneleyo ukuba ihlabathi itshintshile lotshintsho ngenxa advancement of humans kwi-science and technology, kwaye iingxaki zisuke ezinzima ngenxa bonke pervasion kwaye uluntu ke abusive lezempilo.
Singaqala ukuhlala ngaphandle kokulimaza indalo, sinokujoyina imikhankaso yendawo, kwaye sinokuba nabameli bokunciphisa ukubandezeleka okuzayo kwinqanaba elithile.
Kufana nonyango-zonke iimpawu zokugula. Nangona kunjalo, ukuba asisifuni isisombululo sethutyana, kufuneka sifumane oyena nobangela wengxaki kwaye siyinqande.
Kucace gca ukuba umhlaba utshintshe kakhulu ngenxa yenkqubela phambili kwezenzululwazi nezobuchwepheshe, kwaye iingxaki ziye zaba nkulu ngenxa yokuxinana kunye nobomi babantu oboyikekayo.
Singaqalisa ubomi singoni ndawo singqongileyo, singajoyina iiprojekthi ezingqongileyo, kwaye singabakhweli ukuze sinciphise ukubandezeleka kwexesha elizayo kwizinga elithile.
Kufana nesisombululo sokunyanga iimpawu zokugula kwiimeko ezininzi. Nangona kunjalo, ukuba awufuni isisombululo sesikhashana, kufuneka sifumane imvelaphi yengxaki kwaye sinqanda.
Kucacile ngokwaneleyo ukuba ihlabathi litshintshe kakhulu ngenxa yophuhliso lwabantu kwezesayensi kunye nezobugcisa, kwaye iingxaki zibe zinkulu ngenxa yokuzaliswa kwabantu kunye nempilo yobugcisa.

Ufana nonyango-zonke iimpawu zokugula. Nangona kunjalo, ukuba singafuni isisombululo sesikhashana, kufuneka sifumane imvelaphi yengxaki kwaye siyinqande.

Sinako ukuqala ubomi singoni indawo ejikelezileyo, singajoyina imikhankaso yasekuhlaleni ejikelezileyo, kwaye singaba nangabalweli ukunciphisa intlungu kwixesha elizayo kwinqanaba elithile.
Kufana nesisombululo nje lokwelapha iimpawu zokugula kwiimeko ezininzi. Noko ke, ukuba singafuni isisombululo esifutshane, kufuneka sifumane imvelaphi yengxaki kwaye sinqanda.
Kucacile ngokwaneleyo ukuba umhlaba utshintshe kakhulu ngenxa yophuhliso lwenzululwazi kunye nezobugcisa, kwaye iingxaki zinkulu ngenxa yokugcwala kwabantu kunye nempilo yesintu.
Njalo ekuseni, abantu bashiya amadolobha amancane wasemaphandleni ngezimoto ukuze baye ezindaweni zabo zokusebenzela futhi badlulwa abanye indawo yabo yokusebenzela elapho basanda kusuka khona.
Kuloluhlobo lwesithuthi olunamandla wonke umuntu ngandlelathile uxhumene, futhi usekela uhlelo lokuthutha olusekelwe ezimotweni ezincane.

Isayensi manje ikhomba ukuthi lokhu kubakhona kwe-carbon kucekele phansi imvelo kusuka kwesinye sezimo sayo esizinzile kakhulu esisekele ukuziphendukela kwemvelo kwabantu eminyakeni eyizigidi ezimbili edlule.
INtsasa nganye, abantu bashiya iidolophana zelizwe ezimotweni besiya kwiindawo zabo zokusebenza kwaye badlulwe kwabanye abadawo abasebenza kuyo yindawo abasandula ukuyishiya.
Kule shuttle yothutho eguqukayo wonke umntu ngandlela thile uqhagamshelene, kunye nenkxaso, inkqubo yothutho esekwe kwiimoto zabucala.
Isayensi ngoku ibonakalisa ukuba icarbon economy ithe ya dilodja kwi biosphere ukusuka kwenye yemo zayo ezizinzileyo ebexhasa ukuguquguquka koluntu kwiminyaka ezizigidi ezibini ezedlulayo.
Qho kusasa, abantu drove ukusuka amancinane kwiindawo zasemaphandleni ezinemigodi yabo izithuba zokusebenza kwaye ingaba surpassed ngabanye babo izithuba zokusebenza ukusuka apho kutshanje.
Kule anamandla ifomu lezothutho wonke umntu ufumana iingcaphephe idibene, kwaye lowo ixhasa inkqubo yezothutho ngokusekelwe ezincinane izithuthi.
Science ngoku amanqaku intshabalalo-carbon ukusuka kwesinye zayo ezininzi iityuwadefault colour yokusingqongileyo iimeko ukuxhasa oluntu evolution ezinye ezimbini yezigidi kwiminyaka eyadlulayo.
Ntsasa nganye, abantu bashiya iidolophana ezisemaphandleni ngemoto ukuya kwiindawo abasebenza kuzo kwaye bayafikelwa ngabanye kwindawo abasebenza kuyo apho besandula ukushiya khona.
Kule moto inamandla wonke umntu uqhagamshele ngandlela thile, kwaye uxhasa inkqubo yothutho esekwe kwiimoto ezincinci.
Inzululwazi ngoku ichaza ukuba ubukho bekhabhoni bonakalise okusingqongileyo kwenye yeendlela zayo ezizinzileyo ezixhase indaleko kule minyaka mibini izizigidi idlulileyo.
kusasa, abantu bashiya iidolophu ezincinci zasemaphandleni ngomatshini ukuze baye kwiindawo zabo zokusebenzela kwaye badlulwa abanye indawo yabo yokusebenza apho basandula ukusuka khona.
Kuloluhlobo lwesithuthi olunamandla wonke umntu ngandlel uqhagamshelane, kwaye uxhasa isicwangciso sokuhamba esekelwe kwiinqwelo ezincinci.
Ngoku inzululwazi ibonisa ukuba oku kubakho kwe-carbon kucwangcise ukusuka kwenye yeemeko zayo ezizinzileyo ezixhasa ukuziphendukela kwendalo yabantu kwiminyaka yezigidi ezimbini ezidlulileyo.
Nangona kunjalo, abantu bashiya iidolophana ezisemaphandleni ngemoto ukuya kwiindawo zabo zokusebenzela kwaye badlulwa abanye indawo yabo yokusebenzela apho basanda khona.
Kuluhlobo lwesithuthi olunamandla wonke umntu uqhagamshele athile, kwaye usekela inkqubo yokuthutha esekwe kwiimoto ezincinci.
Science ngoku ibonisa ukuba le carbon ekhoyo phantsi bume ukusuka kwesinye iimeko zayo uzinzile kakhulu inkxaso ukuziphendulela kwemvelo kwabantu kwiminyaka izigidi ezimbini ezidlulileyo.
Ngentsasa nganye, abantu bashiya iidolophu ezincinci zasemaphandleni kwiimoto ukuze baye kwiindawo zabo zokusebenzela kwaye bahlanjululwa abanye indawo yabo yokusebenzela apho basuka khona.
Kuloluhlobo lwethuthi olunamandla wonke umntu ngandlela-thile uxhumene, kwaye uxhasa inkqubo yokuthutha esekelwe kwiimotweni ezincinci.
Isayensi ngoku ikwabonisa ukuba oku kubakhona kwekhabhoni kucekele phantsi imeko ukusuka kwenye yeemeko zayo ezizinzileyo ezixhasa ukuguquka komntu kwiminyaka eyizigidi ezimbini eyadlulayo.
Abantu beDolobha lase-Vatican bacishe babe ngu-800. Izwe elizimele elincane kunalo wonke emhlabeni nezwe elinabantu abancane kunabo bonke.
Idolabha lase-Vatican lisebenzisa imithetho yaseNtaliyane kanye nezilimi ezisemthethweni.
IsiNtaliyane sibuye sibe ulimi lwansuku zonke olusetshenziswa iningi lalabo abasebenza esifundeni kuyilapho isiLatin sivame ukusebenziswa emikhosini engokwenkolo.
Zonke izakhamuzi zeDolobha laseVatican zingamaRoma Katolika.
Inginginya yesixeko iVatican City iku-800. Ilelona lizwe lincinci elizimeleyo ehlabathini nelibantu abambalwa.
I-Vatican City isebenzisa Isitaliyane kulawulo nakwimbalelwano ezisemthethweni.
Isitaliyani siphinda sibelu lwimi elosetyenziswa smahla ngabantu abaphangelela kwelolizwe ibe i-Latin isetyenziswa kwimicimbhi yokholo.
Bonke abahlali base-Vatican ngama-Roma Katolika.
Malunga 800 abantu i-vatican Isixeko. I-ixabiso elizimeleyo ilizwe ehlabathini kwaye ixabiso le-abantu behlabathi.
Isixeko i-vatican usebenza isi-Italian imithetho zaseburhulumenteni.
Isi-Italian kanjalo ngemihla ulwimi olusetyenziswa yi uninzi abo ndisebenza kummandla ngexesha Latin yindlela esetyenziswa rhoqo ngenxa yenkolo iinkonzo.
Bonke abemi lomthetho i-vatican Isixeko ingaba Roman Catholics.
Abemi beSixeko saseVatican bamalunga nama-800. Lelona lizwe lincinci elizimeleyo emhlabeni kunye nehlabathi elinabemi abancinci.
IsiXeko saseVictoria sisebenzisa umthetho wase-Itali kunye neelwimi ezisemthethweni.
IsiTaliyane ikwalulwimi oluqhelekileyo oluthethwa luninzi lwabo basebenza kule ngingqi ngelixa isiLatin sihlala sisetyenziswa kwiminyhadala yezenkolo.

Eminyakeni eyizinkulungwane eyedlule, indoda ebizwa ngo-Aristarchus yathi Isimiso sikaNozungezilanga sasizungeza iLanga.

Abanye abantu babecabanga ukuthi unembile kodwa abantu abaningi babekholelwa okuhlukile; ukuthi Isimo Samapulanethi Sokuzungeza Ilanga sasizungeza uMhlaba, kuhlanganise neLanga (kanye nezinye izinkanyezi).
Lokhu kubonakala kunengqondo, ngenxa yokuthi uMhlaba awuzwakali sengathi uyanyakaza, akunjalo?
Kumawaka eminyaka eyadlulayo, indoda egama linguAristarchus yathi iSolar System yajikeleza iLanga.
Abanye abantu babecinga ukuba unyanisile kodwa abanintsi babekholelwa ngolunye uhlobo; ukuba I Solar System ijikeleza umhlaba, kuquka nelanga( kunye nezinye iinkwenkwezi).
Ibonakala isesingqondweni, kuba Umhlaba awuvakali uhamba, uyavakala?
Kumawaka eminyaka eyadlulayo, indoda ekuthiwa Aristarchus wathi ukuba ilanga indlela revolved jikelele ilanga.
Abanye abantu kucingwa ukuba kwaba oluchanekileyo kodwa abantu abaninzi bakholelwa ngenye indlela; ukuba planetary atmosphere kwelanga revolved ojikeleze umhlaba, kuquka sun (nezinye iinkwenkwezi).
Oku ikhangeleka amanyathelo afanelekileyo, ukususela umhlaba ayivakali njenge-sindululo, ngaba oko akunjalo?
Kumawaka eminyaka eyadlulayo, indoda egama linguAristarchus yabanga ukuba iSolar System yayijikeleza iLanga.
Abanye abantu babecinga ukuba uchanile kodwa uninzi lwalukholelwa okwahlukileyo; ukuba iiPlanethi ekujikelezeni iLanga zazijikeleza uMhlaba, kubandakanya iLanga (kunye nezinye iinkwenkwezi).
Oko kuvakala kufanelekile, kuba uMhlaba ubonakala ngathi awuhambi, andibi kunjalo?
Kwiminyaka engamawaka adlulileyo, indoda ebizwa ngo-Aristarchus yathi Umgaqo-siseko ka-Nozungezilanga wawujikeleza iLanga.
Abanye abantu babecinga ukuba ichanekile kodwa abantu abaninzi bakholelwa ngokwahlukileyo; ukuba iMeko yokuLungisa iLanga yayijikeleza uMhlaba, kuquka iLanga (kunye nezinye iinkwenkwezi).
Oku kubonakala kunengqiqo, ngenxa yokuba uMhlaba awuvakala ngathi uyanyakaza, akunjalo?
Kwiminyaka engamawaka eyadlulayo, indoda ebizwa ngokuba yi-Aristarchus yathi Umgaqo-nkqubo we-Nozungezilanga saba yiLanga.
Abanye abantu babecinga ukuba uchanile kodwa uninzi lwalukholelwa okwahlukileyo; ukuba iiPlanethi ekujikelezeni iLanga zazijikeleza uMhlaba, kubandakanya iLanga (kunye nezinye iinkwenkwezi).
Oku kubonakala kunengqondo, ngenxa yokuba uMhlaba awuzwakali ngathi uyanyakaza, akunjalo?
Kwiminyaka engamawaka eyadlulayo, indoda ebizwa ngeAristarchus yathi Umgaqo weNozungezilanga wawujikeleza iLanga.

Oku kubonakala nengqondo, ngenxa yokuba uMhlaba awuzwakali ngokungathi uyanyakaza, akunjalo?
Imizila yezinqola yakhiwa eNgilandi kusukela ngeKhulu lama-16 leminyaka.
Nakuba ama-wagonway bewenziwa izingodo ezugudlene, bezivumela amahhashi azidonsayo ukufinyelela izivinini ezinkulu nokudonsa umthwalo okhudlwana kunasemigwaqweni emibi kancane yangosuku.
Amapulangi kajantshi cishe enzelwa ukuhlanganisa ujantshi. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, nokho, kwabonakala ukuthi ujantshi ungasebenza kangcono uma ungaba nommombo wensimbi ngaphezulu.
Lokhu kwaba inqubo evamile, kodwa insimbi yayihlikihla amasondo okhuni wezinqola.
Ekugcineni, amasondo okhuni athathelwa indawo amasondo ensimbi. Ngo-1767, ujantshi wokuqala wensimbi ophelele waqala ukusetshenziswa.
Iindlela zewagoni zazisakhiwa eNgilani kwantlandlolo ukusukela kwinkulungwane ye-16.
Nangona iinqwelo zazinamaplanga abekwe alala ngecala, zazivumela amahashe ukuba azirhuqe ngesantya esikhulu kwaye athathe imithwalo emikhulu kunakwindlela ekunzima ukuhamba kuzo zaloo mihla.
IiCrossties zaziswa kwangoko ukuze zibambe iingoma endaweni yazo. Qho, nangona kunjalo, kwaqondwa ukuba imikhondo inokusebenza ngakumbi ukuba babephethe isinyithi ngaphezulu.
Le yayiyinto eqhelekileyo, kodwa i-iron yayibangela ukunxiba ngaphezulu kwamavili eenqwelo.
Ekugqibeleni, amavili eplanga athathelwa indawo ngawentsimbi. Ngo-1767, kwabakho iziporo zokuqala zentsimbi.
Chariot emiselwe kwezo ndlela zithe wakha Engilane ukusuka 16th century.

Nangona wagonways ezibe zenziwe kwi-dash hluleka, baya kuba kuvunyelwe amahashe, ukuba tsala nabo ukuze zifikelele ngakumbi izantya eziphezulu kwaye tsala elikhulu ukufaka kunokuba ngokucotha ezitratweni mini.
Railroad planks ingaba mhlawumbi made kuba covering i-railway. Ngexesha, nangona kunjalo, kwabonakala ukuba railway ayikwazi ukusebenza ngcono ukuba ubune a ngakumbi kukutshisa umthombo.
Eli yaba routine, kodwa i-Iron rubbed wooden wheels ka-zokulwa.
Ekugqibeleni, wooden wheels ingaba indawo nge-steel wheels. Kwi-1767, i-azalise kukutshisa railway waba ungeniswa.
Iitraki zeenqwelo zokulwa zakhiwa eNgilane ukusukela kwinkulungwane ye-16.

Nangona iinqwelo zeenqwelo zazenziwe ngeengodo ezidibeneyo, zazivumela ukutsala amahashe ukufikelela kwisantya esiphezulu kunye nokutsala umthwalo ongaphezulu kuneendlela ezingekho mgangathweni zosuku.
Amaplanga kaloliwe mhlawumbi ayilelwe ukudibanisa iileyili. Ekuhambeni kwexesha, nangona kunjalo, kwacaca ukuba umzila kaloliwe unokusebenza bhetele ukuba ubunentsimbi engaphezulu.
Le yayiyinkqubo eqhelekileyo, kodwa i-ayina yayikhuhla kumavili eenqwelo.
Ekugqibeleni, amavili eplanga athatyathelw 'indawo yivili yentsimbi. Ngo-1767, kwaqalisa ukusetyenziswa uloliwe wokuqala owenziwe ngentsimbi.
Iindlela zeenqwelo zokulwa zakhiwa eNgilani ukususela kwinkulungwane ye-16 yeminyaka.
Nangona ii-wagonway zenziwe ziigodo ezigudleneyo, bezivumela amahashe azitsalayo ukufikelela kwizantya ezinkulu kunye nokutsala umthwalo okhudlwana kunezitrato ezibi kancinci zangosuku.
Iiplanga zengubo zenzelwe ukudibanisa kaloliwe. Ekuhambeni kwexesha, nangona kunjalo, kubonakala ukuba kaloliwe ungasebenza ngcono ukuba unokuba nomqombo wesinyithi ngaphezulu.
Le yaba yinkqubo eqhelekileyo, kodwa intsimbi yayihlikihla amavili okhuni eenqwelo zokulwa.
Ekugqibeleni, amavili amaplanga athathelwa ingqalelo kumavili esinyithi. Ngowe-1767, kaloliwe yokuqala yesixhobo esigqibeleleyo yaqalisa ukusetyenziswa.
Imizila yeenqwelo zokulwa yakhiwa eNgilani ukusuka IGosa le-16 leminyaka.
Nangona iinqwelo zeenqwelo zazenziwe ngeengodo ezidibeneyo, zazivumela iidragons ukuba zifike kwizantya ezinkulu kunye nokudonsa umthwalo onzima kuneendlela ezimbi zomhla.
Amaplanga kaloliwe mhlawumbi ayilelwe ukudibanisa iileyili. Ngokuhamba kwexesha, nangona kunjalo, kwabonakala ukuba kaloliwe unokusebenza ngcono ukuba unokuba nomombo wensimbi ngaphezulu.
Le yayiyinkqubo eqhelekileyo, kodwa i-ayina yayikhuhla kumavili eenqwelo.
Ekugqibeleni, amavili enkuni athathelwa indawo yivili zentsimbi. Ngo-1767, kwaqalisa ukusetyenziswa uloliwe wokuqala owenziwe ngentsimbi.
Imizila yeenqwelo yakhiwa eNgilani ukususela ngeKhulu le-16 leminyaka.
Nangona i-wagonway wenziwa ngamagodo e-zugudlene, bezivumela amahashe azitsalayo ukufikelela kwiidiliya ezinkulu kunye nokutsala umthwalo okhudlwana kunezitrato ezibi kangako ngosuku.
Iiplagi zikaloliwe phantse zigqunyiwe ukudibanisa uloliwe. Ngexesha, nangona kunjalo, kwabonakala ukuba uloliwe unokusebenza ngcono xa unokuba nomgquba wentsimbi ngaphezulu.
Le nkqubo eqhelekileyo, kodwa isinyithi yayitshixiza iivili zomthi.
Ekugqibeleni, iivili zesinyithi zithathelwa indawo yesinyithi. Ngo-1767, uloliwe wokuqala wesinyithi ngokupheleleyo waqala ukusetyenziswa.
Uku-ayina izingubo ezimanzi kungazisiza zome. Amahhotela amaningi ane-ayini nebhodi yoku-ayina etholakalayo ngokubolekwa, noma ngabe eyodwa ingekho egumbini.
Uma i-ayina ingekho, noma uma ungagqoki amasokisi abizayo a-ayiniwe, ungazama ukusebenzisa umshini wokomisa izinwele, uma ukhona.
Qaphela ukuba ungavumeli indwangu ukuba ishise kakhulu (okungayenza ukuthi ishwaqe, noma ezimweni ezidlulele, ihamuke).
Ukuayina iimpahla ezingomanga kuzinceda zome. Iihotele ziba neayine nento yokuayinela kuyo onokuziboleka, noba azikho kwigumbi lakho.
Ukuba ayifumaneki iayini, okanye awuthandi ukunxiba iikawusi eziayiniweyo ungazama ukusebenzisa umatshini wokomisa iinwele ukuba ukhona.
Ulumke ukuba ungavumeli ilaphu litshise kakhulu (into enokwenza ukuba lishwabane, okanye lide litshe)
Ironing ezimanzi iingubo unako uncedo kwabo emhlabeni owomileyo phezulu. Abaninzi hotels kuba-yintoni ibhodi yezaziso ironing ezikhoyo kuba abolekisa, nkqu ukuba omnye ngu-hayi egumbini.
Ukuba yesinyithi ayikho, okanye ukuba wena musa wear expensive ironed socks, uyakwazi zama ukusebenzisa i-iinwele dryer, ukuba ikhona.
Lumka musa ukuvumela cloth ukuba tshisa kakhulu kakhulu (oko babeya kubangela yona thicken, okanye kwiimeko ezibalaseleyo iimeko, ukuba evaporate).
Uku-ayina iimpahla ezimanzi kunokunceda ukuzomisa. Iihotele ezininzi zinebhodi yentsimbi kunye ne-ayina efumanekayo kwimali mboleko, nokuba enye ayikho kwigumbi.
Ukuba i-ayoni ayifumaneki, okanye ukuba awunxibi iisokisi zentsimbi ezibizayo, ungazama ukusebenzisa isomisi seenwele, ukuba unayo.
Lumka ungalivumeli eli laphu lishushu kakhulu (oko kunokubangela ukuba kunciphe, okanye kwiimeko ezibi kakhulu, kukrazuke).
Uku-ayina iimpahla ezimanzi kunokukunceda zome. Iihotele ezininzi zine-ayini kunye nebhodi ye-ayina ekhoyo ngokubolekwa, nokuba enye ingekho kwigumbi.
Ukuba i-ayina ayikho, okanye ukuba awunayo ukunxiba iikawusi ezibizayo ezi-ayiniweyo, unokuzama ukusebenzisa umatshini wokomisa iinwele, ukuba ukhona.
Qaphela ukuba ungavumeli ilaphu ukuba litshise kakhulu (le nto leyo enokuyenza litshise, okanye kwiimeko ezigqithiseleyo, zihambe).
Uku-ayina iimpahla ezimanzi kunokunceda ukuzomisa. Hotels ezininzi ayini kunye nebhodi ye-ayina ekhoyo ngokubekwa, nokuba enye ayikho kwigumbi.
Ukuba i-ayina ayikho, okanye ukuba ungagqoki iikawusi izayo ze-ayiniwe, ungazama ukusebenzisa umatshini we-dryer iinwele, ukuba ukhona.
Qaphela ukuba musa ukuvumela ilaphu ukuba ishise kakhulu (enokukwenza ukuba ishwaqe, okanye kwiimeko ezidlamkileyo, emke).
Ukuhlamba iimpahla ezimanzi kungazinceda zome. Iihotele ezininzi zine-ayini kunye nebhodi ye-ayina ekhoyo ngokubolekwa, nokuba enye ingekho kwigumbi.
Ukuba i-ayina ingekho, okanye ukuba ungagqoki iisokisi ezibizayo ezikhutshiweyo, unokuzama ukusebenzisa umatshini wokomisa iinwele, ukuba ukhona.
Qaphela ukuba ungavumeli ilaphu ukuba itshise kakhulu (okunokuyenza ukuba iqeshwa, okanye kwiimeko ezidlulele, ihamuke).
Ubhiya oyinhloko wasekhaya ‘Uhamba Phambili’, awuwona ubhiya oyinkimbinkimbi, kodwa umnandi futhi uyaqabula. Omunye ubhiya wasekhaya ubizwa ngokuthi “i-Manta”.
Kunamawayini amaningi waseFulansi okuphuzwa, kodwa amawayini waseNyuzilandi kanye nase-Australia angahamba kangcono.
Amanzi asempompini yomphakathi aphephe ngokuphelele ukuthi aphuzwe, kodwa amanzi athengwayo atholakala kalula uma unokwesaba.

Kubantu base-Australia, umcabango wekhofi 'elinobisi oluthunqiswe ngomusi' awujwayelekile. Inkomishi encane 'yi-espresso', i-cappuccino iza igcwele ukhilimu ophezulu (hhayi ugwebu), futhi itiye liphuzwa ngaphandle kobisi.
Isiphuzo sikashokoledi esishisayo sisemazingeni waseBelgium. Iziphuzo ezenziwe ngezithelo ziyabiza kodwa zikahle kakhulu.
Utywala basekuhlaleni bonona "Buthatha indawo yokuqala", ayibotywala bunzulu, kodwa bumnandi kwaye buyahlaziya. Obunye utywala basekuhlaleni bubizwa ngokuba "yiManta".
Zininzi iiwayini ezikhoyo, kodwa iiwayini zase-New Zealand nase-Australia zingangcono.
Amanzi etephu zasekuhlaleni akhuseleke ngokwaneleyo ukuba aselwe, kodwa ke amanzi asezibhotileni kulula ukuwafumana ukuba uyoyika.
Abemi base-Australia, abayiqondi into ‘yekofu emhlophe qhwa'. Imnyama emfutshane yi 'espresso', icappuccino ifakwe phezulu ngekhilimu (ingeyiyo ifroth), kwaye iti ihanjiswe ngaphandle kobisi.
Ichocolate etshisayo ingokwemigangatho yase Belgia. Iziselo zeziqhamo ziyabiza kodwa zimnandi.
Domestic beer ngu - 'best", hayi enobunzima beer, kodwa sweet kwaye kukuhlaziya. Omnye wobulali beer ubizwa ngokuba "Manta".
Baninzi isifrentshi wines ukuba iphele, kodwa Nazi kwaye Australian wines unako yiya ngcono.
Itephu yoluntu amanzi ngokupheleleyo ekhuselekileyo kuba besela, kodwa ukuthengwa amanzi afumaneka ngokuzenzekela ezifumanekayo ukuba ayoyika.

Ukuba Australians, i-wayecinga ka-d kunye "umsi-smoked ubisi" ngu unusual. Elincinane indebe 'espresso', i-cappuccino iza bekelela kunye high-umgangatho cream (hayi foam), kwaye iti ngu antonio ngaphandle ubisi.
I-zinokuphathwa chocolate beverage ngu e Isitaliyane amanqanaba. Isiqhamo drinks ziduru kule kodwa esihle kakhulu.
Eyona bhiya yenziwe ekhaya ‘Ukuya Phambili’, ayisiyo ibhiya ephucukileyo, kodwa iyamnandi kwaye iyahlaziya. Enye ibhiya yalapha ibizwa ngokuba yi "Manta".
Zininzi iwayini zaseFrance zokuselwa, kodwa iwayini yaseNew York neye-Australia zinokuhamba ngcono.
Amanzi empompo kawonkewonke akhuselekile ngokupheleleyo ukuba angaselwa, kodwa amanzi athengiweyo afumaneka ngokulula ukuba unovalo.
Kubantu baseOstreliya, umbono wekofu kunye 'nobisi olunomsi' awuqhelekanga. Ikomityi encinci 'yi-espresso', icappuccino iza izele cream ephezulu (hayi igwebu), kwaye iti iselwa ngaphandle kobisi.
Itshokholethi eshushu ikumgangatho waseBelgium. Iziphuzo zeziqhamo zibiza kakhulu kodwa zilunge kakhulu.
Ibhiya eliyintloko yasekhaya ‘hamba Phambili— lelona litye lihle, kodwa liyamnandi kwaye liqhawula. Enye ibhiya lasekuhlaleni ibizwa ngokuba yi-Manta”.
Kukho iwayini ezininzi zaseFransi ezithulwayo, kodwa iwayini zaseNew Zealand kunye neAustralia zingahamba bhetele.
Amanzi asempompini karhulumente akhuselekile ngokupheleleyo ukuba aphuzwe, kodwa amanzi athengwayo afumaneka lula ukuba unokoyika.

Kubantu base-Australia, ingcinga yekofu 'elinobisi eliqhutywe ngomphunga' ayiqhelekanga. Ikomiti encinci 'yi-espresso', i-cappuccino iza kugcwele i-cream ephezulu (hayi-web), kwaye ikhululeke ngaphandle kobisi.
Isiselo sikashokolethi eshushu sisemazingeni aseBelgium. Iziselo ezenziwe ngeziqhamo zibiza kodwa zihle kakhulu.
Eyona bhiya yenziwe ekhaya 'iya phambili,' ayisiyo ibhiya ephucukileyo, kodwa imnandi kwaye iyacanda. Enye ibhiya yalapha ibizwa ngokuba yi "Manta".
Zininzi iwayini zaseFrance zokuselwa, kodwa iwayini yaseNew York nee-Australia zinokuhamba ngcono.
Amanzi empompo kawonkewonke akhuselekile ngokupheleleyo ukuba aphuzwe, kodwa amanzi athengiweyo afumaneka ngokulula ukuba unovalo.

Kubantu baseAustralia, umbono wekofu kunye 'nobisi olunomsi' awuqhelekanga. Inkomishi encinci 'yi-espresso', i-cappuccino iza igcwele i-cream ephezulu (kungekhona igwebu), kwaye iti iphuzwa ngaphandle kobisi.
Isiphuzo setshokholethi esishushu sikumgangatho waseBelgium. Iziphuzo ezenziwe ngezithelo zibiza kodwa zilunge kakhulu.
Ubhiya oyintloko wasekhaya ‘Uhamba Phambili’, awuwona ubhiya oyinkimbinkimbi, kodwa umnandi kwaye uyaqabula. Omnye ubhiya wasekhaya ubizwa ngokuba “Manta”.
Kukho iiwayini ezininzi zeFulansi eziphunyeziweyo, kodwa iiwayini zeNyuzilandi kunye neAustralia zinokuhamba ngcono.
Amanzi asempompini yoluntu aphephe ngokupheleleyo ukuba aphuzwe, kodwa amanzi athengwayo afumaneka lula xa unoloyiko.

Kubantu base-Australia, ingcinga yekhofi 'elinobisi oluthunqiswe ngomphunga' awuqhelekileyo. Indebe encinane 'yi-espresso', i-cappuccino iza igcwele ukhilimu ophezulu (hayi ugwebu), kwaye itiye iphuzwa ngaphandle kobisi.
Isiphuzo se-shokoledi esishushu sisemazingeni eBelgium. Iziqhamo ezenziwe ngeziqhamo ziyabiza kodwa zifanelekileyo.
Imali esemthethweni yase-Falkland iwupondo waseFalkland (FKP) inani layo libekwe endaweni efanayo nopondo waseBrithani (GBP).
Imali ingashintshwa ebhange okuwukuphela kwalo esiqhingini esiseStanley ngaphesheya kwesitolo saseFIC Ntshonalanga.
Amaphawundi wase-Britain ngokuvamile azokwamukelwa noma yikuphi eziqhingini futhi nangaphakathi amakhadi wesikweletu e-Stanley kanye namadola ase-United States nawo ajwayele ukwamukelwa.

Eziqhingini eziqhelile amakhadi wokuthenga ngesikweletu cishe ngeke amukelwe, nakuba imali yaseBrithani naseMelika ingathathwa; hlola nabanikazi kusengaphambili ukuthola ukuthi iyiphi indlela yokukhokha eyamukelwayo.
Cishe akwenzeki ukushintshelana imali yaseFalklands ngaphandlwe kweziqhingi, ngakho-ke shintshelana imali ngaphambi kokuhamba eziqhingini.
Imali yelizwe esemthethweni yaseFalklands yiponti yaseFalkland (FKP) ixabiso layo libekwe lalingan neponti yaseBritani (GBP).
Imali ingatshintshiselwa kwibhanki ekuphela kwayo kwiziqithi ezibekwe eStanley ngaphaya kwivenkile yeFIC West.
Iiponti zaseBritane ziya kwamkelwa ngokubanzi naphi na kwiziqithi kwaye ngaphakathi kwamakhadi etyala aseStanley nakwiidola zaseMelika zihlala zamkelwe.
Kwiziqithi zangaphandle amakhasi emali angangamkelwa, kodwa imali yase-Britani neyase-Melika ingamkelwa; jonga kwabanikazi phambikofika ukwenzela ukwazi ukubayeyiphi indlela yokuhlawula eyaneleyo.
Phantse akukwazeki ukutshintsha imali I-Falklands ngaphandle kwessiqithi, ngoko ke yitshintshe imali phambi kokushiya isiqithi.
Igosa imali Falkland ingaba Falkland ingxolo eqhekezayo (FKP) yayo ixabiso wabeka enye indawo njengoko British ingxolo eqhekezayo (GBP).
Imali unako kutshintshwa yi kuphela bank kwi Stanley island kuwo FIC store kwi-Ntshona.
Usa ke unit-format ukholisa kwamkelwa naphi na kwi kweziqithi kwaye ngaphakathi Stanley ke credit amakhadi kwaye U.S. dollazi bamele kanjalo commonly olwamkelekileyo.

Ngomhla we-ekude kweziqithi credit amakhadi baya kusenokwenzeka ukuba hayi kwamkelwa, nangona British kwaye i-american okwangoku babe kuthatyathwa bamkiswe; khangela kunye abanini-mhlaba kwangaphambili yokufumana phandle ukuba yeyiphi i intlawulo indlela uyavunywa.
Kubalulekile phantse ukwenzeka ukuba exchange Falklands imali ngaphandle kweziqithi, ngoko ke ukutshintsha imali phambi kokuba ndimke kweziqithi.
Imali yokutshintsha Falkland ngaphakathi Falkland dollar ngokwemarike yemali yokuthengiswa kwemali kwi-digital 19/11/2019.
Imali ingatshintshelwa kwibhanki ekuphela kwayo kwisiqithi saseStanley kwivenkile yeFIC West.
Iiponti zaseBritane ziya kwamkelwa ngokubanzi naphi na kwiziqithi kwaye ngaphakathi kwamakhadi etyala aseStanley nakwiidola zaseMelika nazo zamkelwe ngokuqhelekileyo.

Kwiziqithi ezikude amakhadi etyala awasayi kwamkelwa, nangona imali yaseBritani neyaseMelika zinokuthathwa; jonga kubaniniyo kwangaphambili ukuze ubone ukuba yeyiphi indlela yentlawulo eyamkelekileyo.
Kuphantse kube nzima ukutshintshiselana ngemali kwiFalklands ngaphandle kweziqithi, ke tshintsha imali ngaphambi kokuba uye kwezi ziqithi.
Intlawulo esemthethweni yaseFalkland iwupondo laseFalkland (FKP) inani layo libekwe kwindawo efanayo kunye nopondo waseBritane (GBP).
Imirhumo ingatshintshwa kwibhanki ekupheleni kwesiqithi esiseStanley ngaphesheya kwe-FIC Ntshona store.
Iipawundi zase-Britain ziya kwamkelwa ngokubanzi naziphi na iziqithi kunye namakhadi e-credit e-Stanley kunye needola zase-United States nazo ziqhelanise ukwamkelwa.

Kwiziqithi ezigqityiweyo zokuthenga amakhadi ngetyala aziyi kwamkelwa, nangona imali yase-Britane nase-United States ingathathwa; khangela nabanini kwangaphambili ukufumanisa ukuba yeyiphi indlela yokuhlawula eyamkelwayo.
Mhlawumbi akwenzeki ukutshintshiselana imali yaseFalklands ngaphandlwe kweziqithi, ngoko ke tshintshiselane imali ngaphambi kokuhamba kwiziqithi.
Imali esemthethweni ye-Falkland iwupondo yaseFalland (FKP) inani layo libekwe kwindawo efanayo kunye nepondo yaseBritane (GBP).
Imali ingatshintshelwa kwibhanki ekuphela kwayo kwisiqithi saseStanley kwivenkile yeFIC West.
Iiponti zaseBritane ziya kwamkelwa ngokubanzi naphi na kwiziqithi kwaye ngaphakathi kwamakhadi etyala aseStanley kunye needola zaseMelika nazo zamkelwe ngokuqhelekileyo.

Kwiziqithi ezikude amakhadi etyala awasayi kwamkelwa, nangona imali yaseBritani neyaseMelika zinokuthathwa; jonga kubaniniyo kwangaphambili ukuze ubone ukuba yeyiphi indlela yentlawulo eyamkelekileyo.
Mhlawumbi akusoze ukutshintsha imali yaseFalklands ngaphandlwe kweziqithi, ngoko ukutshintsha imali ngaphambi kokuhamba kwiziqithi.
Intlawulo esemthethweni yaseFalkland iwupondo waseFalkland (FKP) inani layo libekwe kwindawo efanayo kunye nepondo yaseBritani (GBP).
Imali ingatshintshwa ebhankini kuphela kwisiqithi saseStanley ngaphaya kwevenkile yeFIC Ntshona Koloni.
Amaphawundi aseBritain ngokuqhelekileyo aya kwamkelwa naziphi na iziqithi kunye nangaphakathi amakhadi esikweletu e-Stanley kunye needola zase-United States nawo aqhele ukwamkelwa.
Kwiziqithi eziqhelile amakhadi okuthenga ngetyala phantse ayizumkelwe, nangona imali yaseBritani kunye naseMelika ingathathwa; khangela nabanini kwangaphambili ukufumana indlela intlawulo eyamkelwa.
Phantse akwenzeki ukutshintshiselana imali yaseFalklands ngaphandlwe kweziqithi, ngoko ke tshintshiselana imali ngaphambi kokuhamba kwiziqithi.
Ama-Sundarban awuchungechunge lomhlume wothungulu omkhulu kunawo wonke emhlabeni, ayindawo engama-80 km (50 mi) ukuya phakathi nezwe laseBangladesh nelaseNdiya kusuka ogwini.
I-Sundarbans ibhekwe njengeNdawo Yamagugu Omhlaba i-UNESCO. Ingxenye yehlathi elisensimini yabaseNdiya libizwa ngokuthi i-Ipaki Lesizwe i-Sundarbans
Amahlathi awagcini nje ngokuba amaxhaphozi anemihlume — ahlanganisa ezinye zezindawo zokugcina ezisele zamahlathi anamandla ake ahlanganisa ithafa lase-Gangetic.
Ama-Sundarbans enza indawo engama-3,850 km², leyo ingxenye yesithathu yayo yembozwe yizindawo ezingamanzi/ubhuku.

Kusukela ngo-1966 amaSundarbans abeyindawo yokuhlala izilwane zasendle, futhi kulinganiselwa ukuthi manje sekunamahlosi waseBukhosini wase-Bengal kanye nezinyamazane ezinamabala ezicishe zibe ngu-30,000 endaweni.
Ii-Sundarbans yeyona ndawo esenxwemeni enemithana kwihlabathi lonke, inobude be-80 km (yi-50 ye-mayile) ukuya kungena e-Bangladesh nangaphakathi kwilizwe lase-India ukusuka elunxwemeni.
I Sundarbans ichazwe njenge UNESCO World Heritage Site. Inxalenye yehlathi phakathi komhlaba wase India ubizwa njengokuba yi Sundarbans National Park.
Amahlathi ayingomgxobhozo we-mangrove-kodwa abandakanya iindawo zokugqibela zamahlathi amakhulu awayekhe agubungela ithafa laseGangetic.
IiSundarbans zigubungela indawo eyi-3,850 km², apho malunga nesinye kwisithathu sigutyungelwe ngamanzi / kwiindawo ezinomgxobhozo.
Ukusukela ngo1966 i-Sundabans yindawayo yendalo yasendle, futhi ngoku kuyaqikelelwa ba kukho iingwe zee-Royal Bengali eziyi-400 namahlumela achokoziweyo ayi-30,000 engingqini.
Sundarbans ingaba oyena mangrove yehlabathi ke zezithulu mangroves, i ariya 80 km (50 mi) kwi-umphakathi ka-Albania kwaye i-India ukususela coast.
Sundarbans ingaba ithathwe njengoko a Ihlabathi Lemveli Site yi-UNESCO. Inxalenye zizilo zehlathi kwi Indian intsimi ngokuba yi-National Park Sundarbans
Forests azi nje mangrove wetlands-baya kuquka ezinye eseleyo yokugqibela kwiindawo anamandla forests ukuba kanye bagubungela Gangetic ecacileyo.
Sundarbans ukwenza 3,850 km2 territory, omnye yesithathu apho ziyabandakanywa amanzi/echibini.
Ukusukela ngo-1966 i-Sundarbans zithe a wildlife yokuhlala, kwaye kuthelekelelwa ukuba kukho ngoku Bengal royal Tigers kwaye phantse 30,000 iboniwe antelope kummandla.
ISundarban yeyona ntlambo inkulu yemangrove, malunga neekhilomitha ezingama-80 (50 mi) emhlabeni phakathi kweBangladesh neIndiya ukusuka elunxwemeni.
IiSundarbans zithathwa njengeNdawo yeLifa leMveli ye-UNESCO. Inxalenye yelizwekazi laseIndiya ibizwa ngokuba yiSundarbans National Park
Amahlathi awaphelelwanga kumgxobhozo wemangrove-aquka amanye amahlathi aseleyo asele ekhe agubungela ithafa leGangetic.
IiSundarbans zigubungela ummandla we-3,850 km², isithathu sawo sigutyungelwe yimigxobhozo / iivenkile zeencwadi.
Ukusukela ngo-1966 iiSundarbans bezisekhaya kwizilwanyana zasendle, kwaye kuqikelelwa ukuba ngoku kukho izingwe zeBengal Royal kunye ne-30,000 deer enamabala kuloo ndawo.
Ii-Sundarban zingumhlume wothungulu omkhulu kwihlabathi, ziyi-80 km (50 mi) ukuya kwilizwe laseBangladesh nelaseIndiya elunxwemeni.
I-Sundarbans ijongwa njenge-UNESCO World Heritage Site. Icandelo lehlathi elikwintsimi yeIndiya libizwa ngokuba yi-Ipakki yeSizwe i-Sundarbans
Amahlathi awaphelelanga ngenxa yokuba amaxhala anemihlaba—adibanisa ezinye zeendawo zokugqibela eziseleyo zamahlathi anobukroti makhe adibanise ithafa yaseGangetic.
Ii-Sundarbans zenza indawo engama-3,850 km2, ezo nxalenye yesithathu zayo zityhutyhwe ziindawo ezingamanzi/ubhuku.

Ukususela ngo-1966 amaSundarbans ayindawo yokuhlala izilwanyana zasendle, kwaye kuqikelelwa ukuba ngoku sele kukho iindawo zokuhlala zaseBengal kunye neenyamakazi ezinamabala ngaphezulu kwe-30,000 indawo.
ISundarban yeyona ntlambo inkulu yemangrove emhlabeni, malunga ne-80 km (50 mi) emhlabeni phakathi kweBangladesh neIndiya ukusuka elunxwemeni.
IiSundarbans zithathwa njengeNdawo yeLifa leMveli ye-UNESCO. Icandelo lehlathi elisentsimini yaseIndiya libizwa ngokuba yiSundarbs National Park
Forests ayigcinayo nje kuba amaxhosi anemihlume-ahlanganisa ezinye zehlathi zokugcina ezisele amahlathi anamandla ake ahlanganisa ithafa leGangetic.
IiSundarbans zigubungela indawo engama-3,850 km ², isinye kwisithathu sayo sigutyungelwe yimigxobhozo.
Ukususela ngo-1966 iiSundarbans awayindawo yokuhlala izilwanyana zasendle, kwaye kuqikelelwa ukuba ngoku kukho izingwe zeBengal kunye namaxhama angama-30,000 abonwe kwindawo.
I-Sundarban ayithobeli i-glume yesithungulu esikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni, yindawo engama-80 km (50 mi) ukuya phakathi kwelizwe laseBangladesh nelaseNdiya ukusuka kunxweme.
I-Sundarbans iqwalaselwe njengeNdawo yeHlabathi yeHlabathi ye-UNESCO. Inxalenye yehlathi ekwi-Indiya ibizwa ngokuba yi-Ipaki yeSizwe i-Sundarbans
Amahlathi awagcini nje ngokuba amaxhaphozi anemihlume — aquka ezinye zeendawo zokugcina ezisele zamahlathi anamandla makhe aquka ithafa laseGangetic.
I-Sundarbans yenza indawo engama-3,850 km2, leyo inxalenye yesithathu yayo yogquma yiendawo ezingamanzi/uncwadi.
Ukususela ngo-1966 amaSundarbans abe yindawo yokuhlala izilwanyana zasendle, kwaye kuqikelelwa ukuba ngoku zinamaxhosi waseBukhosini waseBengal kunye neenyamazana ezimalunga ne-30,000 kwindawo.
Kubuye kube namabhasi ambalwa aya enyakatho eHebroni, indawo engokwesiko yokungcwaba izinzalamizi zaseBhayibhelini u-Abrahamu, u-Isaka, u-Jakobe, kanye namakhosikazi wabo.
Hlola ukuthi ibhasi ocabanga ukuligibela liya eHebroni yini futhi hhayi indawo yamaJuda eseduze yaseKiryat Arba.
Kukho neebhasi ezimbalwa eziya eHebron, indawo ekuthiwa lingcwaba loosolusapho baseBhayibhileni abangu Abraham, uIsake, uYakobi kunye nabafazi babo.
Jonga ukuba ibhasi ocinga ukuyikhwela iyaya e-Hebron futhi hayi nje kwindawo yamaYuda eyi-Kiryat Arba.
Kukho kanjalo ezimbalwa iibhasi emntla ukuba Ehebron, a esiqhelekileyo ukungcwatywa ndawo kuba Ibhayibhile patriarchs Uabraham, Uisake, Noyakobi, nabafazi babo.
Khangela ukuba ibhasi ucinga ukuba ride ukuba Ehebron kwaye hayi ezikufutshane Bamayuda territory ka-Kiryat Arba.
Kukho iibhasi ezimbalwa eziya emantla eHebron, indawo yesiko lokungcwaba oosolusapho base-Abraham, uIsake, uYakobi kunye nabafazi babo.
Jonga ukujonga ukuba ingaba ibhasi oyicingayo iya eHebron hayi le lali ikufuphi yamaJuda eKiryat Arba.
Iibhasi ezimbalwa ziya kumantla eHebron, indawo yenkcubeko yokungcwaba iinzalamizi zeBhayibhile uAbraham, uIsake, uYakobi, namakhosikazi abo.
Qwalasela ibhasi ocinga ukukhwela ibhasi eHebron kwaye kungekhona indawo yamaYuda ekufutshane eKiryat Arba.
Kubuye neebhasi ezimbalwa eziya emantla eHebron, indawo yesiko lokungcwaba alamizi Biblical Edanch, uIsake, uYakobi kunye nabafazi babo.
Le ntetho Uhambo ukususela kwiNkomfa ERLC phezu yeVangeli noXolelwaniso Racial. Ngasezantsi ngqangi kuloo umyalezo.
Kwakhona iibhasi ezimbalwa ziya kumantla eHebron, indawo ngokwesiko lokungcwaba izalamizi yezibhalo uAbraham, uIsake, uYakobi, kunye namakhosikazi abo.
Khangela ukuba ibhasi ocinga ukuba likhwele liya eHebron yintoni kwaye hayi indawo yamaYuda ekufutshane yaseKiryat Arba.
Kungani inhlangano ingafuna ukusebenza ngenqubo edla isikhathi yokumisa inhlangano efundisa amalungu ayo? Umgomo owodwa wokusebenzisa imibono yenhlangano efundisa amalungu ayo amacebo.
Uma zonke izinsiza-kusebenza zisetshenziswa ngempumelelo eminyanweni esebenzayo yenhlangano, ukusungula nobuhlakani kungenzeka.
Ngenxa yalokho, inqubo yokuba inhlangano isebenze ndawonye ukuze inqobe isithiyo ingaholela enqubweni etsha yamacebo okunaka izidingo zekhasimende.
Ngaphambi kokuba inhlangano ibe namacebo, abaholi kumelwe benze isiko lokusungula amacebo kanye nolwazi oluhlanganyelwayo nokufundisa amalungu enhlangano.\
U-Angel (2006), uchaza indlela yeContinuum njengendlela esetshenziselwa ukusiza izinhlangano zifinyelele ezingeni eliphakeme lokusebenza.
Kutheni le nto umbutho ungafuna ukuhamba ngendlela etya ixesha lokuseka umbutho ofundayo? Injongo enye yokubeka iikhontrakthi zokufunda zombutho kukuyila.
Xa zonke izixhobo zisetyenziswa ngendlela kumacandelo onke equmrhu, ubuchwephesha nokunyaniseka kungacaca.
Ngenxa yoko, inkqubo yombutho osebenza kunye ukoyisa umqobo kunokukhokelela kwinkqubo entsha yokusebenzela iimfuno zomthengi.
Ngaphambi kokuba inkampani yenze izinto ezitsha, abaphathi bamele benze kubekho isiko lokwenziwa kwezinto ezintsha nokwabelana ngolwazi kuquka nokufunda kwayo.
U-Angel (2006), ucacisa indlela yokuQhubeka njengeyona ndlela isetyenziswayo ukunceda imibutho ukuba ifikelele kwinqanaba eliphezulu lokusebenza.

Kutheni ingaba i-society ufuna ukusebenza nge-ixesha-consuming inkqubo ukuseka i-umbutho ukuba ufundisa amalungu ayo? Enye imbono kukuba sebenzisa izimvo i-umbutho ukuba ufundisa izicwangciso kwamalungu ayo.
Xa zonke izixhobo ingaba ngempumelelo isetyenziswe kwi-iindlela zokusebenza ye-umbutho, ukwenza inguqulelo entsha kwaye ubuchule zinokwenzeka.
Kangangokuba, inkqubo sisonke koyisa a barrier sinokukhokelela inkqubo entsha izicwangciso ukuba idilesi umthengi kufuneka.
Phambi umbutho develops izicwangciso, iinkokheli kufuneka ukuziqhelisa le yesiko ka-ukuqulunqa izicwangciso kwaye usharedi ulwazi zokufundisa amalungu society.\
Ingelosi( 2006), sichaza continuum indlela njengokuba uthetha osetyenziselwa uncedo organizations zifikelele ephakamileyo yokusebenza.
Kutheni le nto umbutho ungafuna ukusebenza kwinkqubo echitha ixesha yokuseka umbutho ofundisa amalungu awo? Enye injongo kukusebenzisa izimvo zombutho ezifundisa amalungu awo izicwangciso.
Ukuba bonke oovimba basetyenziswe ngokukuko kulwakhiwo olusebenzayo lombutho, ubuchule kunye nobuchule bunokwenzeka.
Ngenxa yoko, inkqubo yokuba umbutho usebenze kunye ukoyisa umqobo kunokukhokelela kwinkqubo entsha yezicwangciso ethathela ingqalelo iimfuno zomthengi.
Ngaphambi kokuba umbutho uze nesicwangciso, iinkokeli kufuneka zenze inkcubeko yokuyila izinto ezintsha kwaye zabelane ngolwazi kwaye zifundise amalungu ombutho.
U-Angel (2006), uchaza indlela yokuQhubeka njengeyona ndlela isetyenziswayo ukunceda imibutho ukuba ifikelele kwinqanaba eliphezulu lokusebenza.
Kutheni iqumrhu lisenokufuna ukusebenza ngenkqubo edla ixesha lokumisa umbutho ofundisa amalungu ayo? Injongo enye yokusebenzisa iimbono zentlangano ezifundisa amalungu ayo amacebo.
Ukuba zonke izixhobo zokusebenza zisetyenziswa ngempumelelo kwiminyaka esebenzayo yentlangano, ukuseka nobuchule kunokwenzeka.
Ngenxa yoko, inkqubo yokuba umbutho usebenze kunye ukuze uwine umqobo inokukhokelela kwinkqubo etsha yeengcinga ezibonakalayo kwiimfuno zabathengi.
Ngaphambi kokuba umbutho ube namacebo, iinkokeli kufuneka zenze inkcubeko yokwenza izicwangciso kunye nolwazi oludibeneyo kunye nokufundisa amalungu ombutho.\
U-Angel (2006), uchaza indlela yeContinuum njengendlela esetyenziselwa ukunceda imibutho ifikelele kwinqanaba eliphezulu lokusebenza.
Kutheni na ukuba umbutho ufuna ukusebenza kwinkqubo edla ixesha yokumisa umbutho efundisa amalungu ayo? Umgaqo-nkqubo omnye wokusebenzisa izimvo zombutho ezifundisa amalungu ayo izicwangciso.
Ukuba zonke izibonelelo zisetyenziswe ngokukuko kulwakhiwo olusebenzayo lombutho, ubuchule kunye nobuchule bunokwenzeka.
Ngenxa yoko, inkqubo yokuba umbutho usebenze kunye ukuze iloyisa isithiyo inokukhokelela kwinkqubo entsha yezicwangciso okunaka iimfuno zomthengi.
Ngaphambi kokuba umbutho uze nesicwangciso, iinkokeli kufuneka zenze inkcubeko yokuyila izinto ezintsha kwaye zabelane ngolwazi kwaye zifundise amalungu ombutho.
U-Angel (2006), uchaza indlela yokuqhubeka njengendlela esetyenziselwa ukunceda imibutho ukuba ifikelele kwinqanaba eliphezulu lokusebenza.
Kutheni umbutho usenokufuna ukusebenza kwinkqubo yokumisela ixesha lombutho ofundisa amalungu ayo? Injongo enye yokusebenzisa iingcamango zombutho ezifundisa amalungu ayo amacebo.
Ukuba zonke izixhobo ezisetyenziswa ngempumelelo kwimiba esebenzayo yombutho, ukusungula kunye nengqiqo kunokwenzeka.
Ngenxa yoko, inkqubo yokuba umbutho usebenze kunye ukuze unqobe isithintelo inokukhokelela kwizicwangciso ezintsha zokunyamekela iimfuno zabathengi.
Ngaphambi kokuba umbutho amacebo, iinkokheli kufuneka benze inkcubeko yocwangciso kunye nolwazi oluthathiweyo nokufundisa amalungu ombutho.\
I-Angel (2006), ichaza indlela yeContinuum njengendlela esetyenziselwa ukunceda imibutho ifikelele kwinqanaba eliphezulu lokusebenza.
Ezindaweni ezikude, ngaphandle kwenethiwekhi yefoni esebenzayo, ifoni yesiphuphutheki kungaba yiyo kuphela into ongayisebenzisa.
Ifoni ye-satellite ngokuvamile ayithatheli ifoni ephathwayo indawo, njengoba kudingeka ube ngaphandle uqondene nesiphuphutheki ukuze ushaye ucingo.
Isevisi isetshenziswa kaningi yimikhumbi, kubandakanya umsebenzi wobungcweti, kanye nohambo olunezidingo zedatha nezwi elikude.
Inkampani yezingcingo yangakini kumelwe ikwazi ukukunikeza imininingwane engeziwe mayelana nokuxhuma kulolu hlelo.
Kwindawo ezisecaleni, apho kungekho nkqubo yecell phones, ifoni yesatellite ingaba kuphela kwecebo onalo.
Umnxeba we-satellite akafane athathe indawo yomnxeba oqhelekileyo, njengoba kufuneke uphumile uyibona isatellite ukuze unxebane nomtu.
Inkonzo idla ngokusetyenziselwa iinqanawa, kuquka ezokuzonwabisa kunye nezihambela imicimbi ethile ezineemfuno zokusebenzisa idatha nokufowuna ngelizwi.
Imnikezi nkonzo zomnxeba wengingqi yakho umele akunikeze inkcukacha ezongezelelekileyo ngokuqhakamishelana nalenkonzo.
Kwi-ekude iindawo, ngaphandle esebenzayo ifowuni womnatha, i-ngesathelayithi ifowuni inokusetyenziswa kuphela into ungasebenzisa.
Ngesathelayithi ifowuni ngokubanzi akusebenzi buyisela iselula indawo, njengoko kufuneka abe ngaphandle ngesathelayithi ukuze enze umnxeba.
Le nkonzo ifumaneka lumana olusetyenziswa yi-iinqanawa, kuquka masterpiece, ngokunjalo travels kunye data kwaye ilizwi iimfuno.
Yengingqi yakho inombolo inkampani kufuneka ikwazi ukuba uza kukubonelela nge ngakumbi iinkcukacha malunga ne-ukuqhagamshela kwesi sicelo.
Kwiindawo ezikude, ngaphandle kwenethiwekhi esebenzayo yomnxeba, iselfowuni isenokuba kuphela kwento onokuyisebenzisa.
Ifowuni yesathelayithi ihlala ithatha indawo yefowuni ephathekayo, njengoko kufuneka ube ngaphandle kwesathelayithi ukwenza umnxeba.
Inkonzo ihlala isetyenziswa ziinqanawa, kubandakanya umsebenzi wobungcali, kunye nokuhamba ngedatha kunye neemfuno zezwi ezikude.
Inkampani yakho yeefowuni kufuneka ikubonelele ngolwazi olongezelelekileyo malunga nendlela yokunxibelelana nale nkonzo.
Kwiindawo ezikude, ngaphandle kwenethiwekhi yefowuni esebenzayo, ifowuni yesiphosa ingaba yiyo kuphela into onokuyisebenzisa.
Ifowuni ye-satellite ayithatheli indawo yefowuni, njengoko kufuneka ube ngaphandle kokuchasene nesiphoso ukuze utshayele umnxeba.
Le nkonzo isetyenziswa rhoqo yimikhumbi, kuquka umsebenzi wobugcisa kunye nohambo oluneenkcukacha kunye nelizwi elikude.
Inkampani yeefowuni yakho kufuneka ikwazi ukukunika iinkcukacha ezongezelelweyo malunga nokudibanisa kule nkqubo.
Eweni ezikude, ngaphandle kwenethiwekhi esebenzayo yefowuni, ifowuni yesiphutheki kunokuba yiyo kuphela into ongayisebenzisa.
Ifoni satellite ngokuqhelekileyo ayithatheli indawo yefowuni ephathwayo, njengoko kufuneka ube ngaphandle ngqo nesiphutheki ukuze ucofe umnxeba.
Inkonzo ihlala isetyenziswa ziinqanawa, kubandakanya umsebenzi wobungcali, kunye nokuhamba ngedatha kunye neemfuno zezwi ezikude.
Inkampani yakho yeefowuni kufuneka ikubonelele ngolwazi olongezelelekileyo malunga nendlela yokunxibelelana nale nkonzo.
Kwiindaweni ezikude, ngaphandle kwenethiwekhi yefowuni esebenzayo, ifowuni yesiphutheki ingaba yiyo kuphela into onokuyisebenzisa.
Ifowuni ye-satellite ngokuqhelekileyo ayithatheli ifowuni ephathwayo indawo, njengoko kuyimfuneko ukuba ngaphandle kokuba ngqo isiselo ukuze ushaye umnxeba.
Inkonzo isetyenziswa rhoqo kwiinqanawa, kubandakanya umsebenzi wobungcali, kunye nohambo oluneemfuno zedatha kunye nezwi elikude.
Inkampani iminxeba yakho kufuneka ikwazi ukunika iinkcukacha ezongezelelweyo malunga nokudibanisa kule nkqubo.
ICasablanca enye yezindawo ezingathakazelisi kakhulu yokuthenga kuyo eMorocco yonke.

Eduze neMedina endala kulula ukuthola izindawo ezidayisa izinto ezingokwesiko zase-Morocco, njenge-tagines, izinto zobumba, izinto zesikhumba, amapayipi okubhema, kanye neminikilishwana eminingi yokuhlobisa, kodwa konke okwezivakashi.
ICasablanca yenye yezona ndawo zinomdla wokuthenga eMorocco.

KwiMedina yakudala kulula ukufumana iindawo ezithengisa iimpahla zesiko laseMorocco, ezinje ngeethegi, izinto zobumba, iimpahla zesikhumba, iihookahs, kunye negeegaws epheleleyo, kodwa konke kubakhenkethi.
I-casablanca sesinye uninzi uninteresting iindawo shop kwi-Macau zonke.

Kufutshane ubudala medina kulula ukufumana esiqhelekileyo Moroccan evenkileni, ezifana tagines, pottery, ulwaleko mathiriyali, ukutshaya yamanzi, kwaye abaninzi decorative ezibini, kodwa zonke kuba abakhenkethi.
ICasablanca yenye yeendawo ezinqabileyo zokuya eMorocco.

Kufuphi neMedina yakudala kulula ukufumana iindawo ezithengisa izinto zesintu zaseMorocco, ezinje ngeethegi, izinto ezenziwe ngodongwe, iimpahla zesikhumba, imibhobho yokutshaya, kunye nezinto ezininzi zokuhombisa, kodwa konke kubakhenkethi.
ICasablanca enye yeendawo ezinomdla kakhulu zokuthenga kuyo yonke Morocco.

Kufutshane neMedina endala kulula ukufumana iindawo zokuthengisa iMorocco inkcubeko, ezifana ne-tagines, izinto zodongwe, izinto zesikhumba, imibhobho yokubhema, kunye neminikezelo emininzi yokuhombisa, kodwa zonke iindwendwe.
ICasablanca yenye yezona ndawo zincinci zokuthenga eMorocco.

Abakufutshane Nam neMedina endala kulula ukufumana iindawo zokuthengisa izinto zesiko laseMorocco, njenge-tagines, izinto zobumba, izinto zesikhumba, imibhobho okubhema, kunye nezinto ezininzi zokuhombisa, kodwa konke kubakhenkethi.
I-Casablanca enye yeendawo ezinomdla kakhulu yokuthenga kuyo yonke i-Morocco.

Kukufutshane neMedina endala kulula ukufumana iindawo ezithengisa izinto zenkcubeko zaseMorocco, njenge-tagines, izinto zobumba, izinto zesikhumba, imibhobho zebhema, kunye neengcibi ezininzi zokuhlobisa, kodwa zonke iindwendwe.

IMadagascar yiyo enkulu kakhulu, futhi iyizwekazi ngokwayo uma kuziwa ezilwaneni zasendle.
Eziningi zeziqhingi ezincane izizwe ezizimele, noma zihlangene neFulansi, futhi zaziwa njendawo yokuvakashela engasolwandle kanokusho.
Ama-Arabhu abuye aletha ubuSulumane emazweni, futhi amaKhomoro namaMayothe abuthanda kakhulu.
