Izihambi ezihamba ngemikhumbi ezihlele ukushintsha ubulili bazo ngokuhlinzwa phesheya kwezilwandle kumelwe ziqinisekise ukuthi ziphethe amaphepha afanele ohambo lokubuya.
Ukuvuma kohulumeni ukuthi anikeze abantu amaphasiphothiangavezi ubulili (X) noma amaphepha abuyekeziwe ukuthi afane negama elithandwayo kanye nokuhluka kobulili.
Ukuzimisela kohulumeni bangaphandle ukuhlonipha lamaphepha kungokuguquguqukayo.
Ukusesha ezindaweni zokuhlola sekube okuxhantelayo kakhulu enkathini yangemva kuka-2001, Septemba 11.
Abantu abazohlinzwa ukuze bashintshe ubulili babo akufanele balindele ukuthi bazodlula kumasikena ngobumfihlo babo nangesithunzi sabo sisaqinile.
Abahambi abaceba utyando lokutshintsha isini bekwamanye amazwe bamele baqinisekise ukuba baphethe amaxwebhu afanelekileyo xa bebuyela emva.
Kuyahluka ukulungela koorhulumente ukunikezela ngeepasipothi ezingachazwanga isini (X) okanye amaxwebhu ahlaziyiweyo ukuze ahambelane negama kunye nesini esiza kukhethwa.
Ukufuna kwabanye orhulumente bangaphandle ukuhlonipha le miqulu kuyaxhomekeka ngokokwahlukahlukana.
Ukuseshwa kwiindawo zokukhangela zokhuseleko kuye kwaqiniswa kakhulu kwixesha elisemva kukaSeptemba 11, 2001.
Abantu abazitshintshe isini ngaphapi kokutyandwa abamele balindele ukugqitha kwizikena zingabondwanga izinto zabo eziyimfihlo baze bagqithe nesidima sabo.
Travelers abakhoyo ucwangciso ukutshintsha zabo ngesondo kwi overseas imisebenzi kufuneka iqinisekise ukuba babe ze urhuqe ilungelo amaxwebhu kuba kubuyela uhambo.
Oorhulumente ' admission ukubonelela abantu abaphila ngesondo passports (X) okanye igqityiwe namaphepha angama-ne ethandwa kakhulu igama ngokwesini umehluko.
I-ukukuthakazelela ka-langaphandle oorhulumente ukuba siyabahlonela ezi namaphepha angama-ngozinzo.
Ukukhangela kuzo laboratories zisuke kakhulu extravagant ka-ixesha emva 2001, ngoseptemba 11.
Abantu abo iya kuphengululwa ngokusesikweni surgery ukutshintsha zabo sexuality akufunekanga silindele ukuba baya kudlula ngokusebenzisa yabo yangasese kwaye isidima.
Abakhweli abaceba ukwenza utyando phesheya kolwandle kufuneka baqinisekise ukuba banamaxwebhu afanelekileyo okuhamba.
Ukuvunywa nguRhulumente ukukhupha iipasipoti ezingezizo ezesini (X) okanye amaxwebhu ahlaziyiweyo ukuthelekisa igama elidumileyo kunye neyantlukwano ngokwesini.
Ukuzimisela koorhulumente bamanye amazwe ukuba bahloniphe la maxwebhu kuyatshintsha.
Ukukhangela kukhange ngakumbi kwixesha ukususela ngo-2001, Septemba 11.
Abantu abenziwa utyando lokutshintsha isini sabo akufuneki balindele ukuba baya kujongana nemfihlo kunye nesidima sabo.
Abahambi abahamba ngeenqanawa abacwangcisiweyo ukutshintsha isondo sabo ngokuhlinzwa phesheya kwezilwandle kufuneka baqinisekise ukuba ziphethe amaphepha afanelekileyo ohambo lokubuya.
Ukuvuma koorhulumente kukunika abantu iipasphothi ezingavezi ngesondo (X) okanye amaphepha abuyekeziwe ukuba afane negama elithandwayo kunye nokuhluka kwezesondo.
Ukuzimisela koorhulumente bangaphandle ukuhlonipha kwamaphepha kungokuguquguqukayo.
Ukukhangela kwiindawo zovavanyo kuye kwaba yinto enomtsalane kakhulu kwimihlaba yangemva kwama-2001, Septemba 11.
Abantu abaya kuhlinzwa ukuze batshintshe isondo sabo akufuneki balindele ukuba baya kudlula kumasikena ngobumfihlo babo nangesithunzi sabo siqinile.
Abahambi abahamba ngeenqanawa ukutshintsha ubulili babo ngokuhlinzwa phesheya kufuneka baqiniseke ukuba banamaphepha afanelekileyo okuhamba.
Ukuvuma oorhulumente ukunika abantu iipasipoti sex (X) okanye amaphepha ahlaziyiweyo ukuba afane negama elidumileyo kunye nokuhluka kwezesondo.
Ukuzimisela koorhulumente bamanye amazwe ukuhlonipha amaphepha kuyatshintsha.
Ukukhangela kwiindawo zokuhlola kuye kwaba nzima kakhulu kwixesha ukusukela ngo-2001, Septemba 11.
Abantu abinzwa ukutshintsha sex yabo akufanele balindele ukuba baya kudlula asikena ngobumfihlo babo kunye esithunzi sabo sisaqinile.
Iindwendwe ezihamba ngeenqanawa ezicwangcise ukutshintsha ngesondo kunye nokuhlinzwa phesheya kufuneka ziqinisekise ukuba ziphethe amaphepha afanelekileyo ohambo lokubuya.
Ukuvuma kukarhulumente ukuba anikeze abantu iiphasiphothiangavezi ngesondo (X) okanye amaphepha abuyekeziwe ukuba afane negama elithandwayo kunye nokuhluka kwezesondo.
Ukuzimisela korhulumente bangaphandle ukuhlonipha lamaphepha kungokuguquguqukayo.
Ukukhangela kwiindawo zokuhlola sele kuxhantela kakhulu kwithini yasemva kwe-2001, Septemba 11.
Abantu abaza kuhlinzwa ukuze batshintshe ubulili babo akufanele balindele ukuba baya kudlula kumasikena ngemfihlo yabo nangesithunzi sabo siqinile.
Amabhulogi angasiza abafundi ngokubhala. Nakuba abafundi kaningi baqala umsebenzi wabo wokubhuloga ngendlela yokubhala nokupela yobudlabha, ukuba khona kwezilaleli kaningi kuyakushintsha lokho.
Njengoba abafundi ngokuvamile bayizilaleli ezigxeka kakhulu, umbhali webhulogi uqala ukulwela ukuthuthukisa ukubhala ukuze akweme ukugxekwa.

Futhi ukubhuloga "kuphoqa abafundi ukuba babenokuqonda kakhudlwana ngezwe elibazungezile." Isidingo sokondla isithakazelo sabantu abafundayo kushukumisa abafundi ukuba bahlakaniphe futhi bathakazelise (Toto, 2004).
Ukubhuloga ithuluzi elikhuthaza ukubambisana, futhi likhuthaza abafundi ukuba bangagcini ngokufunda osukwini lwesikole oluvamile.

Indlela efanele yokusebenzisa amabhulogi “inganika abafundi amandla okuba abahlakahlayo nabahlolisisayo kakhudlwana; abafundi bangachaza izikhundla zabo ngomongo wemibhalo yabanye kanye nokusho imibono yabo ngezindaba ezithile (Oravec, 2002).

Ii-blog zinokunceda ukuphucula ukubhala kwabafundi. Nangona abafundi besoloko besiza namava abo e-blog anegrama engatshongo khona, kunye nokungakwazi ukubhala amagama achanileyo, ukuba kwabantu abazakukufunda oko, kudla ngokuyitshintsha loo nto.
Kuba abafundi bahlala bengabaphulaphuli abanento yokuthetha, umbhali webhlogi uqalisa ukusebenzela ukuphucula indlela yokubhala ukuze aphephe ukugxekwa.

Kwakhona ukubhloga "kunyanzela abafundi ukuba babe nolwazi ngakumbi malunga nehlabathi elibangqongileyo." Isidingo sokondla umdla wabaphulaphuli siyabakhuthaza abafundi ukuba babe nobukrelekrele kwaye banomdla (Toto, 2004).
Ukubhloga sisixhobo esikhuthaza intsebenziswano, kwaye kukhuthaza abafundi ukuba bandise ukufunda nangaphaya kwesiko lesiqhelo leskolo.

Ukusetyenziswa ngokufanelekileyo kweeblogi "kunokuxhobisa abafundi ukuba babe nohlalutyo ngakumbi kwaye bagxeke; ngokuphendula ngenkuthalo kwizixhobo ze-Intanethi, abafundi banokuchaza isikhundla sabo kwimeko yemibhalo yabanye kunye nokuchaza ezabo izimvo kwimicimbi ethile (Oravec, 2002).

Blogs unako ukunceda abafundi ngokubhaliweyo. Nangona abafundi rhoqo begin zabo blogging umsebenzi kwi sloppy yokubhala iimboniselo zabucala, ababukeli bomdlalo bangene ke ubuso rhoqo utshintsho lonto.
Ukususela abafundi bamele rhoqo kakhulu kakhulu listeners, a hetalia umbhali uqalisa azame ukuphucula ukufunda ngoko ke njengoko ukuphepha criticism.
Kwaye blogging " imikhosi abafundi ukuba kufuneka ngakumbi ukuqonda ihlabathi jikelele kwabo."Kufuneka ukondla inzala ka-abafundi motivates abafundi ukuba abe clever kwaye umdla (Toto, 2004).
Blogging zenza isixhobo ukuba ikhuthaza intsebenziswano, kwaye ikhuthaza abafundi hayi kuphela nzulu kwi rhoqo esikolweni imini.

Efanelekileyo ukusebenzisa blogs "unako ukuxhobisa abafundi ukuba ibe ngaphezulu thorough kwaye thorough; abafundi banako zichaza izikhundla zabo kwimeko izibhalo abanye kwaye zichaziwe izimvo zabo kwimiba ethile subjects (Oravec, 2002).
Iiblogi zinokunceda abafundi ngokubhala. Nangona abafundi behlala beqala umsebenzi wabo wokubloga ngokungakhathali kunye nopelo, ubukho babaphulaphuli bahlala butshintsha loo nto.
Kuba abafundi bahlala bengabaphulaphuli ababaluleke kakhulu, ibhlogger iqala ukuzama ukuzama ukuphucula ukubhala ukuze kuthintelwe ukugxekwa.

Kwaye ukubhloga "kunyanzela abafundi ukuba babenolwazi ngakumbi ngehlabathi elibajikelezileyo." Isidingo sokukhulisa umdla wabafundi sikhuthaza abafundi ukuba babe banengqiqo kwaye babe nomdla (Toto, 2004).
Ukubhloga sisixhobo esikhuthaza intsebenziswano, kwaye sikhuthaza abafundi ukuba benze okungaphezulu kokufunda nje kusuku lwesikolo oluqhelekileyo.

Ukusetyenziswa ngokuchanekileyo kweeblogi “kunokunika abafundi amandla okuba ndlongondlongo kwaye bagxeke; abafundi banokuchaza izikhundla zabo kwimeko yemibhalo yabanye kwaye baveze izimvo zabo kwimiba ethile (Oravec, 2002).
Iiblogi zinokunceda abafundi ukubhala. Nangona abafundi bahlala beqalisa umsebenzi wabo wokubhloga ngendlela yokubhala nokupela kwentlabathi, ukuba kubekho abaphulaphuli bahlala batshintsha oko.
Ekubeni abafundi badla ngokuba ngabaphulaphuli abagxeka kakhulu, umbhali weblog uqala ukulwela ukuphucula ukubhala ukuphepha inkxaso.

Kwaye ukubhloga "kunyanzelisa abafundi ukuba babenokuqonda ngakumbi kwilizwe elijikelezileyo." Imfuno yokondla umdla wabantu abafundayo kukushukumisa abafundi ukuba banobulumko kwaye banomdla (Toto, 2004).
Ukubhloga isixhobo esikhuthaza intsebenziswano, kwaye sikhuthaza abafundi ukuba bangaphelelanga ngokufunda kwimini yesikolo eqhelekileyo.

Indlela efanelekileyo yokusebenzisa iiblogi “inganika abafundi igunya lokuba ngabahlakahlayo nabahlolisisayo ngakumbi; abafundi banokuchaza izikhundla zabo ngomxholo wamaxwebhu kunye nokutsho iingcamango zabo ngeendaba ezithile (Oravec, 2002).
Iiblogi zinokunceda abafundi ngokubhala. Nangona abafundi bahlala beqala umsebenzi wabo wokubhuloga ngendlela yokubhala kunye nopelo, ubukho babaphulaphuli bahlala butshintsha loo nto.
Njengoko abafundi ngokuqhelekileyo abaphulaphuli abagxeka kakhulu, umbhali webhulogi uqala ukulwela ukuphucula ukubhala ukuze akweme ukugxekwa.
Kwaye ukubhloga "kunyanzela abafundi ukuba babenolwazi ngakumbi ngehlabathi elibajikelezileyo". Kufuneka ondla umdla kubantu abafundayo ukumisa abafundi ukuba banengqiqo kwaye banomdla (Toto, 2004).
Ukubhloga sisixhobo esikhuthaza intsebenziswano, kwaye kukhuthaza abafundi ukuba bangayigcina ngokufunda ngosuku oluqhelekileyo lwesikolo.

Indlela efanelekileyo yokusebenzisa iibhlogi "inokunika abafundi amandla okuba ndlongondlongo kwaye bagxeke; abafundi banokuchaza izikhundla zabo kwimeko yemibhalo yabanye kwaye baveze izimvo zabo kwimiba ethile (Oravec, 2002).
Iiblogi zinokukunceda abafundi ngokubhala. Nangona abafundi rhoqo baqala umsebenzi wabo wokubhuloga ngendlela yokubhala nokupela okubhaliweyo, ukuba khona kwabaphulaphuli rhoqo kuyatshintsha oko.
Njengoko abafundi ngokuqhelekileyo babaphulaphuli abagxekayo kakhulu, umlobi weblogi uqala ukulwela ukuphucula ukubhala ukuze kume ukugxekwa.
Kwaye ukubhuloga "kunyanzelisa abafundi ukuba babenokuqonda ngakumbingezwe elijikelezeyo." Imfuneko yokucamngca umdla wabantu abafundayo kushukumisa abafundi ukuba ulumke kwaye banomdla (Toto, 2004).
Isixhobo sokubhuloga sikhuthaza intsebenziswano, kwaye sikhuthaza abafundi ukuba bangagcini ngokufunda kwimini yesikolo eqhelekileyo.

Indlela efanelekileyo yokusebenzisa iiblogi “inganika abafundi amandla okuba sikhokelo kunye nabahlolisisa ngakumbi; abafundi banokuyichaza izikhundla zabo ngomxholo wabanye kunye nokuthetha izimvo zabo kwiindaba ezithile (Oravec, 2002).
Kunezindlela eziningi zokuhlanza amanzi, ezinye ezisebenza kakhulu ngaphansi kwezimo ezithile eziwusongo.
Kwezinye izindawo ukubilisa amanzi umzuzu kwanele, kwezinye kudingeka imizuzu eminingana.
Izihlungi ziyahluka ngempumelelo, uma ungaba nokukhathazeka, kumelwe ucabangele ukuthenga amanzi wakho ebhodleni elivaliwe enkampanini ethenjwayo.
Zinintsi indlela zokucoca manzi, ezinye zisebenza kakhulu ukususa okuxhalabisayo okucacileyo.
Kwezinye iindawo ukubilisa amanzi kangangomzuzu kwanele, ngoxa kwezinye ukuwabilisa kangangemizuzu emininzi kufuneka.
Izihluzi ziyashiyana ukusebenza kwazo, ukuba unokungaqondi, kumele ucinge ngokuzithengela amanzi akho akwibhotile evalekileyo yenkampani ethembakeleyo.
Kukho inani amanzi purifiers, abanye zokusebenza ngokugqithisileyo phantsi ezithile threatening iimeko.
Kwezinye iindawo boil amanzi kuba ngomzuzu ngu ngokwaneleyo, kwezinye kuyimfuneko eziliqela imizuzu.
I-amacebo okucoca vary ngempumelelo, ukuba uyakwazi ukuba anxiety,kufuneka iqwalasele bethenga yakho yamanzi esuka yenziwe inkampani luvaliwe.
Zininzi iindlela zokucoca amanzi, ezinye zazo zisebenza ngakumbi phantsi kweemeko ezithile ezisongelayo.
Kwezinye iindawo amanzi abilayo ngomzuzu anele, kwezinye kuthatha imizuzu eliqela.
Iifilitha ziyahluka ngokubanzi, ukuba unayo nayiphi na inkxalabo, kuya kufuneka ucinge ngokuthenga amanzi akho asebhotileni kwinkampani eyaziwayo.
Kukho iindlela ezininzi zokucoca amanzi, ezinye ezisebenza kakhulu phantsi kweemeko ezithile ezisongozo.
Kwezinye iindawo ukubilisa amanzi umzuzu kwanele, kwezinye kufuneka imizuzu emininzi.
Izihlungi ziyahluka ngempumelelo, ukuba unokuba nexhala, kufuneka uqwalasele ukuthenga amanzi akho ebhodleni elivaliweyo kwinkampani ethenjwayo.
Kukho iindlela ezininzi zokucoca amanzi, ezinye ezisebenza kakhulu phantsi kweemeko ezithile ezisongelayo.
Kwezinye iindawo amanzi abilayo ngomzuzu anele, kwezinye kufuneka imizuzu eliqela.
I-Filter iyahluka ngempumelelo, ukuba unokuba nexhala, kufuneka ucinge ukuthenga amanzi akho asebhotileni kwinkampani eyaziwayo.
Kukho iindlela ezininzi zokucoca amanzi, ezinye ezisebenza kakhulu phantsi kweemeko ezithile ezisongo.
Kwezinye iindawo ukubilisa amanzi umzuzu kwanele, kwezinye kufuneka imizuzu eminingana.
Uluhlu luyahluka ngempumelelo, ukuba unokuba nexhala, kufuneka uqwalasele ukuthenga amanzi wakho kwibhodleni elivaliwe kwinkampani ethenjwayo.
Kuhlanganiswe nokungafinyeleleki kuyo kalula, "iTimbuktu" seyisetshenziswa njengesingathekiso samazwe angajwayelekile, akude.
Namuhla, iTimbuktu idolobha eliphundlekile, nakuba idumela lalo lilenza lithandwe izivakashi, futhi linesikhumulo sezindiza.
Ngo-1990, yafakwa ohlwini lwezindawo zefa lomhlaba ezisengozini, ngenxa yosongo lwesihlabathi sasohlane.
Kwakungenye yezindawo zokuma phakathi nohlelo lwePBs lukaHenry Louis Gates lweZimangaliso Zezwe lase-Afrika.
Idolobha lihlukile ngokuphelele kwamanye amadolobha ezwe, ngoba linomoya wase-Arabhiya kakhulu ukudlula owaseAfrika.
Idityaniswe nokungafikeleleki kwayo, "iTimbuktu" sele isetyenzisiwe njengomzekeliso kumazwe akude, kude.
Namhlanje, iTimbuktu yidolophu ehlwempuzekileyo, nangona igama layo liyenza ibe ngumtsalane kubakhenkethi, kwaye inesikhululo seenqwelomoya.
Ngo-1990, yafakwa kuluhlu lweendawo zenkcubeko yomhlaba ezisengozi, ngenxa yesanti yasentlango.
Yayiyenye yeendawo zokumisa eziphambili ngexesha likaHenry Louis Gates 'PBS Izimanga ezizodwa zeLizwe laseAfrika.
Esi sixeko asivumelani tu kunye nezinye izixeko zelizwe, kuba sona sinobuArabhu kakhulu kunokuba nobuAfrika.
Zidibene kunye ayinikezeleki ufikelelo, "i-timbuktu" sele kuba metaphor kuba unfamiliar, distant amazwe.
Namhlanje, i-timbuktu ngu imingcwabo yabantu abaziindwayi Isixeko, nangona yayo reputation lenza ethandwa kakhulu kunye abakhenkethi, kwaye ingaba i-airport.
Ngowe-1990, kwaba ezidweliswe njengoko endangered ilizwe amafa, enkosi threat ka-entlango intlabathi.
Kwaba lelinye misa ngexesha Henry Louis Amasango ke PBS lwenkqubo ye-Afrika nemimangaliso.
Isixeko ufumana kunzima ukusebenza ngokupheleleyo ezahlukeneyo ezivela kwezinye izixeko lizwe, kuba oko sele i-Arabian umoya kude kune ukuba e-Afrika.
Idityaniswe nokungafikeleleki kwayo, "iTimbuktu" ngoku isetyenziswa njengesikweko kumazwe angaqhelekanga, akude.
Namhlanje, iTimbuktu sisixeko esingenanto, nangona igama laso liyenza ithandwe ngabakhenkethi, kwaye inesikhululo seenqwelomoya.
Ngo-1990, yayidweliswa njengendawo esengozini yokufa komhlaba, ngenxa yesoyikiso yesanti yentlango.
Kwakuyenye yeendawo zokumisa ngexesha lenkqubo ye-PBs ka-Henry Louis Gates ye-Wonders of Africa.
Isixeko sahluke kakhulu kwezinye izixeko zeli lizwe, kuba sinomoya weArabhu ongaphezulu kunowaseAfrika.
Zidityaniswe nokungafikeleleki ngokulula, "i-Timbuktu" isetyenziswa njengesingathekiso samazwe ngamazwe, akude.
Namhlanje, iTimbuktu yidolophu ekhoyo, nangona igama layo lenza lithandwe ngabakhenkethi, kwaye linesikhululo seenqwelo-moya.
Ngo-1990, yafakwa kuluhlu lweendawo zelifa lomhlaba ezisengozini, ngenxa yosongelo lwentlabathi yasentlango.
Kwakungenye yeendawo zokuma ngexesha lePBs yeHenry Louis Gates yeZimanga ze-Afrika.
Le dolophu yahlukile ngokupheleleyo kwezinye izixeko zelizwe, kuba inomoya waseArabhiya kakhulu ukodlula eAfrika.
Kuhlanganiswe nokungafikeleleki kwayo, "iTimbuktu" sele isetyenziswa njengesikweko kumazwe angaqhelekanga, akude.
Namhlanje, iTimbuktu sisixeko esingenanto, nangona igama laso liyenza ithandwe ngabakhenkethi, kwaye inesikhululo seenqwelomoya.
Ngo-1990, yafakwa kuluhlu lweefa lomhlaba ezisengozini, ngenxa yesongo yesanti sasohlane.
Kwakuyenye yeendawo zokumisa ngexesha lenkqubo ye-PBs ka-Henry Louis Gates yeZimangaliso zeAfrika.
Isixeko sahluke kakhulu kwezinye izixeko zeli lizwe, kuba sinomoya weArabhu ongaphezulu kunowaseAfrika.
Idibene nokungafikeleleki kuyo ngokulula, "iTimbuktu" isetyenziswe njengesingathekiso samazwe angaqhelekanga, akude.
Namhlanje, iTimbuktu isixeko esinqabileyo, nangona igama lalo lilenza lilindwe abakhenkethi, kwaye lisikhumulo sezindiza.
Ngo-1990, yafakwa kuluhlu lweendawo zelifa lehlabathi ezisengozini, ngenxa yosongo lwehlabathi lwasontlango.
Kwakunye yeendawo zokuma phakathi neprogram ye-PBs ye-Henry Louis Gates yeZimangaliso zelizwe lase-Afrika.
Isixeko sihluke ngokupheleleyo kwezinye izixeko zehlabathi, kuba linomoya waseArabhiya kakhulu ukudlula eAfrika.
Ngaphandle emahlathini, kunzima ngesilwane esinesimiso sokugaya ukudla esifana nesabantu ukwanelisa imfuneko yaso yama-amino-acid ngezitshalo ezikhona.
Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukuhluleka ukwenza kanjalo kunemiphumela emibi kakhulu: ukungakhuli kahle, ukungondleki, kanye nokufa ngaphambi kwesikhathi.
Imithombo yezitshalo etholakala kalula ngabe ngamaprotheni atholakala emaqabungeni nasezindimeni, kepha lezi zilukhuni kohlobo lokuqala njengathi ukugaya ngaphandle kokuthi luphekwe.
Ngokuphambene, ukudla kwezilwane (izintuthwane, umuhlwa, amaqanda) akugayeki kalula nje kuphela, kodwa kunikeza amaphrotheni asezingeni eliphezulu anama-amino acid adingekayo.
Lapho zonke izinto sezicatshangelwe, akumelwe simangale uma okhokho bethu bazixazululela bona “inkinga yamaphrotheni“ ngendlela ecishe ifane neyezimfene ethafeni namuhla.
Kwindawo engamathafa, kunzima kunzima ngomntu Ukuba abekise iimfuno zakhe ze-amino-acid esebenzisa izityalo ezikhoyo.
Ngapha koko, ekwenzeni njalo kunemiphumo emibi: ukukhula koxinzelelo, ukungondleki, kunye nokufa ekugqibeleni.

Ezona zinto zifumaneka lula eziluncedo kwizityalo ziprotheyini ezifumaneka kumagqabi nakwii-legume, kodwa izinto okanye abantu abazityayo kunzima ukuba zicolwe yinkqubo yokucola yazo ngaphandle kokuba ziphekwe.
Kwelinye icala, ukutya kwezilwanyane (iimbhovane, iintubi, amaqanda) kulula ukwehla, kwaye kuneezakhamzimbha zenqanaba eliphezulu eziphilisayo ezinazo zonke ii-amino acids.
Zonke izinto eziqwalaselweyo, akufuneki simangaliswe kukuba ookhokho bethu bayisombulule "ingxaki yeprotheyini" yabo ngendlela efanayo neetshimpi ezisentlango namhlanje.
Ngaphandle forests, kunzima kuba i-yezilwanyana kunye efanayo oluntu digestive system ukuba yanelisa yayo amino-acid yokuba zilawulwe kuba izityalo ezikhoyo.
Ngaphaya koko, ukungaphumeleli ukwenza njalo sele ezinzima zoko: amahlwempu ukukhula, malnutrition, kwaye premature ukufa.

Isityalo imithombo ukuba ingaba afumaneka ngokuzenzekela ezikhoyo ibizakuba protein zifunyanwa emagqabini kwaye passages, kodwa aba ngabo njengoko kunzima wokuqala ke ngoko njengoko sisebenzisa kuba grinding ngaphandle kokuba ephekiweyo.
Kwi-umahluko, ukondla izilwanyana (iimbovane, termites, amaqanda) hayi kuphela lula digested, kodwa inika high-umgangatho proteins kunye kuyimfuneko amino acids.
Xa zonke izinto ezicingelwa, simele hayi kuba surprised ukuba zethu ancestors isonjululwe i - "protein ingxaki" kwi-indlela phantse efanayo ukuba oko chimpanzees ngendlela ecacileyo namhlanje.
Ngaphandle kwehlathi, kunzima ukuba isilwanyana esine-digestive system sifane nabantu ukuhlangabezana neemfuno ze-amino-acid kunye nezityalo ezikhoyo.
Ukongeza, ukusilela ukwenza oko kunemiphumo emibi: ukungondleki, ukungondleki, kunye nokufa ngaphambi kwexesha.
Eyona mithombo yezityalo ifumaneka ngokulula ziiprotheyini ezifumaneka emagqabini naseziqu, kodwa ezi zinzima kuhlobo lokuqala njengathi ukugaya ngaphandle kokupheka.
Ngokuchaseneyo, ukutya kwezilwanyana (iimbovane, iintubi, amaqanda) ayetyiswanga ngokulula, kodwa ikwabonelela ngeprotini ekumgangatho ophezulu kunye neeamino acid.
Xa konke kusenziwa, akufuneki simangaliswe ukuba ookhokho bethu basombulula "ingxaki yeprotein" ngendlela efanayo neenkawu ezisethafeni namhlanje.
Ngaphandle emahlathini, kunzima ngesilwanyana esinesimo sokugaya ukutya okufana nomntu ukwanelisa imfuneko yayo ye-amino-acid kwizityalo ezikhoyo.
Ukongezelela, ukusilela ukwenjenjalo kuneziphumo ezibi kakhulu: ukungakhuli kakuhle, ukungondleki, kunye nokufa ngaphambi kwexesha.
Imithombo yezityalo efumaneka lula ngelixa iprotheni ifumaneka kumaqanda nasezindimeni, kodwa ezi zilukhuni kuhlobo lokuqala njengathi ukugaya ngaphandle kokuba ziphekwe.
Ngokwahlukileyo koko, ukutya kwezilwanyana (iimbovane, umhlwa, amaqanda) akugayeki lula nje kuphela, kodwa kunika iiprotheni ezisemgangathweni ezine-amino acid ezifunekayo.
Xa zonke izinto ziye zaqwalaselwa, simele simangaliswe ukuba oobawo bethu bayasombululela bona “ingxaki yeeprotheni ezifanelekileyo ngendlela efana neendawo namhlanje.
Ngaphandle kwehlathi, kunzima ukuba isilwanyana esine-digestive system sifane nabantu ukuhlangabezana neemfuno ze-amino-acid kunye nezityalo ezikhoyo.
Ukongezelela, ukuhluleka ukwenza oko kunemiphumo emibi: Ukungakhuli kakuhle, ukungondleki, kunye nokufa ngaphambi kwexesha.
Imithombo yezityalo ifumaneka ngokulula ziiprotheyini ezifumaneka emagqabini naseziqu, kodwa ezi zinzima kuhlobo lokuqala njengathi ukugaya ngaphandle kokupheka.
Ngokuchasene noko, ukutya kwezilwanyana (iimbovane, iintubi, amaqanda) ayicoleki lula, kodwa ikwabonelela ngeprotini ekumgangatho ophezulu kunye neeamino acid.
Zonke izinto ziqwalaselwe, akufuneki simangaliswe ukuba ookhokho bethu basombulula "ingxaki yeprotein" ngendlela efanayo neenkawu ezisethafeni namhlanje.
Ngaphandle kwamahlathi, kunzima ngesilwanyana esinomgaqo wokugaya ukutya afana nesabantu ukwanelisa imfuneko yaso ye-amino-acid kunye nezityalo ezikhoyo.
Ukongeza, ukungaphumeleli ukwenza njalo kunemiphumo emibi kakhulu: ukungakhuli kakuhle, ukungondleki, kunye nokufa ngaphambi kwexesha.
Imithombo yezityalo efumaneka lula nokuba ngamaprotheni afumaneka emaqabungeni nasezindimeni, kodwa ezi lukhuni kohlobo lokuqala njengathi ukugaya ngaphandle kokuba luphekwe.
Ngokwahlukileyo, ukutya kwezilwanyana (izintuthwane, umhlwa, amaqanda) akugayeki ngokulula nje kuphela, kodwa kunika iiprotheni ezikumgangatho ophezulu kunye neamino acid ezifunekayo.
Xa zonke izinto zicatshangelwe, akumangalisi ukuba ookhokho bethu bazisombulula bona “ingxaki yeeprotheni“ ngendlela ephantse ifane nemfene ethafeni namhlanje.
I-Singapore ngokuvamile iyindawo ephephile kakhulu ukuba kuyo kanye nokulula ukuhamba kuyo, futhi ungakwazi ukuthenga cishe noma yini ngemva kokufika.

Uma ubekwe “emazweni aphezulu anokushisa okukhulu” amadigiliyi ambalwa nje enyakatho nenkabazwe kuzodingeka ubhekane nokushisa (njalo) kanye nelanga elishisa kakhulu (lapho libalele, okungavamisanga ukwenzeka).
ISingapore, yindawo ekhuselekileyo ngokuqhelekileyo yaye kulula ukuhamba kuyo, kwaye unako nokuthenga phantse nantoni na emva kokufika kwakho.

Kodwa ukubekwa ("kwindawo ezitshisayo" kumaqondo nje amancinci kumntla we-equator kuya kufuneka uqhelane kunye nobushushu (rhoqo) nengqatsini yelanga (xa isibhakabhaka sicwengile, nto ley enqabileyo).
Singapore iqhele i-safest ndawo ukuba bahambe kunye easiest, kwaye uyakwazi ukuthenga phantse nantoni na emva arrival.
Ukuba wabeka kwi - "high-ubushushu amazwe" nje ezimbalwa amaqondo emntla hemisphere kuza kufuneka ibandakanye ubushushu (yithi rhoqo) kwaye kakhulu zinokuphathwa sun (kwi-sunny, unusual i-sunshine).
ISingapore ngokubanzi yindawo ekhuselekileyo yokuhamba kwaye kulula ukuhamba, kwaye ungathenga phantse nantoni na xa ufika.

Ukuba ubekwe “kumaqondo obushushu aphezulu” nje kwiidigri ezimbalwa kumantla eikhweyitha kuya kufuneka ujongane nobushushu (rhoqo) kunye nelanga elishushu kakhulu (xa kushushu, nto leyo kunqabileyo ukuba yenzeke).
I-Singapore idla ngokuba yindawo ekhuselekileyo ukuba kuyo kunye nokulula ukuhamba kuyo, kwaye unako ukuthenga phantse nantoni na emva kokufika.

Xa ubekwe “amazwe aphezulu anobushushu obukhulu” ezimbalwa nje emantla kunye nenkabazwe kuya kufuneka ujongane nobushushu (njalo) kunye nelanga elitshisa kakhulu (xa libalele, elingavamisanga ukwenzeka).
I-Singapore yeyona ndawo ikhuselekileyo onokuhamba kuyo kwaye yeyona ndlela ilula yokuhamba, kwaye ungathenga nantoni na xa ufika.

Ukuba ubekwe "kumaqondo obushushu aphezulu" nje kwiidigri ezimbalwa kumantla weIkhweyitha kuya kufuneka ujongane nobushushu (rhoqo) kunye nelanga elishushu kakhulu (xa libalele, nto leyo kunqabileyo ukwenzeka).
I-Singapore ngokuqhelekileyo yindawo ekhuselekileyo kakhulu ukuba kuyo kunye nokulula ukuhamba kuyo, kwaye unako ukuthenga malunga nantoni na emva kokufika.

Ukuba ubekwe “kwizinga eliphezulu lobushushu” iidigiliyi ezimbalwa nje ngasentla nenkabazwe kuya kufuneka ukuba ujongane nobushushu (njalo) kunye nelanga elishushu kakhulu (lapho ilanga, engavanga ukwenzeka).
Ukuphazamiseka kokulala inqubo yokuvuka ngenhloso phakathi nesikhathi sakho sokulala esivamile nokuzumeka futhi ngokushesha ngemva kwalokho (imizuzu engu-10–60).
Lokhu kungenziwa kalula ngokusebenzisa iwashi elikhalayo elikhalela phansi uma kulinganiswa ukuze likusangulukise ngaphandle kokukuphaphamisa ngokugcwele.
Uma uzithola usetha kabusha iwashi ube ulele lapho uphethwe ubuthongo, lingabekwa kolunye uhlangothi lwekamelo, okukuphoqa ukuba uphume embhedeni ukuze ulicime.

Ezinye izindlela ezisekelwe emjikelezweni ongokwemvelo zihlanganisa ukuphuza uketshezi oluningi (ikakhulukazi amanzi noma itiye, umuthi ochamisayo owaziwayo) ngaphambi kokulala, okuphoqa umuntu ukuba avuke ayochama.
Ukuphamzamiseka kokulala yindlela yokuphaphama nngethuba lakho lokulala oluqhelekileyo uphinde ulale ngokukhawuleza emizuzwini eyi (10-60 ).
Oku kunokwenziwa ngokulula ngokusebenzisa iwotshi ye-alamu ethe cwaka ukuzisa ezingqondweni ngaphandle kokukuvusa ngokupheleleyo.
Ukuba ufumanisa ukuba umane ulicima ixesha xa likuvusa, inokubekwa kwelinye icala leumbi, inyanzelise ukuba uphume ebhedini ukuze uyicime.

Ezinye i biorhythm-based options ziquka ukusela amanzi kakhulu (ikakhulu amanzi okanye iti, eyaziwa nje ngeyeza lokhama amanzi emzimbeni) phambi kokulala, inyanzelise ukuba ubani aphakame aye kuchama.
Kulala isiphithiphithi intentional waking nkqubo ngexesha yakho yesiqhelo kulala ixesha kulala kwaye kamsinya emva koko (10-60 imizuzu).
Oku kungenziwa lula ngokusebenzisa a ringing alarm ikloko kwi-komlinganiselo ukukuthobela yakho senses ngaphandle ngokupheleleyo awakening kuwe.
Ukuba ufuna ukufumana ngokwakho resetting iwotshi ngexesha iyalalaprocess status ngexesha kulala, kunokwenzeka wabeka kwelinye icala igumbi, forcing ufuna ukufumana ngaphandle umandlalo ukuba yicime.

Ezinye iindlela ngokusekelwe Yendalo Iyajikeleza ziquka ethabatha plenty ka-liquids (ingakumbi amanzi okanye iti, a kakuhle-ezaziwayo prescription) phambi kokuya umandlalo, forcing umntu ukufumana ukuya kwi-urinate.
Ukuphazamiseka kokulala yinkqubo yokuvuka ngabom ngexesha lakho lokulala eliqhelekileyo kwaye ulale kwangoko emva koko (imizuzu eyi-10-60).
Oku kunokwenziwa ngokulula usebenzisa iwotshi ene-alam ephantsi ukulungelelanisa ivolumu ngaphandle kokukuvusa ngokupheleleyo.
Ukuba uzibona useta kwakhona iwotshi ngelixa ulele, inokubekwa kwelinye icala legumbi, inyanzelise ukuba uphume ebhedini uyicime.
Ezinye iindlela ezisekwe kwindalo zibandakanya ukusela amanzi amaninzi (ngakumbi amanzi okanye iti, into evuselelayo) ngexesha lokulala, ukunyanzela umntu ukuba aphakame aze achame.
Ukuphazamiseka kokulala inkqubo yovuko ngenjongo ngexesha lakho lokulala eliqhelekileyo kunye nokulungelelanisa ngokukhawuleza emva koko (imizuzu eyi-10–60).
Oku kungenziwa lula ngokusebenzisa iwotshi ekhalayo ekhalela phantsi xa ilinganiswa ukuze likude ngaphandle kokukuphakamisa ngokupheleleyo.
Ukuba ufumana useta kwakhona iwotshi ukuba ulele xa unyango ubuthongo, inokubekwa kwelinye icala igumbi, ukukuphaqa ukuba uphume ebhedeni ukuze ulicime.

Ezinye iindlela ezisekelwe kumjikelezo ongokwemvelo ziquka ukusela ulwelo oluninzi (ingakumbi amanzi okanye iti, iyeza elichamisayo elaziwayo-kakuhle) ngaphambi kokulala, ukunyanzela umntu ukuba avuke.
Ukuphazamiseka kokulala yinkqubo yokuvuka ngenjongo ngexesha lakho lokulala eliqhelekileyo kwaye ulale ngokukhawuleza emva (kwemizuzu eyi-10-60).
Oku kungenziwa lula ngokusebenzisa iwotshi alayo ephantsi xa kulinganiswa ukuze iphilise ngaphandle kokukuphamisa ngokupheleleyo.
Ukuba ufumana usetha kwakhona iwotshi ube ulele xa udidekile ubuthongo, inokubekwa kwelinye icala legumbi, okukuphoqa ukuba uphume esililini ukuze ulicime.
Ezinye iindlela ezisekwe kwindalo zibandakanya ukusela amanzi amaninzi (ngakumbi amanzi okanye iti, into evuselelayo) ngaphambi kokulala, ukunyanzela umntu ukuba aphakame aze achame.
Ukuphazamiseka kokulala inkqubo yokuvuka ngenjongo ngexesha lakho lokulala eliqhelekileyo kunye nokuxhomekeka ngokukhawuleza emva koko (imizuzu engu-10–60).
Oku kungenziwa ngokulula ngokusebenzisa iwashi elikhalayo elililela phantsi xa kulinganiswa ukuze likutsalele ngaphandle kokuphaphazela ngokupheleleyo.
Ukuba uzifumana usetha kwakhona iwotshi ube ulele xa ulala ubuthongo, lingabekwa kwelinye icala legumbi, enyanzelisa ukuba uphume ebhedini ukuze ulicime.
Ezinye iindlela ezisekelwe kwimijikelezo yendalo ziquka ukusela ulwelo oluninzi (ingakumbi amanzi okanye itye, umthi ochasayo owaziwayo) ngaphambi kokulala, okunyanzelisa umntu ukuba avuke ayochama.
Ukhari yisidlo esisuselwa kumakhambi nezinongo, kuhlanganiswe ndawonye mhlawumbe nenyama noma imifino.
Ukhari ungaba “manzi” noma “wome” kuya ngesikali samanzi.

Izindawo ezimaphakathi nezwe zaseNyakatho neNdiya nePakistan, i-yogathi ivamise ukusetshenziswa ezitshuliwni; eNingizimu neNdiya kanye nasezindaweni ezinye ezisogwini zezwekazi, ubisi lukakhukhunathi luvamise ukusetshenziswa.
Ikhari sisidlo esenziwe ngezipayisi kunye nemifuno eqhwethayo, kuze kufakwe inyama okanye imifuno eluhlaza.
I-Curry iyakwazi "ukoma" okanye "ibemanzi" ngokuxhomekeka kobuninzi bamanzi.

Kwimimandla ephakhathi yase India ekuMantla nase Pakistan, iyogathi ixhaphakile ukusetyenziswa kwizityu zekhari; Kwi India eseMazantsi nakunxweme lwekhontinent, ubisi lwekhokhonathi luxhaphakile ukusetyenziswa.
Curi ngu-a meal derived ukusuka herbs kwaye spices, zidibene kunye mhlawumbi kunye inyama okanye imifuno.
Curi kusenokuba "waterproof "okanye" eyomileyo" ukuba amanzi umlinganiselo.

Inland kwiindawo emntla e-India ne Pakistan, yogathi ngu commonly asetyenziswa sushi; kwi-e-afrika e-India ngokunjalo kwezinye engaselunxwemeni imimandla yelizwekazi, coconut ubisi ngu commonly kusetyenziswa.
I-Curry sisitya esisekwe kumayeza kunye neziqholo, sixutywe kunye nenyama okanye imifuno.
Ikhariji inokuba "manzi" okanye "yomile" kuxhomekeke kwinqanaba lamanzi.
Kumbindi waseIndiya nasePakistan, iyogathi idla ngokusetyenziswa kwiziqholo; kumazantsi eIndiya nakwezinye iindawo eziselunxwemeni zelizwekazi, ubisi lwekhokhonathi luqhele ukusetyenziswa.
Ukhari sisidlo esisekelwe kumakhambi nezinongo, zidityaniswe kunye mhlawumbi nenyama okanye imifuno.
Ukhari unokuba “manzi” okanye “wome” ukuya kwisikali samanzi.

Iindawo eziphakathi kwelizwe lase-North ne-Indiya ne-Pakistan, i-yogathi ivamise ukusetyenziswa kwizityuliwni; eMzantsi ne-Indiya nakwiindawo eziselunxwemeni zelizwekazi, ubisi lukakhukhunathi luvamise ukusetyenziswa.
I-Ukhari sisitya esisekwe kumayeza kunye nezinongo, sixutywe kunye nenyama okanye imifuno.
Ikhariji inokuba "manzi" okanye "yomile" kuxhomekeke kwinqanaba lamanzi.

Iindawo eziqeshwayo zeNyakatho neIndiya nasePakistan, yogathi amise ukusetyenziswa ezitshuliwni; eMzantsi India kunye neendawo ezinye eziselunxwemeni zelizwekazi, ubisi lwekhokhonathi luvamise ukusetyenziswa.
Ikhari yisidlo esisuselwa kwiikhambi kunye neemeko, kuhlanganiswa kunye mhlawumbi nenyama okanye imifuno.
Ukhari unokuba “manzi” okanye “wome” ukuya kwisikali samanzi.

Iindawo eziphakathi nelizwe laseNyakatho neIndiya nePakistan, i-yogathi ngokuqhelekileyo zisetyenziswa kwiintshungu; uMzantsi neIndiya kunye neendawo ezithile zentlupheko, ubisi lwekhukhunathi lusetyenziswa ngokubanzi.
Cishe wonke amakhompyutha asetshenziswayo namuhla asekelwe ekusebenziseni ukwaziswa okufakwayo endaweni ngezinombolo ezibhangqiwe.

Inombolo enziwe ngeziqu ezimbili ingaba nenani elilodwa kuphela kulawa amabili, okungukuthi u-0 noma u-1, futhi kubhekiselwa kulezinombolo ngokuthi amadijithi aneziqu ezimbili noma – noma ama-bit, uma kusetshenziswa ulimi lwasejele.
Ngokombono zonke ikhompyutha ezisetyenziswayo kulemihla zixhomekeke ekudlalisweni ngolwazi olukhowudwe ngohlobo lwamanani ebinary.
Inani eliyi-binary linganamanani amabini ukutsho oko 0 okanye 1, yaye la manani abizwa ngokuba zii-binary digits – okanye ii-bits xa zisetyenziswa kulwimi lokuquza ngeekhompyutha.
Enyanisweni zonke iikhompyutha kwi-sebenzisa namhlanje ingaba ngokusekelwe ukusebenzisa ekhaya na idata kunye idityanisiwe amanani.

Inani composed ezimbini amaphawu unakho kuphela kuba elinye ezimbini, umzekelo 0 okanye 1, kwaye ingaba ekuthethwe ngawo la amanani njengoko u-digits, okanye-okanye bit, ukuba entolongweni ulwimi lusetyenziswa.
Phantse zonke iikhompyuter ezisetyenzisiweyo namhlanje zisekwe ekusetyenzisweni kolwazi lokufaka ngababini.

Inani elinemivo emibini linokuba nelinye kula manani mabini, oko kukuthi u-0 okanye u-1, kwaye la manani kubhekiswa kuwo njengamanani aneedigri ezimbini okanye - okanye iibits, ukuba kusetyenziswa ulwimi lwentolongo.
Phantse zonke iikhompyutha ezisetyenziswayo namhlanje zisekelwe ekusebenziseni inkcazelo kwindawo ngeenombolo ezibhangqiweyo.

Inani elenziwe ngeziqinisekiso zimbini linokuba nexabiso elinye kuphela kula mabini, oko kukuthi i-0 okanye i-1, kwaye lisetyenziswa kwezi nombolo njengeedijithi ezimbini okanye - okanye i-bit, xa kusetyenziswa ulwimi lweentolongo.
Mhlawumbi zonke iikhompyuter ezisetyenzisiweyo namhlanje zisekwe ekusebenziseni ulwazi okufakwayo kwindawo ngeombolo ezibhangqiwe.

Inombolo eyenziwe ngeziqinisekiso ezimbini ingaba nenani elinye kuphela kula amabini, oko kukuthi u-0 okanye u-1, kwaye kubhekiselwa kulamanani ngokuthi amadijithi anegcwele ezimbini okanye-okanye i-bit, ukuba kusetyenziswa ulwimi lwentolongo.
Phantse zonke iikhompyutha ezisetyenziswayo namhlanje zisekelwe ekusebenziseni ukwaziswa okufakwayo kwindawo ngeenombolo ezibhangqiwe.

Inombolo eyenziwe ngeziqu ezibini ingaba nenani elinye kuphela kula mabini, oko kukuthi u-0 okanye u-1, kwaye kubhekiselwe kwinani elibizwa ngokuba ziidijithi ezineziqu okanye – okanye ii-bit, ukuba kusetyenziswa ulwimi lwasejele.
Noma ubani ozoshayela ezindaweni eziphakeme noma ngaphezu kwezintuba zezintaba kumelwe alindele ukuba khona kwesithwathwa, iqhwa, noma amakhaza ashubisa umkantsha.
Emigwaqweni eneqhwa kanye nomkhithiko, ukuhamba kuyabambezeleka futhi angeke ukwazi ukushayela njengalapho uhamba otiyeleni.
Uma kunomoya ohambisana neqhwa, kungawa iqhwa elanele elingakwenza ubhajwe ngesikhashana nje.
Ukubonakala kungavinjelwa ukuwa noma ukufuthwa kweqhwa noma noma ngomswakama noma iqhwa efasiteleni lemoto.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, izimo zeqhwa noma zesithwathwa zivamile emazweni amaningi, futhi izimoto zihamba ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka cishe unyaka wonke.
Nabani na ozakuqhuba kwiindawo eziphakemeyo okanye adlule ngapha kweentaba kumele acinge ngokubakho kwekhephu, iqabaka, amaqondo enza iliqhwa.
Kwiindlela ezineqabaka nekhephu, ukukhuhleka kuncinci kwaye awunakuqhuba ngokungathi ukwitha eze.
Ngesitshingitshane sengqele, ikhephu elanele ukukuxingisa lingawa ngexesha elincinci gqitha.
Ukubona indlela kungangabi kuhle ngenxa yokuwa kwekhephu okanye ukubhudla kwalo okanye ngenxa yokufuma okanye umkhence okwiifestile zemoto.
Kwelinye icala, iimeko zekhephu nomkhence ziqhelekile kumazwe amaninzi yaye ukuhamba kweemoto kuqhubeka ngokwesiqhelo ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka unyaka wonke.
Nabani na abaya drive phezulu okanye ngaphezu ntaba iphumeza kufuneka silindele ebusweni iqabaka yasemva, snow, okanye uqina yingqele.
Ngomhla we-snow-igqunywe ezitratweni kwaye snow, ehamba ngu foliso kwaye awukwazi drive njengoko ukuba awuqinisekanga, ehamba kwi-bitumen.
Ukuba kukho i-zezulu enxulumene ne-snow, ngokwaneleyo snow unako kuwa ukwenza ufumane stuck kwixesha elifutshane.
Inkangeleko kusenokuba prevented ekuweni okanye ebhudlayo okanye ukusuka ukufuma okanye snow kwi-window imoto.
Icy okanye iqabaka yasemva iimeko, kwesinye isandla, ingaba ngokufanayo emazweni amaninzi, kwaye iimoto ukuhamba ngaphandle disturbance kuba phantse unyaka.
Nabani na oqhuba kwiindawo eziphakamileyo okanye ngaphezulu kweentaba kufuneka alindele ubukho beqabaka, ikhephu, okanye amaqondo obushushu aqandayo.
Kwiindlela ezinekhephu nekhephu, ukuhamba kuyalibazisa kwaye usenokungakwazi ukuqhuba ngendlela obuya kuhamba ngayo kwitarmac.
Xa umoya uvuthuza ngekhephu elaneleyo, kunokubangela ikhephu elaneleyo ukuba liwe ngexesha elifutshane.
Inkangeleko inokuthintelwa ngokuwa okanye ukuvuthela ikhephu okanye ukufuma okanye ikhephu kwifestile yemoto.
Kwelinye icala, ikhephu okanye umkhenkce uxhaphakile kumazwe amaninzi, kwaye izithuthi zihamba kakuhle unyaka wonke.
Nabani na oya kuqhuba kwiindawo eziphakamileyo okanye ngaphezu kweentuba zeentaba kufuneka silindele ukuba kukho isithwathwa, ikhephu, okanye igqabi lokutshabalalisa intsha.
Kwisitalato esineekhephu kunye nomkhithiko, ukuhamba kuyabambezeleka kwaye akuyi kuba nako ukuqhuba njengoko uhamba ngeyelanga.
Ukuba kukho umoya ohambelana nekhephu, kungawa ikhephu elaneleyo elingakwenza ubanjwe ngexesha elifutshane.
Ukubonakala kungavinjelwa ukuwa okanye ukufuthwa kwekhephu okanye nokuba ngomswakama okanye ikhephu kwifestile yezithuthi.
Kwelinye icala, iimeko zekhephu okanye zekhephu ziqhelekile kumazwe amaninzi, kwaye iimoto zihamba ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka phantse unyaka wonke.
Nabani na oqhuba kwiindawo eziphakamileyo okanye ngaphezulu kweentaba kufuneka alindele ubukho beqabaka, ikhephu, okanye amaqondo obushushu aqandayo.
Izitrato ezinekhephu kunye nekhephu, ukuhamba kuyalibazisa kwaye awukwazi ukuqhuba njengoko uhamba nge-otiyeleni.
Xa kukho umoya ohambelana nekhephu, kunokuwa ikhephu elaneleyo enokukwenza ukuba zithathele okwethutyana.
Kubonakala kungavinjelwa ukuwa okanye uthwa ikhephu okanye ukufuma okanye ikhephu kwifestile yemoto.
Ngenxa yokuba icala, ikhephu okanye ikhephu ivamile kumazwe amaninzi, kwaye iimoto zihamba ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka phantse unyaka wonke.
Nabani na oya kuqhuba iindawo eziphakemeyo okanye ngaphezu kweentaba kufuneka alindele ukuba kuthwathwa, ikhephu, okanye makhaza ashubisa umkantsha.
Kwimigwaqweni enekhenkce kunye nekhithi, ukuhamba kuyabambezeleka kwaye angeke ukwazi ukuqhuba njengalapho uhamba ityuwa.
Ukuba kunomoya ohambelana nekhephu, kunokuwa ikhephu elaneleyo elinokwenza ubhajwe ngomzuzwana nje.
Ukubonakala kunokuvinjelwa ukuwa okanye ukufuthwa kweqhwa okanye ukufuma okanye ikhephu kwifestile yemoto.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, iimeko zekhephu okanye zesithwathwa ziqhelekileyo kumazwe amaninzi, kwaye iimoto zihamba ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka phantse unyaka wonke.
I-Inthanethi ihlanganisa izici zokukhulumisana kweningi nokokusebenzelana nabanye.
Izici ezihlukile ze-Inthanethi zaholela ebubanzini obengeziwe uma kukhulunywa ngendlela yokusebenzisa nokwaneliseka.
Ngokwesibonelo, "ukufunda" kanye "nokuzihlanganisa nomphakathi" kusikiselwa njengezisusa ezibalulekile zokusbenzisa i-Inthanethi (James et al., 1995).
"Ukuhlanganyela komuntu siqu" kanye "nobudlelwane obuqhubekayo" kubuywe kwavezwa njengezici ezintsha zesisusa ngu-Eighmey noMcCord (1998) lapho behlola indlela yokusabela yababukele amawebhusayithi.
I-Intanethi idibanisa ezizinto zombini kunye nobunxibelelwano phakathi kwabantu.
Indlela ezicacileyo zobume be internethi zikhokhela kwamanye amazinga ngokwendlela yokuyisebenzisa nesimbo sokwaneliseka.
Umzekelo, "ukufunda" kunye "nokunxibelelana nabanye" kucetyiswa njengezizathu ezibalulekileyo zokusetyenziswa kwe-Intanethi (UJames et al., 1995).
"Ukuzibandakanya" kunye "nobudlelwane obuqhubekayo" zichongiwe njengezinto ezintsha ezikhuthazayo ngu-Eighmey kunye noMcCord (1998) xa baphanda iimpendulo zabaphulaphuli kwiiwebhusayithi.
Kwi-Intanethi kuquka iimpawu-wonke unxibelelwano kwaye ubudlelwane kunye nabanye.
Ezahluka-imisebenzi ye-intanethi kukhokelele a ngokubanzi umqolo we Sebenzisa kwaye satisfaction.
Umzekelo, "ukufunda" kwaye "lwezentlalo Association" ingaba wacebisa ukuba njengoko vital motives kuba usebenzisa i-Intanethi (Yak et al., 1995).
"Personal inxaxheba "kwaye" waqhubeka association " watyhilwa njengoko entsha imiba zempembelelo yi-Eighmey kwaye McCord (1998) xa abo examined i-jikeleziso ka-onke ukuba websites.
I-Intanethi ibandakanya amanqaku onxibelelwano noluntu kunye nokunxibelelana.
Imiba eyahlukeneyo ye-Intanethi ikhokelele kububanzi obungakumbi xa kufikwa ekusebenziseni nasekuonelisekeni.
Umzekelo, "ukufunda" kunye "nokunxibelelana kwezentlalo" kucetyiswa njengezizathu ezibalulekileyo zokusebenzisa i-Intanethi (UJames et al., 1995).

"Uthethathethwano lobuqu" kunye "nobudlelwane obuqhubekayo" zaye zaqaqanjiswa njengezinto ezitsha ezikhuthazayo ngu-Eighmey noMcCord (1998) xa bejonga indlela abasabela ngayo kwiiwebhusayithi zababukeli.
I-Intanethi iquka iinkalo zokunxibelelana kweninzi kunye nokusebenzelana nabanye.
Iimpawu ezahlukileyo ze-Intanethi zikhokelela kubunzulu obongezelelweyo xa kuthethwa ngendlela yokusebenzisa nokwaneliseka.
Ngokomzekelo, "ukufunda" kunye "nokuzibandakanya noluntu" kucetyiswa njengezona njongo zibalulekileyo zokusebenzisa i-Intanethi (James et al., 1995).
"Inxaxheba yomntu siqu" kunye "ubudlelwane obuqhubekayo" kubuywe kwavezwa njengempawu ezintsha zesisusa ngu-Eighmey noMcCord (1998) xa bejonga indlela yokusabela kwabo babukele iiwebhusayithi.
I-Intanethi ibandakanya izinto zonxibelelwano noluntu kunye nokunxibelelana nabanye.
Iimpawu ezahlukeneyo ze-Intanethi zikhokelela kububanzi obungakumbi xa kukhulunywa ngendlela yokusebenzisa nokwaneliseka.
Umzekelo, "ukufunda" kunye "nokunxibelelana noluntu" kucetyiswa njengezikhuthazi ezibalulekileyo ekusebenziseni i-Intanethi (UJames et al., 1995).

"Ukuhlanganyela komntu siqu" kunye "nobudlelwane obuqhubekayo" zaye zaqaqanjiswa njengezinto ezintsha ezikhuthazayo ngu-Eighmey noMcCord (1998) xa bejonga indlela abasabela ngayo kwiwebhusayithi yababukeli.
I-Intanethi iquka iimpawu zonxibelelwano ezininzi kunye nokusebenzelana nabanye.
Iimpawu ezahlukeneyo ze-Intanethi zikhokelela kwibubanzi obungaphezulu xa kuthethwa ngendlela yokusebenzisa nokwaneliseka.
Ngokomzekelo, "ukufunda" kunye "nokudibanisa noluntu" kuqwalaselwe njengezisusa ezibalulekileyo zokusbenzisa Internet (James et al., 1995).
"Ukuzibandakanya kobuqu" kunye "ubudlelwane obuqhubekayo" buywe kwavezwa njengezici ezintsha zesisu ngu-Eighmey noMcCord (1998) xa bejonga indlela yokusabela yababukele iiwebhusayithi.
Ukudla kwaseMajorca, njengokwasezindaweni ezifanayo eMedithera, kusekelwe esikweni, imifino kanye nenyama (ingulube ikakhulukazi), futhi kusebenzisa amafutha omnqumo njalo.
Idina elilula elithandwayo, ikhakhulukazi phakathi nehlobo, yiPa amb Oli: Isinkwa namafutha omnqumo, utamatisi, kanye nanoma yiziphi izinongo ezikhona njengoshizi, inhlanzi ye-tuna, njalo njalo.
Ukutya komthonyama kwaseMarjoca, ngokufanayo nokutya kommandla waseMeditera, kuba nesonka, imifuno kunye nenyama (ingakumbi ihagu), yaye kufakwa ioli yomnquma.
Idinala exhaphakileyo neyaziwayo, ikakhulu ehlotyeni yi Pa amb Oli:Isonka esine-olive oil. itumato kunye naziphi na izinto ezihambelanayo njenegestshizi, i-tunafish, njalo njalo.
I-Majorca yezosondlo, ezifana ukusuka efanayo kwiindawo kwi-Mediterranean, lusekelwe tradition, imifuno, kwaye inyama (pork ingakumbi), kwaye yithi rhoqo isebenzisa gqabi-oli.

Elula sangokuhlwa oko kukuthi ethandwa kakhulu, ingakumbi ngexesha ehlotyeni, ngu umbhobho Ambi: isonka gqabi-oli, iitumato, kwaye nayiphi na spices ezikhoyo ezifana cheese, tuna intlanzi, njalo njalo.
I-Majorca cuisine, njengakwiindawo ezininzi zeMeditera, isekwe kwisithethe, imifuno kunye nenyama (ingulube ngokukodwa), kwaye isebenzisa ioyile yomnquma rhoqo.
Iqebengwana elithandwayo, ngakumbi ngexesha lasehlotyeni, yi Pa amb Oli: Isonka kunye neoyile ye-olive, iitumato, kunye nezinye iziqholo ezikhoyo ezinje ngeshizi, ityhuna, njalo njalo.
Ukutya kwe-Majorca, njengendawo efanayo e-Mediterranean, kusekelwe kwisithuba, imifuno kunye nenyama (ihagu ngokukodwa), kwaye kusebenzisa amafutha omnquma rhoqo.
Idina elilula elithandwayo, ingakumbi phakathi kwehlobo, yiPa amb Oli: Isonka kunye neoli yomnquma, utamatisi, kunye naziphi na izinto ezikhoyo ezifana nobukhulu, intlanzi ye-tuna, njalo.
Ukutya kweMajorca, njengokwaskwiindawo ezifanayo eMedithera, isekelwe kwisithethe, imifuno kunye nenyama (ingulube ngokukodwa), kwaye isebenzisa i-oyile yomnquma rhoqo.
Idina elilula ethandwayo, yena phakathi ehlotyeni, yi Pa amb Oli: Bread kunye namafutha omnquma, amatisi, kunye naziphi na izinongo ezikhoyo njengoshizi, intlanzi ye-tuna, rhoqo.
Ukutya kwaseMajorca, njengokwakwimimandla efanayo eMedithera, kusekelwe kwinkcubeko, imifuno kunye nenyama (ihagu ngokukodwa), kunye nokusebenzisa ioli yomnquma rhoqo.
Idina elilula elithandwayo, ikhakhulukazi phakathi nehlobo, yiPa amb Oli: Isonka kunye neoli yomnquma, utamatisi, kunye naziphi na iinongo ezikhoyo njengotshizi, intlanzi ye-tuna, rhoqo.
Izazi zemvelo kanye nezefilosofi zigxile emibhalweni yamandulo futhi, ngokukhethekile, eBhayibhelini ngesiLatin.
Imibono ka-Aristotle yesayensi yamukelwa yonke, kuhlanganise nesayikholoji.
Njengoba ulwazi lwaseGrisi lwaluncipha, iNtshonalanga yazithola isuka ezimpandeni zayo zefilosofi nesayensi zobuGriki.
I-Naturalists kunye nefilosofi zijolise kwimibhalo yamandulo kwaye, ngakumbi, kwiBhayibhile yesiLatin.
Ezazisamkeleka yayizimbono zika Aristotle kwimiba yonke ye sayensi, kuquka nezengqondo.
Nanjengoko ulwazi lwesi Grike lwehla, abaseNtshona bazifumana beqhawukene neengqondi zabo zesiGrike kunye nengcambu zabo sesayensi.
Naturalists kwaye philosophers kugxila imibhalo yamandulo, kwaye, balaseleyo, kwi Ibhayibhile kwi-Latin.
U-Aristotle yokubhalwa theories baba universally olwamkelekileyo, kuquka qokelela.
Njengoko isigrike ulwazi kwehla, i-west bamfumana ngokwayo ukusuka yayo iingcambu kwi-Hellenistic philosophy kwaye science.
Izazi zendalo kunye nefilosofi zijolise kwimibhalo-ngqangi yakudala kwaye, ngakumbi, kwiBhayibhile yesiLatin.
Iimbono zika-Aristotle malunga nenzululwazi zamkelwa jikelele, kubandakanya nokusebenza kwengqondo.
Njengoko ulwazi lwamaGrike lwalusiya lusiba mandundu, iNtshona yafumana iingcambu zayo kwifilosofi nakwinzululwazi yamaGrike.

Umuzi waseHaldarsvík unezindlela zokubona isiqhingi esiseduze sase-Eysturoy futhi unesonto elingavamile elinezinhlangothi eziyisishiyagalombili.
Egcekeni lesonto, kunemifanekiso yemabula ethakazelisayo yamajuba phezu kwamathuna amanye.
Kuyifanele ingxenye yehora ukuhambahamba emzaneni othakazelisayo.
Ilali yaseHaldarsvik ibonisa isiqithi sase-Eysturiy esikufuphi yaye sinesakhiwo secawa esingaqhelekanga esimbombo-sibhozo.
Kwiyadi yecawa, kukho iintaka ezikrolwe kwilitye lemabhile phezu kwamanye amangcwaba.
Kuthatha ihafu yeyure ukukhe uhle ubhekabheke ilali enomtsalane.
Nedolophu ka-haldarsvík sele iindlela ukubona ezikufutshane island ka-Eysturoy kwaye ingaba i-unusual isibhozo-sided ebandleni.
Ebandleni courtyard, kukho fascinating ibhastile imifanekiso pigeons phezu kwezinye graves.
Kubalulekile kukunceda kakhulu isiqingatha seyure ukuhamba-hamba jikelele intriguing dolophana.
Idolophu yaseHaldarsvík inokufikelela kwisiqithi esikufutshane sase-Eysturoy kwaye inecawa engaqhelekanga enamacala asibhozo.
Kwintendelezo yecawa, kukho imifanekiso eqingqiweyo yemarble yamahobe ngaphezulu kwamanye amangcwaba.
Kuxabisa isiqingatha seyure ukuhamba-hamba kwilali enomdla.
Isixeko saseHaldarsvík sineendlela zokubona isiqithi esisondeleyo sase-Eysturoy kwaye uneeveki ezingaqhelekanga ezine kumacala asibhozo.
Kwintendelezo yecawa, kukho imifanekiso yemihlaba enomdla yamahobe phezu kwamangcwaba amanye.
Kufuneka ube yinxalenye yeyure ukuhambahamba kwilali ebangel 'umdla.

Egcekeni lesonto, kukho imifanekiso yemabula enomdla yamahobe phezu kwamangcwaba amanye.
Ifanele inxalenye yeeyure ukuhamba kwilali enomdla.

Izilimi ezingokomthetho zase-Barcelona isi-Catalan nesiSpeyini. Cishe ingxenye ithanda ukukhuluma isi-Catalan, iningi liyasizwisisa, futhi cishe wonke umuntu uyasazi isiSpeyini.
Nokho, izimpawu eziningi ziboniswe kuphela ngesi-Catalan ngoba simiswe ngokomthetho njengolimi lokuqala olungokomthetho.
Nokho, isiPeyini sibuye sisetshenziswe kabanzi ezithuthini zomphakathi kanye nakwezinye izindawo.

Izaziso ezivamile eDolobheni Elikhulu zenziwa ngesi-Catalan kuphela, kodwa iziphazamiso ezingahleliwe zimenyezelwa ngohlelo lomshini ngezilimi eziningi ukuhlanganisa isi-Speyini, isiNgisi, isiFulentshi, isi-Arabhiya kanye nesiJapani.
Iilwimi ezisemthethweni zaseBarcelona sisiCatalan neSpanish. Malunga nesiqingatha sikhetha ukuthetha isiCatalan, uninzi lwabantu luyasazi, kwaye phantse wonke umntu wazi iSpanish.
Kodwa ke, amaphawu evezwe ngesi-Catalan ngoba sisekwe njengolwimi lelizwe ngokomthetho.
Sekunjalo, iSpanish sisetyenziswa kakhulu kwizithuthi zikawonke-wonke nakwezinye iindawo.

Izaziso ezithe rhoqo kwi-Metro zenziwa ngesi -Catalan kuphela, kodwa iziphazamiso ezingalindelwanga zichazwa yinkqubo ezilawulayo ngenqwaba yamalwimi njenge-Spanish, isiNgesi, isi-French, isi-Arab nesi-Japan.
Ulwimi Olusemthethweni Barcelona ingaba isicatala kwaye Spain. Phantse isiqingatha njenge ukuthetha isicatala, uninzi ukuqonda oko, kwaye phantse wonke umntu uyayazi-Spanish.
Nangona kunjalo, uninzi iimpawu ingaba kuboniswa kuphela isicatala kungenxa yokuba formally yamiselwa njengoko lokuqala ulwimi olusemthethweni.
Nangona kunjalo, Spain kanjalo widely asetyenziswa ezothutho nakwezinye iindawo.

Ngokufanayo izaziso kwi-big isixeko zenzelwe kuphela isicatala, kodwa jikelele distractions ingaba kwaziswa yi-a multilingual zombane lwenkqubo kuquka Spain, isingesi, isifrentshi, Arabian, kwaye Isijapanese.
Iilwimi ezisemthethweni zaseBarcelona zisiCatalan nesiSpanish. Phantse isiqingatha sithetha isiCatalan, uninzi luyaqonda, kwaye phantse wonke umntu uyazi iSpanish.
Nangona kunjalo, uninzi lweesimboli luboniswa kuphela ngeCatalan ngenxa yokuba yamkelwe ngokusemthethweni njengolwimi lwaseburhulumenteni lokuqala.
Nangona kunjalo, ipeyinti isetyenziswa ngokubanzi kuthutho lukawonkewonke nakwezinye iindawo.

Izaziso eziqhelekileyo kwisiXeko esiKhulu zenziwa ngeCatalan kuphela, kodwa ukuphazamiseka okungahleliwe kubhengezwa kwinkqubo yeelwimi ezininzi kubandakanya iSpanish, isiNgesi, isiFrentshi, isiArabhu nesiJapan.
Iilwimi ezisemthethweni zase-Barcelona zisi-Catalan nesi-Spanish. Inxalenye iyakuthanda ukuthetha isi-Catalan, ininzi iyasinceda, kwaye phantse wonke umntu uyasazi isi-Spanish.
Nangona kunjalo, iimpawu ezininzi ziboniswe kuphela ngesi-Catalan ngenxa yokuba simiswe ngokusemthethweni njengolwimi lokuqala olungokomthetho.
Nangona kunjalo, isiPeyeni sibuye sisetyenziswe ngokubanzi kwizithuthi zikawonke nakwezinye iindawo.

Izaziso eziqhelekileyo kwisixeko esikhulu zenziwe ngesi-Catalan kuphela, kodwa iziphazamiso ezingalawulekiyo ziye zaqulunqwa ngeelwimi ezininzi ukudibanisa isi-Spanish, isiNgesi, isiFrentshi, isi-Arabhiya kunye nesi-Japan.
IiLwimi ezisemthethweni zaseBarcelona zaseCatalan nesiSpanish. Mhlawumbi inxalenye ithanda ukuthetha neCatalan, uninzi luyayiqonda, kwaye phantse wonke umntu uyazi iSpanish.
Nangona kunjalo, uninzi lweesimboli luboniswa kuphela ngeCatalan kuba zamkelwe ngokusemthethweni njengolwimi lokuqala olusemthethweni.
Nangona kunjalo, ipeyinti isetyenziswa ngokubanzi kuthutho lukawonkewonke nakwezinye iindawo.

Iilwimi ezisemthethweni zaseBarcelona zi-Catalan kunye ne-Speyini. Phantse inxalenye ithanda ukuthetha i-Catalan, uninzi luyizwisisa, kwaye phantse wonke umntu uyasazi isiSpeyini.
Nangona kunjalo, iimpawu ezininzi ziboniswe kuphela ngesiCatalan kuba simiswe ngokomthetho njengolwimi lokuqala olusemthethweni.
Nangona kunjalo, iPeyini isetyenziswe ngokubanzi kwizithuthi zikawonkewonke nakwezinye iindawo.

Iziqhingi zaseShetland eseNyakatho, ezitholwe ngo-1819, zinezizwe eziningi ezithi ziwela kuzo futhi zinezikhungo eziningi, eziyishumi nesishiyagalolunye ezisebenzayo ngo-2020.
I-archipelago isendaweni eqhele ngamakhilomitha angu-120 enyakatho yeNhlonhlo. Enkulu kuwo i-King George enendawo e-Villa Las Estrellas.
Okunye kuhlanganisa isiqhingi seLivingston, kanye neDeception lapho imbobo enkulu egcwele udaka lwentabamlilo esaphuquka umlilo yenza itheku elimangalisayo elingokwemvelo.
Iziqithi zase-Mzantsi Shetland, ezabhaqwa ngo-1819, zithinjiwe ngamazwe ambalwa kwaye zezona zinee nkonzo zefazo, kukho ezilishumi nesithandathu ezisebenzayo ngo-2020
Indibanisela yeziqithi ikwiikhilomitha eziyi-120 ngentla Kosinga-siqithi. Eyona inkulu yi-King George Island enabahlali baseVilla Las Estrellas.
Ezinye ziquka i-Livingston Island kunye ne-Deception apho umngxuma wentaba-mlilo esaqhubekayo wenza kubekho izibuko lokwemvelo.
I-emntla Shetland Kweziqithi, bamfumana kwi-1819, kuba izizwe ezininzi eziphakamisa emnqamlezweni, kwaye ingaba ezininzi, nineteen, centers zokusebenza ngowama-2020.
I-archipelago ibekwe abanye 120 miles [120 km] kumntla we-peninsula. Wemiceli-Ngukumkani George unencwadi ndawo Villa las Estrellas.
Luquka Livingston Island, ngokunjalo njengoko deception apho enkulu umngxuma ukuzaliswa volcanic udaka ukuba waba eguquliweyo i-ngomlilo bamisela an amazing yendalo harbor.
Iziqithi zaseMantla Shetland, ezafunyanwa ngo-1819, zinamazwe amaninzi kwaye zinamaziko amaninzi, alishumi elinethoba asebenzayo ngo-2020.
Eli chwebakazi limalunga neekhilomitha ezili-120 kumantla weSingasiqithi. Eyona inkulu kubo yiKing George enendawo eVilla Las Estrellas.
Ezinye zibandakanya isiqithi sase-Livingston, kunye neReception, apho umngxuma omkhulu ogcwele udaka lwentaba-mlilo uqhuma uye kwizibuko lendalo elimangalisayo.
Iziqithi zaseShetland zaseMntla, ezifunyenwe ngo-1819, zineentlanga ezininzi ekuthiwa ziwela kuzo kwaye zinamaziko amaninzi, alishumi elinesithoba asebenzayo ngo-2020.
I-Archipelago yindawo esithsaba ngeekhilomitha eziyi-120 kumantla e-Nhlonhlo. Enkulu kwi-King George enendawo e-Villa Las Estrellas.
Enye iquka isiqithi seLivingston, kunye neDeception apho umngxuma omkhulu ogcwele udaka lwentabamlilo ophuquka umlilo wenza isicaka esimangalisayo esingokwemvelo.
Iziqithi zaseMantla Shetland, ezafunyanwa ngo-1819, zinamazwe amaninzi kwaye zinamaziko amaninzi, alishumi elinethoba asebenzayo ngo-2020.
Eli nqaku yabhalwa ukuba afunde Train Travel kwaye wenziwa ngu Gcina A Isitimela, engambi Train Amatikiti Website In The World.
Ezinye zibandakanya isiqithi sase-Livingston, kunye neReception, apho umngxuma omkhulu ogcwele udaka lwentaba-mlilo uqhuma uye kwizibuko lendalo elimangalisayo.
Iziqithi zaseShetland eNyakatho, ezifunyenwe ngo-1819, zinezizwe ezininzi ezithi ziwela kuzo kwaye zineziko ezininzi, ezilishumi elinesithoba ezisebenzayo ngo-2020.
I-archipelago isendaweni eneekhilomitha eziyi-120 ngasentla yeNhlonhlo. Enkulu kwiKing George eneendawo eVilla Las Estrellas.
Ezinye ziquka isiqithi saseLivingston, kunye neDeception apho umngxuma omkhulu uzele udaka lwentabamlilo esaquka umlilo yenza itheku elimangalisayo elingokwemvelo.
Izikhukhula zehle, okubandakanya skiing futhi manjehibilika eqhweni iyimidlalo ethandwayo efaka ukwehlela phansi indawo embozwe yiqhwa nge skis noma ibhodi leqhwa elinanyathe izinyawo zakho.
Ukushushuluza eqhweni umsebenzi oyinhloko wokuhamba onabashisekeli abaningi, kwezinye izikhathi abaziwa ngokuthi "ama-ski bums," abahlela ukuvakasha konke ukuze bashushuluze eqhweni endaweni ethile.
Umcabango wokushushuluza eqhweni owakudala kakhulu — imidwebo yasemihumeni eveza abashushuluzi baseqhweni ihlehlela emuva ku-5000 BC!

Ukushushuluza eqhweni wehla entabeni njengomhlalo kuhlehlela emuva okungenani ekhulwini lama-17 leminyaka, futhi ngo-1861 iqembu lokushushuluza eqhweni kokuzilibazisa lavulwa abantu baseNorway e-Australia.

Umtshibilizi wokuqengqeleka kwikhephu, equka ukubhabha nokunyuka kwikhephu, yimidlalo exhaphakileyo equka ukudayva usehla kwibala eligqunywe likhephu unxibe I skis okanye snowbhodi eqanyangelwe ezinyaweni zakho.
Ukundiza yeyona nquleqhu yokuhambahamba enabalandeli abanintsi, eyaziwa ngamanye amaxa njenge “ski bums”, abaceba ukuchitha iholide ngokundiza kwingingqi ethile.
Kudala yabakho into yokutyibiliza emkhenceni — imizobo esemiqolombeni ibonisa abatyibilizi bangoo-5000 BC!
Ukwehla encotsheni njengomdlalo kungalandwa kwi 17th century, kwaye ngo 1861 iklabhu yokuqala yokutshibiliza yavulwa ngama Norwegia e-Australia.

Floods kuba kwehla, nto leyo ibandakanya skiing kwaye ngoku snowboarding ingaba ethandwa kakhulu imidlalo ukuba ziquka usihla emhlabeni igqunywe nge skis okanye glacier ukuba stuck kunye kweenyawo zenu.
Skiing yindlela ephambili umsebenzi ka-skiing kunye ezininzi enthusiasts, ngamanye amaxesha waziwa njengo "ski bums," ngubani isicwangciso ukundwendwela yonke into kwi-ski kwenye indawo.
I kakhulu ubudala unye ka-skiing — cavemen paintings ukuba depict skiers imihla emva 5,000 USUK!
Skiing yinzala entabeni njengokuba isitulo imihla emva ubuncinane i-17th century, kwaye 1861 i-ski club kuba ezolonwabo waba evuliweyo yi-Norwegians e-Australia.
Ukunyuka ukuskiya, kubandakanya ukushushuluza nokuskiya, ngumdlalo othandwayo obandakanya ukuhla ezantsi ngesikisi okanye ngebhola ekhatywayo ngeenyawo zakho kuyo.
Ukuskiya yeyona nto iphambili yokunyuka intaba nabantu abaninzi abanomdla, maxa wambi eyaziwa ngokuba yi "bums ski", abacwangcisa konke ukuskiya kwenye indawo.
Eyona ndawo indala yokutyibilika emkhenkceni - imizobo emiqolombeni ebonisa iziqwenga zomkhenkce ezibuyela emva kwiminyaka engama-5000 BC!
Amathambeka e-Ski ezantsi endulini abuyela ubuncinci kwinkulungwane ye-17, kwaye ngo-1861 indawo yolonwabo yokuskiya yavulwa ngabantu baseNorway e-Australia.

Izikhukula zihle, ezibandakanya skiing kwaye ngokuhibilika kwikhephu yimidlalo ethandwayo equka ukwehlela phantsi indawo ogqunywe ngumkhenkce nge skis okanye ibhodi yekhephu elinanyathe iinyawo zakho.
Ukuskiya kwikhephu ngumsebenzi oyintloko wokuhamba onabaxhasi abaninzi, ngamanye amaxesha abaziwa ngokuba yi "ski bums," baceba ukukhenketha konke ukuze batshutshise kwikhephu kwindawo ethile.
Ingcinga yokuskiya kwikhephu eyayindala kakhulu — imiqolomba ebonakalisa abaqhubi beekhephu yehla emva kwi-5000 BC!

Ukuskiya kwikhephu wehla entabeni njengesihlalo kuhlehlela emva ubuncinane kwinkulungwane ye-17 yeminyaka, kwaye ngo-1861 iqela lokuskiya kwikhephu lokuzonwabisa lavulwa ngabantu baseNorway eOstreliya.
Izikhukhula ehle, ezibandakanya skiing kwaye ibilika eqhweni imidlalo ethandwayo equka ehlela phantsi indawo egqunywe ikhephu kunye skis okanye ibhodi ikhephu iinyawo zakho.
Ukuskiya ngumsebenzi ophambili wokunyuka intaba nabantu abaninzi abanomdla, maxa wambi obizwa ngokuba yi "bums ski", abacwangcisa konke ukuze bashushuze eqhweni kwindawo ethile.
Ingcamango yokutyibiliza eqhweni endala kakhulu-imizobo emqolombeni eveza iziqwenga zomkhweni ehlela emva 5000 BC!
Ukuskiya wehla entabeni njengomhlalo kuhla emva ubuncinane ngenkulungwane ye-17, kwaye ngo-1861 iqela lokuzonwabisa lavulwa ngabantu baseNorway e-Australia.
Izikhukhula zehle, okubandakanya skiing kwaye ngokuhibilika kwikhephu yimidlalo ethandwayo efaka ukucwangcisa indawo yokugquma ikhephu kunye skis okanye ibhodi yekhephu enyakazelayo iinyawo zakho.
Ukushushuluza ikhephu umsebenzi ophambili wokuhamba onabashisekeli abaninzi, ngamanye amaxesha abaziwa ngokuba "i-ski bums," abacwangcisa utyelelo yonke ukuze bashushuluze kwikhephu kwindawo ethile.
Ingcamango yokushushuluza kwikhephu yakudala kakhulu — ipeyinti yemihumeni eveza abashushuluzi kwikhephu ihlehlela umva kwi-5000 BC!
Ukushushuluza ehweni wehla entabeni njengomhlalo kuhlehlela umva ubuncinane ekhulwini le-17 leminyaka, kwaye ngo-1861 iqela lokushushuluza kwihweni lokuphumla lavulwa abantu baseNorway eAustralia.
Izimbuzi kubonakala sengathi zenziwa izilwane ezifuywayo okokuqala ngokwesilinganiso eminyakeni engu-10,000 endlule eziNtabeni zase-Zagros e-Iran.
Amasiko nezizwana zamandulo zaqala ukuzigcina njengendlela elula yokuthola ubisi, izinwele, inyaka, kanye nesikhumba.

Izimbuzi ezifuywayo ngokuvamile zazigcinwa nomhlambi owawuhamba emagqumeni noma ezindaweni zamadlelo, ngokuphindaphindiwe zazeluswa abelusi ngokuvamile okwakuba izingane noma abasebasha, okungabelusi abafanayo nabaziwayo. Lesi sibonelo sokwalusa sisasentshenziswa nanamuhla.
Iibhokhwe kubonakala ngathi zeznziwa izilwanyana zasekhaya malunga neminyaka eyi-10 000 eyadlulayo kwiZagros Mountain eIran.
Amasiko amandulo kunye nezizwe zaqala ukuzigcina ukuze bafikelele lula ebisini, iinwele, inyama kunye nezikhumba.

Iibhokhwe zasekhaya zazidla ngokugcinwa zingumhlambi owawuzihambahambela ezindulini okanye nakuwaphi na amadlelo, zoluswe ngabelusi eyayisoloko ingabantwana okanye amatyendyana, afana nqwa nabelusi aba baziwayo. Ezindlela zokukhokhela zisasetyetziswa kakhulu nanamhlanje.
Goats ngathi ayixhasi namnye zithe eyenziwe pets okokuqala kwi-i-avareji 10,000 eminyaka edlulileyo kwi-Yugoslavian iintaba ka-Zagros.
Yamandulo cultures kwaye izizwe baqalisa ukuqwalasela nabo njengokuba indlela elula ukuze ufumane ubisi, iinwele, ubudala, kwaye imigca enqamlezeneyo.

I-domestic goats baba rhoqo nokugcinwa kunye emhlambini okokuba wahamba ngokusebenzisa iinduli okanye pastures, izama shepherds okokuba baba rhoqo abantwana okanye younger, efanayo kwaye kulungile-ezaziwayo shepherds. Oku umlinganiselo ka-shepherding ingu kwi-sebenzisa namhlanje.
Iibhokhwe kubonakala ngathi zazalelwa okokuqala kwi-avareji yeminyaka eyi-10 000 eyadlulayo kwiiZagros Mountains zaseIran.
Amasiko nabantu bamandulo baqala ukuyigcina njengendlela elula yokufumana ubisi, iinwele, ubudala, kunye nolusu.

Iibhokhwe zasekhaya zihlala zigcinwa kunye nemihlambi ejikeleza ezindulini okanye emadlelweni, ihlala ihoywa ngabelusi ngokuqhelekileyo abantwana okanye abancinci, abangabalusi abaziwayo nabaziwayo. Le ndlela yokwalusa isasetyenziswa nanamhlanje.
Iibhokhwe kubonakala ngathi zenziwe okokuqala izilwanyana zasekhaya ngokomlinganiselo kwiminyaka eyi-10,000 eyadlulayo kwiiNtaba zase-Zagros e-Iran.
Iinkcubeko kunye nezizwana zamandulo zaqala ukuzigcina njengendlela elula yokufumana ubisi, iinwele, inyaka kunye nesikhumba.

Iibhokhwe zasekhaya zazisoloko zigcinwa nomhlambi owawuphindwe ziinduli okanye kwiindawo zamadlelo, ngokuphindaphindiweyo zazeluswa ngabalusi ngokuqhelekileyo eyayikukuba ngabantwana okanye abaselula, okungabalusi abafanayo nabaziwayo. Le ndawo yokwalusa isetyenziswa nanamhlanje.
Imbuzi kubonakala ngathi zazalelwa okokuqala kwi-avareji yeminyaka eyi-10 000 eyadlulayo kwiiZagros Mountains zaseIran.
Customs kunye nabantu bamandulo baqala ukuyigcina njengendlela elula yokufumana ubisi, iinwele, ubudala, kunye nolusu.

Imbuzi zasekhaya ngokubanzi zazigcinwa kunye nemihlambi eyazulazula ezindulini okanye emadlelweni, ihlala ihoywa ngabelusi ngokuqhelekileyo ababengabantwana okanye abancinci, ababekwangabalusi abaziwayo nabaziwayo. Le ndlela yokwalusa isasetyenziswa namhlanje.
Iibhokhwe kubonakala ngathi zenziwe izilwanyana ezifuywayo okokuqala ngomlinganiselo kwiminyaka eyi-10,000 edlulileyo kwiiNtaba zaseZagros kwi-Iran.
Amasiko kunye nezithethe zamandulo ziqala ukuzigcina njengendlela elula yokufumana ubisi, iinwele, nyaka, kunye nesikhumba.

Iibhokhwe ezifuywayo ngokuqhelekileyo zazigcinwa kunye nomhlambi owawuhamba emagqumeni okanye kwiindawo zamadlelo, ngokuphindaphindiweyo zazaluswa abelusi ngokuqhelekileyo abantwana okanye abasebatsha, okungabelusi abafana nabaziwayo. Lo mzekelo wolusa sisaziswa nanamhlanje.
Ngeziqhingi ezingu-17,000 ongakhetha kuzo, ukudla kwase-Indonesia igama elihlanganisa izinhlobo eziningi zokudlwa kwendawo okutholakala ezweni lonke.
Kodwa, uma lisetshenziswa ngaphandle kwenye incazelo, igama livame ukusho ukudla ekuqaleni okusuka ezingxenyeni ezimaphakathi kanye nezisempumalanga yesiqhingi esiyinhloko iJava.

Manje okutholakala kabanzi eqoqweni leziqhingi lonke, ukudla kwaseJava kuhlanganisa izinhlobonhlobo zokudla okunongwe kalula, lapho isinongo esivelele kubantu baseJava kungamantongomane, upelepele, ushukela (ikakhulukazi ushukela waseJava kakhukhunathi) kanye nezinye izinongo ezinamakha.
Ngenxa yokuba kukho iziqithi eziyi-17 000 ekunokukhethwa kuzo, ukutya kwase-Indonesia ligama eliyingqokelela eliquka ukutya kwemvelo okuvela kwiinginqi ezininzi zesizwe.
Ukuba akusetyenziswa amanye amagama okucacisa, eli binzana lithetha ukutya okuvela kwimimandla zombindi nasempuma kwisiqithi saseJava.

Ngoku kufumaneka ngokubanzi kwingqokelela yeziqithi, ukutya kwaseJava kuquka izidlo ezinongwe ngokulula, yaye izinongo eziphambili zezidlo zaseJava zidla ngokuba ngamantongomane, itshilisi, iswekile (ingakumbi iswekile yekhokhonathi yaseJava) kunye nezinye izipayisi ezinemvumba elimnandi.
Le 17,000 kweziqithi ukukhetha ukususela, isi-indonesian ukutya ufumana ithuba ukuze sijongana a libanzi ngezixhobo ezahlukeneyo wobulali ukutya nationwide.
Nangona kunjalo, xa zisetyenziswa ngaphandle nayiphi na enye intsingiselo, ilizwi libhekisa ukutya ekuqaleni kwi-central kwaye empuma imimandla engundoqo island ye Java.

Ngoku widely zifunyanwa lonke archipelago, Java ke ukutya iquka libanzi ngezixhobo ezahlukeneyo lula spiced foods, apho dominant seasoning phakathi Java ke abantu ngu peanuts, peppers, sugar (ingakumbi Java coconut sugar) kunye nezinye perfumed spices.
Ngeziqithi ezili-17,000 onokukhetha kuzo, ukutya kwaseIndonesia ligama eliquka iintlobo ezininzi zokutya kwasekhaya okufumaneka kwilizwe liphela.
Nangona kunjalo, xa lisetyenziswe ngaphandle kokuphazanyiswa, eli gama lihlala libhekisa kukutya okuvela kumbindi nakwimpuma yesiqithi esikhulu seJava.

Ngoku ifumaneka ngokubanzi kwisiqithi sonke, iJava cuisine ibandakanya iintlobo ngeentlobo zokutya okunezipayisi, ezona ntlobo ziphambili zabantu baseJava ziinathi, iipepile, iswekile (ngakumbi iswekile yekhokhonathi yeJava) kunye nezinye iziqholo ezinuka kamnandi.
Ngeziqithi eziyi-17,000 onokukhetha kuzo, ukutya kwaseIndonesia ligama elibandakanya iintlobo ezininzi zokudlwa kwendawo ekhoyo kulo lonke ilizwe.
Kodwa, xa lisetyenziswa ngaphandle kwenye intsingiselo, igama lihlala lithetha ukutya ekuqaleni okusuka kwiindawo eziphakathi kunye neempuma zaseJava.

Ngoku ifumaneka ngokubanzi kwiqoqoqo leqithi lonke, ukutya kweJava kubandakanya iintlobo ezininzi zokutya okunongwe lula, apho izinongo ezibalaseleyo kubantu baseJava zingamantongomane, upelepele, iswekile (ingakumbi iswekile yaseJava ngakumbi) kunye nezinye izinto ezinobungozi.
Ngeziqithi ezili-17,000 onokukhetha kuzo, ukutya kwaseIndonesia ligama eliquka iintlobo ezininzi zokutya kwasekhaya okufumaneka kwilizwe lonke.
Nangona kunjalo, xa lisetyenziswe ngaphandle kokuphazanyiswa, igama lihlala libhekisa kukutya okwakuqala kuvela kumbindi nakwempuma yesiqithi esikhulu seJava.

Ngoku ifumaneka ngokubanzi kumachwebakazi esiqithi sonke, ukutya kweJava kubandakanya iintlobo ngeentlobo zokutya okunezinongo, ezona ntlobo ziphambili zabantu baseJava ziinathi, iipepile, iswekile (ngakumbi iswekile yekhokhonathi yeJava) kunye nezinye iziqholo ezinuka kamnandi.
Kwiziqithi eziyi-17,000 ongakhetha kuzo, ukutya kwe-Indonesia igama eliquka iintlobo ezininzi zokutya kwendawo ekhoyo kwilizwe lonke.
Kodwa, ukuba isetyenziswe ngaphandle kwenye intsingiselo, igama lidla ngokuthetha ukutya ekuqaleni ukusuka kwiindawo ezimaphakathi kunye nempuma yesiqithi saseJava.

Ngoku zifumaneka ngokubanzi kwiziqithi eziziqithi zonke, ukutya kwaseJava ziquka iintlobo zokutya okunongwe lula, apho isinongo esibalaseleyo kubantu baseJava kunokumantongomane, upelepele, iswekile (ingakumbi iswekile yaseJava kakhukhunathi) kunye nezinye iimeko ezinamakha.
Indlela esobala yokugibela egumbini lendiza elibizayo noma labebhizinisi ukukhipha imali eningi yalelo lungelo (noma, okugcono, wenze inkampani yakho ikwenzele lokho).

Noma kunjalo, lokhu akufiki kalula: njengomthetho obekiwe, ungalindela ukukhokha izikhathi eziphindwe kane kunenani elivamile lomnotho webhizinisi, kanye nezikhathi eziyishumi nanye ezingeni lokuqala!
Ngokuvamile, akusizi ngisho nokufuna izaphulelo ezihlalweni zabebhizinisi noma ezinethezekile ohabweni lwendiza oluqondile olusuka ku-A luye ku-B.

Izinkampani zezindiza zazi kahle ukuthi kuneqembu elithile eliyisisekelo labagibeli bezindiza abazimisele ukukhokha ama-dollar aphezulu ukuze bathole ilungelo lofika endaweni ethile ngokushesha futhi ngokunethezeka, futhi babakhokhisa ngokufanele.
Indlela ecacileyo yokubhabha kudidi eluphezulu okanye udidi lweshishini kukukhupha imali enkulu ukuze ufumane lo nyweba (okanye okungcono, kukuba inkampani yakho ikwenzele lo nto).
Sekunjalo, oku kubiza kakhulu: njengomthetho oqhelekileyo, ungalindela ukubhatala ixabiso eliphindwe kane kunexabiso lesiqhelo xa ukushishino, yaye ngokuphindwe kayi-11 kwinqanaba lokuqala.
Xa sithetha nje siquka, akukho sidingo ekujongeni izaphulelo kwizihlalo zoshishino okanye ze first class kwinqwelomoya esuka ku A ukuya ku B

Inqwelomoya zazi kakuhle ukuba kukho iqela labandizi abakulungeleyo ukubhatala eyona mali iphezulu ukuze bafumane ithamsanqa lokufika naphina ngokukhawuleza nangokuphatheka kakuhle, baze bababhatalise ngokunjalo.
I-obvious indlela get kwi-i-expensive kwetitki okanye ishishini Igumbi ukuba arhoxe kakhulu imali kuba ukuba akunjalo (okanye, ngcono kodwa, vumelani inkampani yakho ukwenza oko).

Nangona kunjalo, oku akusebenzi kuza ngokulula: njengokuba umthetho, uyakwazi silindele ukuba ahlawule kane kangangoko i-avareji ishishini uqoqosho ixabiso, ngokunjalo elinanye umphinda-phinde ngo lokuqala inqanaba!
Ngokubanzi ukuthetha, kubalulekile useless nkqu ukuya kukhangela discounts kwi Ishishini lezihlalo okanye ethambileyo flights ukusuka kwi-B.

Airlines ingaba kulungile aware ukuba kukho ezisisiseko iqela kwetitki abakhweli abo bazimisele ukuba ahlawule phezulu dollazi kuba ilungelo zifikele indawo ngokukhawuleza kwaye comfortably, kwaye baya kwentlawulo kwabo ngokufanelekileyo.
Indlela ecacileyo yokukhwela inqwelo moya ebizayo okanye ishishini kukuchitha imali eninzi kwelo lungelo (okanye, kungcono, yenza ukuba inkampani yakho ikwenzele).
Nangona kunjalo, oku akuzi lula: njengomthetho, unokulindela ukuhlawula amatyeli amane ngexabiso eliqhelekileyo leshishini, kunye namaxesha alishumi elinanye kwinqanaba lokuqala!
Ngokubanzi, akuncedi nokuba ujonge izaphulelo kwishishini okanye kwizihlalo zokunethezeka kwinqwelo moya ethe ngqo A-to-B.

Iinqwelo-moya ziyazi kakuhle ukuba kukho iqela elithile labakhweli beenqwelomoya abazimisele ukuhlawula iidola eziphezulu ukuze bafumane ilungelo lokuhlala kwindawo ethile ngokukhawuleza nangokufanelekileyo, kwaye babahlawulise ngokufanelekileyo.
Indlela ekucacileyo yokukhwela kwigumbi le moya eNtofontofo okanye ishishini ukukhupha imali eninzi yelo lungelo (okanye, ngcono, wenze inkampani yakho ikwenzele oko).

Nangona kunjalo, oku akufiki lula: njengomthetho obekiweyo, unokulindela ukuhlawula ngesine amaxesha aphindweyo kunexabiso eliqhelekileyo loqoqosho lweshishini, kunye namaxesha alishumi elinamnye kwinqanaba lokuqala!
Ngokuqhelekileyo, ayikuncedi nokuba ufuna izaphulelo kwiindawo zoshishino okanye ezinethezekile kwiindawo eziqhelekileyo ezivela kwi-A ukuya kwi-B.

Iinqwelo-moya zazi kakuhle ukuba kukho iqela elithile elisisiseko labakhweli beenqwelo-moya abazimisele ukuhlawula iidola eziphezulu ukuze bafumane ilungelo lokufika kwindawo ethile ngokukhawuleza nangokunethezeka, kwaye babahlawulisa ngokufanelekileyo.
Indlela ecacileyo yokukhwela inqwelo moya ebizayo okanye ishishini kukuchitha imali eninzi kwelo lungelo (okanye, kungcono, yenza ukuba inkampani yakho ikwenzele).
Nangona kunjalo, oku akuzi lula: Njengomthetho, unokulindela ukuhlawula amaxesha aphindwe ngexabiso eliqhelekileyo leshishini, kunye namaxesha alishumi elinanye kwinqanaba lokuqala!
Ngokuqhelekileyo, akuncedi nganto ukujonga izaphulelo kwishishini okanye izihlalo zolonwabo kwiinqwelomoya ezithe ngqo ze-A-to-B.

Iinqwelo-moya ziyazi kakuhle ukuba kukho iqela elithile labakhweli beenqwelomoya abazimisele ukuhlawula iidola eziphezulu ukuze bafumane ilungelo lokuhlala kwindawo ethile ngokukhawuleza nangokufanelekileyo, kwaye babahlawulise ngokufanelekileyo.
Indlela ecacileyo yokukhwela kwigumbi lendiza elibizayo okanye lashishini ukukhupha imali eninzi yaloo lungelo (okanye, okugcono, wenze inkampani yakho ikwenzele oko).

Nangona kunjalo, oku akufiki lula: njengomthetho obekiweyo, unokulindela ukuhlawula amaxesha aphindwe kane kunexabiso eliqhelekileyo loqoqosho lweshishini, kunye namaxesha alishumi elinanye kwinqanaba lokuqala!
Ngokuqhelekileyo, asinakufuna izaphulelo ezihlalweni zamashishini okanye ezinethezekile kwinqwelomoya ethe ngqo ukusuka kwi-A ukuya kwi-B.

Iinkampani zeenqwelo-moya zazi kakuhle ukuba kukho iqela elithile elisisiseko labagibeli benqwelo-moya abazimisele ukuhlawula i-dollar ephezulu ukuze bafumane ilungelo lokufika kwindawo ethile ngokukhawuleza kwaye lukunethezeka, kwaye babahlawulisa ngokufanelekileyo.
Umngomo oyinhloko wesayensi ukuthola indlela izwe elisebenza ngayo uma lisebenzisa indlela yesayensi. Le ndlela eqinisweni iqondisa oluningi ucwaningo lwesayensi.

Akukodwa nokho, ukulinga, futhi isilingo isivivinyo esisetshenziselwa ukususa ukucabangela okuhle okukodwa noma okwengeziwe, ukubuza imibuzo, nokwenza ukuphawula kanye nokuqondisa ucwaningo olungokwesayensi.
Eyona njongo iphambili yeNzululwazi kukufumanisa indlela ihlabathi elisebenza ngayo ngendlela yesayensi. Le ndlela ikhokela uninzi lophando lwenzululwazi.
Ayiyodwanga nje, ukulinga , nolingo luvavanyo olusetyenziswa ukususa enye okanye oluninzi uqikelelo, kubuzwe imibuzo kwenziwe nengqwalasela ekhokhela uphando lwesayensi.
Eyona njongo of science yindlela yokufumana phandle njani ihlabathi imisebenzi xa isebenzisa zobunzululwazi. Le ndlela kanye elinganayo kakhulu zobunzululwazi uphando.

Hayi omnye, nangona kunjalo, ingaba ekuhendweni, kwaye ekuhendweni ingaba isikhalazo osetyenziselwa susa omnye okanye ngaphezulu dibanisa considerations, babuze imibuzo, kwaye ukwenza observations kwaye ngqo yokubhalwa uphando.
Eyona njongo iphambili yesayensi kukufumanisa ukuba umhlaba usebenza njani xa usebenzisa indlela yesayensi. Le ndlela ikhokelela kuphando oluninzi lwenzululwazi.

Akunjalo, nangona kunjalo, uvavanyo, kwaye uvavanyo luvavanyo olusetyenziselwa ukuphelisa enye okanye ezingakumbi izinto ezintle, ukubuza imibuzo, nokwenza amagqabantshintshi kunye nokuqondisa uphando lwenzululwazi.
Eyona njongo iphambili yenzululwazi kukufumanisa indlela ilizwe elisebenza ngayo xa lisebenzisa inzululwazi. Enyanisweni le ndlela ibonisa uphando lwenzululwazi oluninzi.
Akukodwa kunjalo, umlinganiselo, kunye nesilingo semviwo esisetyenziselwa ukususa enye okanye eyongezelelweyo ingqalelo, ukubuza imibuzo, nokwenza izimvo kunye nokuqondisa uphando lwenzululwazi.

Umngomo oyintloko wenzululwazi ukufumanisa indlela ilizwe elisebenza ngayo xa lisebenzisa indlela yenzululwazi. Le ndlela enyanisweni iqondisa ezininzi uphando lwenzululwazi.
Kodwa ke, ukulinga, kunye nesilingo sovavanyo esisetyenziselwa ukususa ingqalelo efanelekileyo enye okanye ngaphezulu, ukubuza imibuzo, nokwenza izimvo kunye nokuqondisa uphando lwenzululwazi.
Ukusebenzisa imikhumbi ukuthutha impahla yindlela ephumelela kakhulu yokuthutha abantu abaningi kanye nempahla ngaphesheya kwezilwandle.

Umsebenzi wamatilosi ngokujwayelekile kwakungukuqinisekisa ukuthi izwe lakho ligcina ikhono lokuhambisa abantu bakho nempahla, kuyilapho ngesikhathi esifanayo, ephazamisa ikhono lesitha sakho lokuhambisa abantu baso nempahla.

Esinye sezibonelo sakamuva esiphawuleka kakhulu salokhu bekuwumkhankaso waseNyakatho Atlantic weWWII. AmaMelika ayezama ukuyisa abantu nezimpahla ngaphesheya koLwandlekazi i-Atlanti ukusiza iBhrithani.
Ngesikhathi esifanayo, ibutho lemikhumbi laseJalimane, lisebenzisa ama-U-boat ngokuyinhloko, belizama ukuvimbela lokhu kuhamba.
Ukube amaZwe Ayelwa neJalimane ayehlulekile, iJalimane cishe belizokwazi ukunqoba iBhrithani njengoba lenze okufanayo ngeYurophu yonke.
Ukusebenzisa inqanawe ukuhambisa imithwalo yeyona Ndlela echanileyo yokuhambisa abantu abaninzi nemithwalo ukunqumla amanxweme.

Umsebenzi weenqanawa ngokwesiko ibikukuqinisekisa ukuba ilizwe lakho ligcina amandla okuhambisa abantu bakho kunye neempahla, ube kwangeloxesha, uphazamisa amandla otshaba lwakho lokuhambisa abantu kunye neempahla.
Enye yemizekelo eyona iqaphelwayo yayiyiliphulo lwe-North Atlantic ye-WWII. AmaMelika ayezema ukusa amadoda nezixhobo ngapha kweLwandle le-Atlantic ukuncedisa iBritani.
Ngaxeshanye, umkhosi wamanzi wase German,sisebenzisa ikakhulu isikhitshane I U-noats, wawuzama ukumisa esi sithuthi.
Ukuba iAllies yayingazange iphumelele, kwakusenokwenzeka ukuba iJamani iyoyise iBrithani kuba yonke enye inxalenye yeYurophu yayingakuyo.
Usebenzisa iinqanawa ukuba lezothutho cargo lelona kakuhle indlela yezithuthi abantu abaninzi kwaye cargo kuwo seas.

Umsebenzi sailors waba ngokubanzi ukuqinisekisa ukuba yakho ilizwe retains isakhono lezothutho yakho abantu kwaye izinto, lo gama ngaxeshanye, interfering neqabane lakho adversary ke, akunakho lezothutho bakhe kwaye izinto.
Enye uninzi nje notable imizekelo oku wenziwe Emntla Atlantic phulo ka-WWII. Americans baba ukuzama lezothutho abantu kwaye izinto kuwo Atlanti ocean ukunceda Ibrithani.
Ngexesha elinye, i-isijamani nevi, ngokusebenzisa U-boats okokuqala, uzama ukunqanda oku yokuhamba-hamba.
Ukuba warring izizwe ngokuchasene Sasejamani kokuba ayiphumelelanga, Egermany ingaba sifuna ukwazi athimba Usa njengokuba kubhaliwe baye kuzo zonke Yurophu.

Indima yoomatiloshe ngokubanzi yayikukuqinisekisa ukuba ilizwe lakho liyasigcina isakhono sokuhambisa abantu bakho kunye neempahla, ngelixa kwangaxeshanye, siphazamisa amandla otshaba lwakho ukuhambisa abantu kunye neempahla.

Omnye wemizekelo ebalaseleyo yakutshanje yayiyiphulo le-WWII's North Atlantic. Abantu baseMelika babezama ukuhambisa abantu kunye neempahla ngaphesheya koLwandlekazi lweAtlantic ukuze bancede iBritane.
Kwangelo xesha, umkhosi waseJamani, usebenzisa i-U-boats ngokuyintloko, wayezama ukunqanda ukuhamba kwezithuthi.

IKruger National Park (KNP) isenyakatho-mpumalanga yaseNingizimu Afrika futhi ihamba ngasemngceleni weMozambique empumalanga, iZimbabwe enyakatho, futhi umngcele ongaseningizimu iCrocodile River.
Ubukhulu bepaki bungu-19,500 km² futhi lihlukaniswe laba yizindawo ezingokwemvelo ezingu-14, ngayinye inezidalwa zasendle ezihlukahlukene.
Ingenye yezindawo ezivakashelwa kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi ithathwa njengendawo eyaziwa kakhulu kumaPaki weZwe waseNingizimu Afrika (SANParks).
IKruger National Park (KNP) ilele emantla mpuma o Mzantsi Afrika kwaye ibaleka imida yase Mozambique empuma, iZimbabwe emantla, kwaye umda osemazantsi yi Crocodile River.
Ipaki ithatha i-19,500 km² kwaye yahlulwe kwi-ecozones ezili-14, nganye ixhasa izilwanyana zasendle ezahlukeneyo.
Yenye yeendawo ezinomtsalane eMzantsi Afrika kwaye ithathwa njengeyona ndawo iphambili yeeNdawo zeSizwe zoMzantsi Afrika (SANParks).
I-Kruger National Park (KNP) ngu umntla mpuma Emzantsi Afrika kwaye travels noku umda Emozambique kwi-Mpuma, Ezimbabwe Emntla, kwaye southern umda Crocodile River.
I-park ubungakanani ngu 19,500 km2 kwaye ulahlule kwi-14 yendalo iindawo, ngamnye nge ngezixhobo ezahlukeneyo wild izidalwa.

Yenye yeendawo ezityelelwayo eMzantsi Afrika kwaye ithathwa njengeyona ndawo ithandwayo kwiiPaki zeSizwe zoMzantsi Afrika (SANParks).
