Imilinganiselo yepaki ibiyi-19,500 km2 yaye yahlulwe yaba ziindawo eziyi-14, nganye inezidalwa ezahlukahlukeneyo zasendle.
Le yenye yezona ndawo zityeleleyo eMzantsi Afrika kwaye ithathwa njengeyona ndawo zaziwayo-kakuhle kwiiPaki zeLizwe zoMzantsi Afrika (SANParks).

Ubukhulu bepaki yi-19,500 km ² kwaye yahlulwe yangama-14 oovimba bendalo, nganye inezilwanyana zasendle.

Uma uvakashela izindawo zase-Arctic noma e-Aantarctic ebusika ungabona ubusuku obuthatha amahora angaphezu kuka-24, okusho ukuthi ilanga alisi ngaphezu komkhathizwe.
Lokhu kunikeza ithuba elihle lokubona Ukukhanya okunqabile okuye kuvele esibhakabhakeni esiphezulu, njengoba isibhakabhaka sizofiphala cishe usuku lonke.
Njengoba izindawo zingahlali abantu abaningi, nokuphazamisa kokukhanya kungavamanga ukuba inkinga, uzokwazi futhi ukujabulela izinkanyezi.
Ukuba utyelela imimandla ye-Artic okanye ye-Antarctic ebusika uza kufumana ubusuku be-polar, nto leyo ethetha ukuba ilanga aliphumi esibhakabhakeni.
Lena yenza ithuba lokubona i-Aurora borealis, njengokuba isibhakabhaka siyakuba mnyama nje kancinci ekuhambeni kwexesha.
Nanjengoko iindawo zingaxinenanga, nongcoliseko lungeyongxaki kangoko, uya kukwazi nokubona iinkwenkwezi.
Ukuba ubandwendwelayo e-arctic okanye aantarctic kwiindawo ebusika, ungabona busuku lasting phezu kweeyure eziyi-24, oko kuthetha ukuba ilanga akusebenzi imvula ngaphezu ulundiname.
Oku inika kakuhle ithuba ukubona oqaqambileyo ukukhanya ukuba sele iyakwazi ukuhluma ukusuka phezulu isibhakabhaka, ukususela isibhakabhaka uza yenza mnyama phantse imini yonke.
Ukususela iindawo musa inhabit ezininzi abantu, ukukhanya disturbance ayikho rhoqo ingxaki, uza kanjalo ukwazi ukuba bonwabele iinkwenkwezi.
Ukuba undwendwela indawo yeArctic okanye yeAantarctic ebusika ungabona ubusuku obuhlala ngaphezulu kweeyure ezingama-24, oko kuthetha ukuba ilanga alikho ngaphezulu kolundi.
Oku kunika ithuba elihle lokubona ukuKhanya okungaqhelekanga okuvela esibhakabhakeni esingasentla, njengoko isibhakabhaka siza kuba mnyama ixesha elininzi losuku.
Kuba iindawo zixinene kakhulu, kwaye ukuphazamiseka kokukhanya akunakufane kube yingxaki, uya kuba nakho ukuzonwabisa neenkwenkwezi.
Xa utyelela iindawo zase-Arctic okanye e-Aantarctic ebusika ungabona ubusuku obuthatha iiyure ezingaphezu kwama-24, oko kuthetha ukuba ilanga alisi ngaphezu komkhathwe.

Ekubeni iindawo zingahlali abantu abaninzi, ukuphazamisa kokukhanya kunqabile ukuba yingxaki, uya kuba nako ukunandipha iinkwenkwezi.

IZwe lase-Ellsworth liyindawo eseningizimu neNhlonhlo, likhawuliswe uLwandle iBellingshausen.
Izintaba zeNhlonhlo zihlangana enkangaleni, bese zihlangana futhi ukwakha uchungechunge lweziNtaba sase-Ellsworth, ezinqunywa phakathi yiGilesiya yase-Minnesota.
Ingxenye engasenyakatho noma iSentinel Range inezintaba eziphakeme kunazo zonke zase-Antarctica, iVinson Massif, ephakeme yaba ngu-4892 m iMount Vinson.
I-Ellsworth Land ngummandla ongakumzantsi woSinga-siqithi owahlulwa yi-Bellingshuasen Sea.
Iintaba zoSinga-siqithi zidibana apha nendawo ethe tyaba, emva koko ziphinde zenze iikhilomitha eziyi-360 Zeentaba ezidibeneyo ze-Ellsworth, zisahlulwa yi-Minnesota Glacier.
Inxalenye esemantla ye-Sentinel Range inezona ntaba ziphakamileyo zase-Antarctica, i-Vinson Massif, enencopho eyi-4892 yeemitha eMount Vinson.
Ilizwe Ellsworth ifumaneka kwi-e-afrika inxalenye peninsula, limited yi-Bellingshausen Yolwandle.
I-peninsula iintaba kuhlanganisa kwi-Prairie, kwaye reunite ukuba ifomu uthotho Ellsworth Iintaba, eziya kugqitywe phakathi Minnesota ke gilesia.
I-emntla yinxalenye i-valentine Umqolo sele ephezulu iintaba ka-e-antarctica, Uvinson Massif, phezulu ukuya 4,892 m Entabeni Uvinson.
I-Ellsworth imi kumazantsi ePeninsula, emdeni luLwandle iBellingshausen.
Iintaba zePeninsula ziyahlangana kwithafa, emva koko zidibane zenze i-Ellsworth Range, enqanyulwa ngesiqingatha ngamaGypsies aseMinnesota.

Njengoba ukuphazamisa kokukhanya ngesikhathi sokudlondlobala kwazo kwakungeyona inkinga okuyiyona namuhla, ngokuvamile zitholakala emadolobheni noma ezikoleni, zitholakala kalula kunalezo ezakhiwe ngezikhathi zanamuhla.
Izindawo eziningo ezaziwayo zesibonakude ziyizindawo ezingaziwa ezindaweni ezinesimo esithandekayo.
Indawo zemiboniso yakudala azisasetyenziswa unamhlanje, sezihleli njengemyuziyam, okanye iindawo zokufundisa.
Njengoko ukungcoliseka okungephi kokukhanya ngezo ntsuku kwakungeyongxaki efana nale yale mihla, kudla ngokubakho ezixekweni, okanye kwiziza ekulula ukuya kuzo kunezo zakhiwe kumaxesha angoku.
Izixhobo zophanda ezinintsi zalemihla ziluluhlu kwindawo ezisemva kwiimeko ezilungele oko.
Wangaphambili langoku mathiriyali ingaba rhoqo ayisasebenzi esetyenziswa namhlanje, kwaye bahlala kuzo amaziko olondolozo lwembali, okanye ukufundisa zephondo.

Ukususela disturbance kukukhanya kwindibano yayo ubude akazange a real ingxaki namhlanje, rhoqo zifunyanwa izixeko okanye izikolo, bamele ngakumbi afumaneka ngokuzenzekela ezikhoyo kunokuba abo wakha kwi-bale mihla phinda-phinda.
Abaninzi kakuhle-ezaziwayo telescope zephondo ingaba engaziwayo iindawo kwi-enqwenelekayo iimilo.
Izinto zangaphambili azisasetyenziswa ngoku namhlanje, kwaye zihlala kwiimyuziyam, okanye kumaziko okufundisa.
Kuba ukuphazamiseka kokukhanya ngexesha lokukhula kwabo kwakungeyona ngxaki namhlanje, zifumaneka ngokufuthi ezixekweni okanye ezikolweni, zifumaneka ngokulula kunalezo zakhiwe kumaxesha anamhlanje.
Ezona ndawo zidumileyo zeteleskopu ziindawo ezingaqhelekanga kubume bembonakalo yomhlaba.
Izinto zangaphambi kwexesha langoku zidla ngokuba zisasetyenziswa namhlanje, kwaye zihlala kumyuziyam, okanye iindawo zokufundisa.

Ekubeni ukuphazamisa kokukhanya ngexesha lokudlondlobala kwazo kwakungekho ngxaki apho namhlanje, ngokuqhelekileyo zifumaneka kwiidolophu okanye iindawo, zifumaneka lula kunezo zenziwe ngamaxesha zanamhlanje.
Iindawo ezininzi ezaziwayo-kakuhle ezibonakude ziindawo ezingaziwa kwiindawo ezinesimo esithandekayo.

Amabhasi asuka esiteshi samabhasi esiphakathi kwesifunda (ngaphesheya komfula) usuku lonke, nakuba amaningi, ikakhulukazi lawo aya ngasempumalanga naseJakar/Bumthang asuka phakathi kuka-06:30 no-07:30.
Njengoba amabhasi esifunda ngokuvamile egcwala, kuyatuseka ukuthi uthenge ithikithi ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ngaphambili.
Izigodi eziningi zikhonzwa amaBhasi we-Coaster waseJapani amancane, anethezekile naqinile.
Amatekisi ahlanganyelwayo ayindlela esheshayo nenethezekile yokuya ezindaweni eziseduze, njengase-Paro (Nu 150) kanye nase-Punakha (Nu 200).
Ibhasi zishiya isitishi I inter -district( ngapha komlambo) imini yonke,nangona unizi, ikakhulu ezo zibheka ngase east nase Jakar/Bumthang zihamba phakathi ko-06:30 no-07:30.
Nanjengoko iibhasi zesisithili zisoloko sigcwele, uyacetyiswa ukuba uthenge itikiti kuselithuba.
Izithili ezininzi zithuthwa zibhasi ezincinci zeJapanese Coaster, ezisemgangathweni zihamba nakakuhle.
Iteksi ozikhwela nabanye abantu yindlela ekhawulezayo nemnandi yokuya kwiindawo ezikufutshane, njengaseParo (Nu150) nasePunakha (Nu 200).
Iibhasi wemka i-jonga ibhasi sovavanyo (kwilizwe liphela river) imini yonke, nangona abaninzi, ingakumbi abo eastward kwaye jakar/Bumthang ukususela phakathi 06:30 kwaye 07:30.
Ukususela jonga iibhasi ingaba rhoqo wazaliswa oko, kucetyiswa ukuba kufuneka ukuthengwa a ticket kwiintsuku ezimbalwa ngaphambi koko.
Abaninzi valleys ingaba wasebenza yi-Isijapanese coaster iibhasi ukuba ingaba ezincinane, ethambileyo, kwaye ngamandla.
Usharedi taxis ziindleko olukhawulezayo kwaye ethambileyo indlela ukufumana ezikufutshane iindawo, ezifana Paro (nu 150) kwaye Punakha (nu 200).
Iibhasi zisuka kwisikhululo sebhasi (ngaphesheya komlambo) imini yonke, nangona uninzi, ngakumbi uninzi lwasempuma yeJakar / Bumthang lusuka ngo-06: 30 no-07: 30.
Kuba iibhasi zesithili zihlala zigcwele, kuyacetyiswa ukuba uthenge itikiti kwiintsuku ezimbalwa kwangaphambili.
Iintlambo ezininzi zinikezelwa ziibhasi ezincinci ezomeleleyo, ezentofontofo nezomeleleyo zaseJapan.
Iiteksi ekwabelwana ngazo yindlela ekhawulezayo nekhululekileyo yokufika kwiindawo ezikufutshane, ezinje ngeParo (Nu 150) kunye nePunakha (Nu 200).
Iibhasi zazisuka kwisitishi seebhasi esiphakathi komlambo imini yonke, nangona zininzi, ingakumbi ezo ziya ngasempuma naseJakar/Bumthang zazisuka phakathi ko-06:30 no-07:30.
Ekubeni iibhasi zengingqi zidla ngokuzala, kuyatyekwa ukuba uthenge itikiti kwiintsuku ezimbalwa ngaphambili.
Iintlambo ezininzi zikhonzwa ngamaBhasi e-Coaster yaseJapan amancinci, anethezekile naqinile.
Iiteksi ezidibeneyo ziyindlela ekhawulezileyo nenethezekile yokuya kwiindawo ezikufutshane, ezifana neParo (Nu 150) kunye nePunakha (Nu 200).
Iibhasi zisuka kwisikhululo sebhasi (ngaphesheya komlambo) imini yonke, nangona uninzi, ngakumbi abo baya empuma eJakar/Bumthang bemka phakathi ko-06: 30 no-07: 30.
Njengoko iibhasi zommandla zihlala zigcwele, kuyacetyiswa ukuba uthenge itikiti kwiintsuku ezimbalwa ngaphambili.
Izigulane ezininzi zinikezelwa ziibhasi ezincinci ezomeleleyo, ezentofontofo nezomeleleyo.

Amabhasi asuka kwisikhululo samabhasi esiphakathi kwesithili (ngaphesheya komlambo) imini yonke, nangona amaninzi, ngokukodwa lawo aya ngasempumalanga naseJakar/Bumthang asuka phakathi kwe-06:30 no-07:30.
Njengoko ibhasi esifunda ngokubanzi egcwala, kuyatuseka ukuba uthenge itikiti kwiintsuku ezimbalwa ngaphambili.
Iigodi ezininzi zikhonzwa kwiiBhanki zeCoaster zaseJapan ezincinci, zinamathelisiwe kunye neqinile.
Iinqwelo-moya ezibandakanyekayo ziyindlela ekhawulezayo nethezekileyo yokuya kwiindawo ezikufutshane, njengaseParo (Nu 150) kunye nePunakha (Nu 200).
Ukusetshenziswa kohlelo lwevidiyo kuholele kukwazisa okubalulekile ekuchazweni kokuziveza okuncane kakhulu, ukunyakaza kobuso okuthatha imizuzwana.
Ikakhulu, kuthiwa umuntu angabona ukuthi umuntu uqamba amanga ngokuchachisa izibonakaliso zobuso ezincane ngokunembile.
U-Oliver Sack ephepheni lakhe lNkulumo kaMongameli, uphawule ukuthi abantu okunzima ngabo ukuqonda inkulumo ngenxa yokulimala engqondweni bayakwazi ukubona ubuqotho ngokunembile.
Futhi usikisele nokuthi amakhono anjalo wokuchaza indlela yokuziphatha yabantu angahlanganyelwa nezilwane ezinjengezinja ezifuywayo.
Ukusetyenziswa kwe-video nokurekhoda kwenzele ukufunywana okubalulekileyo ekqondeni iimbonakalo ezincinci zokutshintsha kobuso, iintshukumo zobuso ezithatha imizuzwananana embalwa.
Ngokukhethekileyo, kuthiwa umntu angakwazi ukubona ukuba omnye umntu uyaxoka ngokwazi ukutolika kakuhle izinto eziboniswa bubuso bakhe.
U-Oliver Sacks, kwiphepha lakhe i-The President’s Speech, wabonisa ukuba abantu abangakwazi kuqonda intetho ngenxa yomonzakalo engqondweni bayakwazi ukufikelela enyanisweni ngokuchanileyo.
Ude acebise ngelithi indlela yokwazi ukutolika izimbo zomntu isenokubakho nakwizilwanyana ezifana nenja zekhaya.
Ukusetyenziswa ividiyo lwenkqubo kukhokelela ezibalulekileyo appreciation kuba inkcazo ye encinane, ukubonisa, imizuzwana-lasting facial yokuhamba-hamba.
Ingakumbi, kuthiwa namnye unako khangela ukuba umntu ethiwe yi-ngokuchanekileyo ecacisa ezincinane facial yenza ingxenye yesakhelo.
Uoliver Engxoweni yakhe, umongameli ke intetho iphepha iqaphele ukuba abantu abathe ubunzima ukuqonda intetho ngenxa mental injury bayakwazi ukubona ingqiqo ngokuchanekileyo.
Kanjalo wacebisa ukuba enjalo uphuhliso lwezakhono ukuze zichaza oluntu ukuziphatha kusenokuba zabelana pets njenge izinja.
Ukusetyenziswa kwenkqubo yevidiyo kukhokelele kulwazi oluxabisekileyo kwinkcazo yento encinci kakhulu, imbonakalo yobuso yemizuzwana.
Ngokukodwa, kuthiwa umntu angabona ukuba umntu uxoka ngokuchonga ngokucacileyo ubuso obuncinci bobuso.
U-Oliver Sack, kwiphepha lakhe iNtetho kaMongameli, uqaphele ukuba abantu abanobunzima bokuqonda intetho ngenxa yokudodobala kwengqondo bayakwazi ukubona ukunyaniseka ngokuchanekileyo.
Ucebise ukuba indlela yokuziphatha echaza indlela yokuziphatha kwabantu kunokwabelwana ngayo nezilwanyana ezinje ngezilwanyana zasekhaya.

Ngokukodwa, kuthiwa umntu unokubona ukuba umntu uhamba ubuxoki ngokuchachisa imiqondiso yobuso encinci ngokuchanekileyo.

Ukuhamba kweZimoto ucwaningo lwabashayeli ngabanye nezimoto phakathi kwezindawo ezimbili kanye nokusebenzelana kwazo.
Ngeshwa, ukucwaninga ukuhamba kwezimoto kunzima ngoba imikhuba yabashayeli angeke ibikezelwe ngokuqiniseka okuphelele.
Ngenhlanhla, abashayeli bathambekele ekuziphatheni ngendlela ecishe ifane; ngakho ukuminyana kwezimoto kuthambekele ekufaneni futhi cishe kungafanekiswa ngokwezibalo.
Ukufanisa kangcono ukuhamba kwezimoto, ubudlelwane bumisiwe phakathi kwezici ezintathu eziyinhloko: (1) ukuhamba, (2) ukuminyana, kanye (3) nesivinini.
Lobu budlelwane buyasiza ekuhleleni, ekuklameni, kanye nasekusebenziseni izakhiwo zasemgwaqweni.
Ukuhamba Kwemoto kukufunda ngokuhamba komqhubi ngamnye neemoto ukusuka kwenye indawo ukuya kwenye indawo nendlela abaqhubana ngayo omnye nomnye.
Ngelishwa, ukufunda ukuphokoka komthamo wezithuthi kunzima kuba izimbo zomqhubi azikwazi kuthelekeleka ngokugqibeleleyo.
Ngethamsanqa, abaqhubi badla ngokuziphatha kakuhle phakathi kuluhlu olufanelekileyo; Ke, imijelo yendlela ithambekele ekubeni nokungaguquguquki okufanelekileyo kwaye inokumelwa ngokwezibalo.
Ukuba ngumeli ongcono wokuhamba kwetrafikhi, ubudlelwane busekiwe phakathi kweempawu ezintathu eziphambili: (1) ukuhamba, (2) uxinano, kunye (3) nesantya.
Olu lwalamano lunceda ukucebeni, ukuyileni nasekusebenzeni kweendlela.
Traffic trips umntu abaqhubi umfanekiso ' experiments kwaye izithuthi phakathi ezimbini kwiindawo zabo unxulumano oluqhubekayo nentsebenziswano.
Ngelishwa, uphando kwi traffic iitshati ufumana kunzima ngenxa yokuba abaqhubi umfanekiso ' ukuba azinako kwaxelwayo kunye elililo ukuqiniseka.
Ngethamsanqa, abaqhubi umfanekiso bakholisa ukuba kuziphatha ngendlela efanayo indlela; ke traffic congestion tends ukuba abe identical kwaye ingaba mhlawumbi kuba ngokuzekelisayo illustrated.
Ngcono thelekisa traffic, ubudlelwane wenziwe obububo phakathi ezintathu imibandela engundoqo: (1) Ukhenketho, (2) congestion, kunye (3) isantya.
Oku association ikunceda ukuba amisele, uyilo, kwaye sebenzisa street izakhiwo.
Iinqwelo mafutha sisifundo somqhubi kunye nezithuthi phakathi kweendawo ezimbini kunye nokunxibelelana kwazo.
Ngelishwa, ukuphanda itrafikhi kunzima kuba indlela yokuziphatha komqhubi ayinakuqikelelwa ngokuqinisekileyo ngokuqinisekileyo.
Ngethamsanqa, abaqhubi badla ngokuziphatha ngendlela efanayo; Ukuxinana kwetrafiki kuhlala kufana kwaye kungaphantse kuboniswe ngemathematika.
Ukudibanisa ngcono ukugcwala, ubudlelwane busekwa phakathi kwezinto ezintathu eziphambili: (1) ukuhamba, (2) ukuxinana, kunye (3) nesantya.
Obu budlelwane buyanceda ekucwangciseni, ekuyileni nasekufezekiseni izakhiwo zezitalato.
Ukuhamba kweTshazimpuzi kuphando lwabhexeshi ngabanye kunye nezixhobo phakathi kweendawo ezimbini kunye nokusebenza kwazo.
Ngelishwa, ukuphanda ukuhamba kweemoto kunzima kuba iindlela zabaqhubi abayi kuqikelelwa ngokuqinisekileyo.
Ngethamsanqa, abaqhubi bathambekele ekuziphatheni ngendlela ngaphezulu kwexesha; ngoko ukuxinana kweemoto kuthambekele ekufaneni kwaye mhlawumbi kungafanekiswa ngokweemathematika.
Ukufanisa ngcono ukuhamba kweemoto, ubudlelwane bamiselwa phakathi kweempawu ezintathu eziphambili: (1) ukuhamba, (2) ukuxinana, kunye (3) nesantya.
Olu budlelwane luncedo ekucwangciseni, ukudlamba, kunye nokusetyenziswa kwezakhiwo zasezitratweni.
Ukuhamba kweZimoto uphando lwabaqhubi ngabanye kunye neemoto phakathi kweendawo ezimbini kunye nokusebenzelana kwazo.
Ngeshwa, ukuphanda itrafikhi kunzima kuba indlela yokuziphatha komqhubi ayinakuqikelelwa ngokuqinisekileyo ngokuqinisekileyo.
Lucky, abaqhubi bakholisa ekuphatheni ngendlela efanayo; ngoko inyana kweemoto bakholisa faneni kwaye phantse fanekiselwa ngokwezibalo.

Isilingo sika-Hershey no-Chase bekungokunye kokusikisela okuhamba phampili kokuthi iDNA isakhi sofuzo.
U-Hershey noChase basebenzise ama-phages, noma amagciwane, ukuthi bafake i-DNA yabo phakathi kwebhakithiliya.
Benze izivivinyo ezimbili ngokwenza i-DNA nge-phage besebenzisa iphosphorus ye-radioactive noma amaprotheni e-phage nge-sulfur ye-radioactive.
Uvavanyo lweHershey kunye noChase yenye yeengcebiso eziphambili zokuba iDNA yayiyinto yemfuza.
U-Hershey no-Chase basebenzise ii-phages, okanye ii-virus, ukufaka i-DNA yabo kwintsholongwane.
Benza iimvavanyo ezimbini zokumakisha nokuba yi-DNA kwipheji ene-radioactive phosphorus okanye iprotheni ye-phage enesalfure eqhumayo.
I-ekuhendweni ka-Hershey kunye Nokususa kwakukho omnye forefront iziphakamiso ukuba DNA ufumana i-gene.
Hershey kunye nokususa kusetyenziswa phages, okanye viruses, ndibeke zabo kwi DNA iintsholongwane.
Baye zimbini Iindidi kuqhutywa yi-DNA ngokusebenzisa phage usebenzisa radioactive phosphorus okanye phage proteins kunye radioactive sulfur.
Uvavanyo lukaHershey kunye noChase yenye yezona ngcebiso zibalaseleyo kwindlela iDNA enokwenziwa ngayo yemfuza.

Benze iimvavanyo ezimbini nge-DNA ngokusebenzisa i-phosphorus okanye i-phage protein ene-radioactive sulfur.

Izindawo zokuvakasha ezingokwemvelo zikhanga abantu abathanda ukuvakashela izindawo ezingokwemvelo ngenhloso yokujabulela ukubuka indawo, kuhlanganise izitshalo nezilwane zasendle.
Izibonelo zemisebenzi eyenziwa endaweni zihlanganisa ukuzingela, ukudoba, ukuthatha izithombe, ukubuka izinyoni, kanye nokuvakashela amapaki nokufunda ukwaziswa okumayelana nezinto eziphilayo.
Isibonelo ukuvakasha, ukuthatha izithombe, kanye nokufunda ngama-orangatan eBorneo.
Ukhenketho lwabatyeleli olusekelwe kwindalo lutsala abantu abanomdla wokutyelela ngenjongo yokubuka indalo kuquka izityalo kunye nezilwanyana zasendle.
Imizekelo yokwenzekayo esaythini iquka ukuzingela, ukuloba, ukufota, ukubukela iintaka, ukundwendwela kwiipaki nokufunda ngolwazi lwendalo.
Umzekelo kukundwendwela, ufote kwaye ufunde nge organgatuangs e orneo.
Yendalo nokhenketho attracts yendalo abakhenkethi ngenjongo enjoying sightseeing, kuquka wildlife kwaye flora.
Imizekelo wobulali imisebenzi iquka hunting, fishing, photographing, bird-elindile, ngokunjalo makhaya lemiyezo kwaye ukufunda biological ulwazi.
Umzekelo utyelelo, iifoto, kwaye orangatan ukufunda kwi-Borneo.
Iindawo ekuchithelwa kuzo iiNdalo zitsalela abantu abathanda ukutyelela oovimba bendalo ngeenjongo zokunandipha ubuhle bendalo, kubandakanya izityalo kunye nezilwanyana zasendle.
Imizekelo yemisebenzi yasekuhlaleni ibandakanya ukuzingela, ukuloba, ukufota, ukubukela iintaka, nokutyelela iipaki kunye nokufunda ulwazi lwendalo.
Umzekelo ukutyelela, ukuthatha imifanekiso, kunye nokufunda nge-orangatan eBorneo.

Umzekelo utyelelo, ukuthatha imifanekiso kunye nokufunda ngee-orangatan eBorneo.

Umzekelo ukutyelela, ukuthatha iifoto, kunye nokufunda ngeorangatan eBorneo.

Ngokomzekelo, ukuthatha imifanekiso, kunye nokufunda ngama-orangatan eBorneo.
Ubuthi bangaphakathi kungezeka bungabonakali ngokushesha. Izimpawu, njengokuhlanza zanele ngokuvamile kangangokuthi umhlahlo wokushesha angeke wenziwe.
Isibonakaliso esihle kakhulu soshevu ovela ngaphakathi kungaba ukuba khona kwezitsha zemithi ezivulekile noma amakhemikhali wasendlini anobuthi.
Bheka ilebula ukuze ubone iziqondiso soziso lokuqala zalowo shevu.
Ityhefu engaphakathi ingangabonakali msinya. Iimpawu, njengokugabha ziqheleke kangangoba ingayenyinto egulisayo.
Eyona sayini yokuthyefeka kwangaphakathi kukubakho kwe container yeyeza okanye ikhemikhali ezisetyenziswayo ekhayeni ezinobungozi.
Jonga ileyibhile yemiyalelo yoncedo lokuqala malunga netyhefu ethile.
Yangaphakathi toxins alinakukhuselwa sifunyenwe ngoko nangoko. Imiqondiso, ezifana vomiting, ingaba ukutya kaninzi ukuba olukhawulezayo uqikelelo ayikwazi kwenziwa.
I-ezibalaseleyo indoor impawu ka-yangaphakathi izilwanyana nabantu kusenokuba ebusweni vula-zezulu containers okanye toxic khaya imichiza.
Bona umbhalo kuba imiyalelo okokuqala, xa kuthelekiswa ukuba tyhefu.
Ityhefu yangaphakathi isenokungabonakali kwangoko. Iimpawu, ezinjengokugabha zihlala zinzima kangangokuba ukuxilongwa ngokukhawuleza akunakwenziwa.
Isalathi esigqibeleleyo seetyhefu ezivela ngaphakathi iya kuba bubukho bezikhongozeli ezivulekileyo zamayeza okanye imichiza yekhaya enetyhefu.
Jonga ileyibhile ukufumana imiyalelo ngoncedo lokuqala kwityhefu leyo.
Amayeza angaphakathi ayengabonakali ngokukhawuleza. Iimpawu, njengokucoca zaneleyo ngokuqhelekileyo kangangokuba umkhwa wokukhawuleza awusayi kwenziwa.
Uphawu olubalaseleyo lweshevu oluvela ngaphakathi lunokuba kukho izitya zamachiza ezivulekileyo okanye iikhemikhali zendlu ezinobuthi.
Jonga ileyibhile ukuze ubone izikhokelo zokuqala zaloo shevu.
Ubuthi bangaphakathi bungabonakali ngokukhawuleza. Iimpawu, njengokucoca ngokwaneleyo kangangokuba ukuxilongwa ngokukhawuleza akunakwenziwa.
Uphawu oluhle kakhulu lweevevu ezivela ngaphakathi kunokuba ubukho bezikhongozeli ezivulekileyo zamayeza okanye imichiza yekhaya enobuthi.
Yabona ilebula ukubona izikhokelo zoziso lokuqala zalowo evu.
Ubuthi bangaphakathi bungabonakali ngokukhawuleza. Iimpawu, njengokucoca ngokwaneleyo ngokubanzi kangangokuba umhlahlo wokukhawuleza awuzange wenziwe.
Umqondiso ogqwesileyo weshevu ovela ngaphakathi unokuba khona kwiimpawu zemithi ezivulekileyo okanye iikhemikhali zendlu ezinobuncwane.
Khangela ileyibhile ukuze ubone izikhokelo soziso lokuqala shevu.
Ukufuya ama-reindeer indlela ebalulekile yokuziphilisa phakathi kwamaSámi futhi isiko elizungeze lomsebenzi libalulekile futhi nakwabanye abaneminye imisebenzi.

Ngisho nangokwesiko, nokho, akuwona wonke amaSámi ayehlanganyele ngokugcwele ekufuyeni izinyamazane, kodwa ayephila ngokudoba, ukuzingela nokufanayo, besebenzisa izinyamazane njengezilwane eziboshelwayo.
Namuhla abaningi abantu bama-Sámi abasebenza kwezohwebo zesimanje. Ezokuvakasha ngumholo obalulekile e-Sápmi, endaweni yama-Sámi.
Ukwalusa iiReindeer yindlela yokuziphilisa ebalulekileyo kumaSámi, ibe isiko elinokuthanani nolu shishino lubalulekile nakwanye abantu abenza eminye imisebenzi.
Nangokwesiko, nangona, hayi onke ama-Sámi anesandla ekuzingelweni kwamahlumela ngamandla, baphile ngokuloba, ukuzingela nokunjalo, benamahlumela njengezilwanyane zomsebenzi.
Kule mihla ama Sámi amaninzi asebenza kushishino lwalwamaxesha. Ukhenketho yeyona ngeniso eSápmi, kwindawo yama Sám.
Reindeer umsebenzi wokufama vital kuthetha ka-livelihood phakathi Sámi kwaye yesiko jikelele umsebenzi kanjalo kubalulekile ukuba abanye bathe eminye imisebenzi.

Nkqu traditionally, nangona kunjalo, asingabo bonke Sami kokuba epheleleyo share kwi-ukukhulisa antelope, kodwa bahlala yi-fishing, hunting, kwaye onjalo, usebenzisa antelope njengoko hooked izilwanyana.
Namhlanje abaninzi Sámi abantu umsebenzi bale mihla urhwebo. Yokhenketho yindlela ebalulekileyo umvuzo kwi-Sápmi, Sámi indawo.
Ukuzalisa i-reindeer yindlela ebalulekileyo yokuphila phakathi kweSámi kunye nenkcubeko ejikeleze umsebenzi kubalulekile nakwabanye abaneminye imisebenzi.

Ngokwesiqhelo, nangona kunjalo, ayingabo bonke abantu baseSámi ababebandakanyeke ngokupheleleyo ekulimeni amaxhama, kodwa babephila ngokuloba, ukuzingela, nokunye okunjalo, besebenzisa amaxhama njengexhoba.
Namhlanje uninzi lwabantu baseSámi basebenza kurhwebo lwale mihla. Ukhenketho ngumthombo obalulekileyo wengeniso yeSápmi, kwingingqi yeSami.
Ukufuya i-reindeer indlela ebalulekileyo yokuziphilisa phakathi kwamaSámi kwaye inkcubeko ejikeleze umsebenzi ibalulekile nakwabanye abaneminye imisebenzi.
Nangona kunjalo, ayikho onke amaSámi athatha inxaxheba ngokupheleleyo ekufuyeni iinyamakazi, kodwa ayephila ngokuloba, ukuzingela nokufanayo, usebenzisa iinyamakazi njengezilwanyana ezibotshelwayo.
Namhlanje baninzi abantu bakwa-Sámi abasebenza kwizorhwebo ezikhoyo. Ezokhenketho ngumvuzo obalulekileyo e-Sápmi, kwindawo yama-Sámi.

Ngokwesiqhelo, nangona kunjalo, ayingabo bonke abantu baseSámi ababebandakanyeke ngokupheleleyo ekulimeni amaxhama, kodwa babephila ngokuloba, ukuzingela, nokunye okunjalo, besebenzisa amaxhama njengexhoba.
Namhlanje uninzi lwabantu baseSámi basebenza kurhwebo lwale mihla. Ukutyelela ngumholo obalulekileyo we-Sápmi, kwindawo yeSámi.
Ukufuya i-reindeer indlela ebalulekileyo yokuziphilisa phakathi kwamaSámi kwaye inkcubeko ejikeleze umsebenzi ibalulekile kunye nakwabanye abaneminye imisebenzi.

Nangona kunjalo, nangona kunjalo, akuwona onke amaSámi abandakanyeka ngokupheleleyo ekufuyeni kwenyamakazi, kodwa ayephila ngokuloba, ukuzingela nokufanayo, besebenzisa iinyamakazi njengezilwanyana eziboshelwayo.
Namhlanje abantu abaninzi bamaSámi abasebenza kurhwebo lwale mihla. Ukhenketho ngumvuzo obalulekileyo kwiSápmi, kwindawo yeSámi.
Ipaki lezwe lePlitvice Lakes ligcwele izihlahla kakhulu, ngokuyinhloko line-beech, i-spruce, kanye nezihlahla ze-fir, futhi inenhlanganisela yezimila zase-Alps kanye naseMedithera.
Inezinhlobo eziningi eziphawulekayo zemiphakathi yezitshalo, ngenxa yokwahluka kwesimo sezilu sayo esikahle, umhlabathi ongafani kanye namazinga okuphakama ahlukile.
Lendawo ibuye ibe yikhaya lezinhlobo ezingi zezilwane kanye nezinyoni.

Izilwane eziyivelakancane ezinjengebhere elinsundu laseYurophu, impisi efana nenketshane, ukhozi, isikhova, indabushe, ikati lasendle kanye ne-capercaillie zingatholakala lapho, kanye nezinye izinhlobo ezivamile.
I-Plitvice Lakes ipaka karhulumente inamahlathi amaninzi, uninzi lwawo yimithi ye-beech, ye-spruce nelohlobo oluthile lompayina
Ineentlobo zezityalo ezahlukahlukeneyo, ngenxa yokulungela kwayo imozulu yeendawo ezincinci, umhlaba owahlukileyo kunye nokwahluka kweendawo eziphakamileyo.
Le ndawo ikwalikhaya kwizilwanyana neentaka ezininzi ezahlukahlukeneyo.
Izilwanyana ezinqabileyo ezifana nebhere laseYurophu elintsundu, iingcuka, ukhozi, isikhova, ingqawa, ikati yasendle kunye ne-lowe zezinye zezidalwa eziqhelekileyo.
Ilizwe Park ka-Plitvice Lakes ngu ukuzaliswa imithi, ikakhulu Beech, spruce, kwaye fir imithi, kwaye sele a mixture ka-Alps kwaye Mediterranean izityalo.
Oko sele ezininzi notable iintlobo ezithile ka-tyala populations, ngenxa yabo namanani Beetle imeko, ezahlukeneyo emhlabeni kwaye ezahlukeneyo elevation amanqanaba.
Indawo kanjalo ekhaya abaninzi ke ngoko ezilwanyana kwaye iintaka.
Rare izilwanyana ezifana European brown ubungqina, i-wild wolf, I-Eagle, I-Owl, Imvana, i-wild cat, kwaye capercaillie ingafunyanwa apho, ngokunjalo nezinye ngokufanayo ke ngoko.
IPlitvice Lakes National park ityebile kwimithi yetropiki, ikakhulu i-beech, i-spruce, kunye nemithi yemisipres, kwaye likhaya kumxube weAlps kunye nezityalo zeMeditera.
Ineentlobo ezininzi zezityalo, ngenxa yeemeko zemozulu ezohlukeneyo, imihlaba eyahlukileyo kunye neendawo eziphakamileyo ezahlukeneyo.
Le ndawo ikwalikhaya leentlobo ezininzi zezilwanyana neentaka.

Izilwanyana ezinqabileyo ezinjengeebhere ezimdaka zaseYurophu, ingcuka efana nengcuka, ukhozi, isikhova, iqwarhashe, ikati yasendle kunye ne-capercaillie ziyafumaneka apho, kunye nezinye iintlobo eziqhelekileyo.
Ipaki yelizwe lePlitvice Lakes izele yimithi emininzi, ngokuyintloko kumgca we-beech, i-spruce, kunye nemithi ye-fir, kwaye inendibaniselwano yeendlela zaseAlps kunye neMeditera.
Iintlobo ezininzi eziphawulekayo zezityalo, ngenxa yokwahluka kwesimo sezilwanyana zaso esifanelekileyo, umhlaba ongafaniyo kunye namanqanaba okuphakama ahlukileyo.
Le ndawo ibuye ibe likhaya leentlobo ezininzi zezilwanyana kunye neentaka.
Izilwanyana ezifana ne-European brown, ingcuka efana ne-ketch, ukhozi, isikhova, indabushe, ikati lasendle kunye ne-capercaillie zinokufumaneka apho, kunye nezinye iintlobo eziqhelekileyo.
IPlitvice Lakes National park ityebile kwimithi yetropiki, ikakhulu i-beech, i-spruce, kunye nemithi yemisipres, kwaye umxube wezityalo zeAlpine neMeditera.
Iintlobo ezininzi zezityalo, ngenxa yeemeko zemozulu, imihlaba eyahlukileyo kunye neendawo eziphakamileyo ezahlukeneyo.
Le ndawo ikwalikhaya leentlobo ezininzi zezilwanyana neentaka.
Eyona nto ibaluleke kakhulu njenge-brown yaseYurophu, ingcuka efana nengcuka, ukhozi, isikhova, ushe, ikati yasendle kunye ne-capercaillie inokufumaneka apho, kunye nezinye iintlobo eziqhelekileyo.
Ipaki yelizwe lePlitvice Lakes igcwele kakhulu imithi, ngokukodwa i-beech, i-spruce, kunye nemithi ye-fir, kwaye indibaniso ye-Alps kunye neMedithera.
Iindidi ezininzi eziphawulekayo zemiphakathi yezityalo, ngenxa yokwahluka kwesimo sayo esifanelekileyo, umhlabathi ongafaniyo kunye namanqanaba okuphakama ahlukile.
Le ndawo ibuye ibe likhaya leentlobo zeentaka kunye neentaka.

Izilwanyana ezincinci ezifana nebhere emdaka yaseYurophu, imfazwe efana nenketshane, ukhozi, isikhova, indabushe, ikati yasendle kunye necapercaillie inokufumaneka apho, kunye nezinye iintlobo eziqhelekileyo.
Amaqembu abukeka njengangokoqobo aphathwa ngezimiso ezifanayo zobuhle njengamaqembu angokwesiko, kepha kunomehluko ocashile.
Amalungu weqembu wekhompyutha avame ukusebenza njengendawo yokuxhumana yamalungu aseduze kakhulu eqembu elingokoqobo.
Ngokuvamile banenkululeko yokuzimela kakhulu kunamalungu eqembu avamile njengoba amaqembu abo angahlangana ngokuya ngezikhathi zendawo ezihlukene okungenzeka kungaqondwa abaphathi basendaweni.
Ukuba khona “kweqembu elingabonakali” langempela (uLarson noLaFasto, 1989, k109) kubuye kube yisici esikhethekile seqembu ekungelona elingokoqobo.
Iqembu elingabonakali iqembu labaphathi lelo ilungu ngalinye elilandisa kubo. Iqembu elingabonakali libekela ilungu ngalinye izindinganiso.
Amaqela asebenza kwi-Intanetha kufuneka afikelele imilinganiselo ekwizinga elinye nalawo aqhelekileyo, kodwa kukho umahluko omncinci.
Amalungu eqela elifanelekileyo ahlala esebenza njengendawo yokunxibelelana neqela labo lomzimba.
Bahlala benokuzimela ngakumbi kunamalungu eqela eliqhelekileyo njengoko amaqela abo anokuhlangana ngokwamaxesha ahlukeneyo angenakuqondwa ngabaphathi babo basekuhlaleni.
Ubukho beqela "elingabonakaliyo" lokwenyani (uLarson noLaFasto, 1989, p109) ikwayinto eyodwa kwiqela elibonakalayo.
“Iqela elingabonakaliyo” liqela elilawulayo apho amagosa enikezela ingxelo kulo. Iqela elingabnakaliyo libeka izinga legosa ngalinye.
Oonombumba-jonga amaqela ingaba wamanzi acociweyo kunye efanayo aesthetic imigaqo njengoko esiqhelekileyo amaqela, kodwa kukho subtle umahluko.
Ikhompyutha gang amalungu rhoqo ukukhonza njengokuba loluntu womnatha kuba nearest amalungu ukuthelekisa gang.

Baya rhoqo kuba ngaphezulu ukuzimela kunokuba nokuqheleka gang amalungu njengoko wabo njengesiqhelo unako kuhlangana ngokomthetho ezahlukeneyo wobulali umphinda-phinde ngo ukuba yengingqi ulawulo alinakukhuselwa ndaqonda.
I-ubukho be a real "invisible iqela" (Larson kwaye lafasto, 1989, k109) kanjalo okhethekileyo umsebenzi we-nonreal iqela.
I-engabonakaliyo qela ulawulo iqela abo ilungu ngalinye relates. I-engabonakaliyo iqela imisela imigangatho kuba ilungu ngalinye.
Amaqela ajongeka ngathi ayinyani aphathwa ngemigaqo efanayo yobuhle njengamaqela emveli, kodwa kukho umahluko ocashileyo.
Amalungu eqela lekhompyuter ahlala esebenza njengendawo yokunxibelelana nabantu kumalungu eqela lokwenyani.
Bahlala benenkululeko ethe kratya kunamalungu eqela eliqhelekileyo njengoko amaqela abo anokuhlangana ngokwamaxesha ahlukeneyo asekuhlaleni abanokuthi bangawaqondi amagunya asekuhlaleni.
Ubukho "beqela elingabonakaliyo" lokwenyani (uLarson noLaFasto, 1989, k109) ikwayinto ekhethekileyo yeqela elingekhoyo.
Iqela elingabonakaliyo liqela lolawulo elinoxanduva lokuphendula kwilungu ngalinye. Iqela elingabonakaliyo liseta imigangatho kwilungu ngalinye.
Amaqela abukeka njengoko ngokwenene baphathwa ngemigaqo efanayo yobuhle njengamaqela enkcubeko, kodwa kukho umahluko otyeshileyo.
Amalungu eqela leekhompyutha ahlala esebenza njengendawo yokunxibelelana kwamalungu asondele kakhulu kwiqela lokwenene.

Ngokuqhelekileyo banenkululeko yokuzimela ngakumbi kunamalungu eqela aqhelekileyo njengoko amaqela abo anokudibana ngokuxhomekeke kumaxesha ahlukeneyo asekuhlaleni enokuthi ingaqondwa ngabaphathi basekhaya.
Ubukho "kweqela elingabonakaliyo" lokwenene (uLarson noLaFasto, 1989, k109) kuye kubekho yinto ekhethekileyo yeqela ekungekho nyaniso.
Iqela elingabonakaliyo liqela labaphathi elo lilungu ngalinye lilandisa kubo. Iqela elingabonakaliyo libekela ilungu ngalinye imigangatho.

Ukuthenga izimpahla ezingakhokhiswa intela kuyithuba lokuthenga izimpahla ezikhishwe izintela kanye nentela yezimpahla ezindaweni ezithile.
Izihambi eziya emazweni akhokhisa intela ephezulu kwesinye isikhathi zingonga imali eningi, ikakhulukazi emikhiqizweni efana neziphuzo ezidakayo nogwayi.
I-Duty free shopping lithuba lokuthenga izinto kodwa ungabhataliswa itax yaye yenziwa kwezinye indawo.
Abahambi abaya kumazwe abiza irhafu eninzi, banokonga imali eninzi ngamanye amaxesha, ingakumbi kwiimveliso ezifana notywala okanye icuba.
Ukuthenga taxable izinto ufumana ithuba ukuthenga impahla extracted ukusuka irhafu kunye nempahla irhafu kwiindawo ezithile.
Travelers abo bahamba ukuya phezulu iirhafu unako ngamanye amaxesha ngaphandle kakhulu imali, ingakumbi kwiimveliso ezifana alcoholic beverages kwaye icuba.
Ukuthenga izinto ezingarhafisiyo lithuba lokuthenga izinto ezingahlawulisi rhafu kunye neerhafu zepropathi kwiindawo ezithile.
Abahambi kumazwe anerhafu ephezulu ngamanye amaxesha banokugcina imali eninzi, ngakumbi kwiimveliso ezinje ngeziyobisi ezinxilisayo kunye necuba.
Ukuthenga impahla enokuhlawulwa kwerhafu kuyithuba lokuthenga impahla ekhutshwe iirhafu kunye neerhafu zeempahla kwiindawo ezithile.
Abahambi abaya kumazwe bahlawula irhafu ephezulu ngamanye amaxesha bangonga imali eninzi, ngakumbi kwiimveliso ezifana neziselo zogwayi.

Ukuthenga iimpahla ezingahlawuliswa irhafu yithuba lokuthenga iimpahla ezikhutshwe irhafu kunye nerhafu yeempahla kwiindawo ezithile.
Iindwendwe eziya kumazwe ahlawulisa irhafu ephezulu ngamanye amaxesha zingonga imali eninzi, ngokukodwa kwiimveliso ezifana neziphuzo ezidakayo kunye nogwayi.
Ukubhukha kusenesikhathi kunikeza isihambi ukuthula kwengqondo kokuthi sizoba nendawo yokulala kuyo lapho sifika endaweni esiya kuyo.
Izinkampani ezihlela uhambo kaningi ziba nezaphulelo namahhotela athile, nakuba ungakwazi ukubhukha ezinye izinhlobo zokuhlala, njengendawo yamakamu, ngenkampani ehlela uhambo.

Izinkampani ezihlela uhambo zinikeza inhlanganisela yezinto ezihlanganisa ibhulakufesi, amalungiselelo wezinto zokuthutha zokuya/zokusuka esikhumulweni sezindiza noma isethi ehlangene yendiza kanye nehhotela.
Bayakwazi ukukugcinela indawo uma wena usadinga isikhathi sokucabanga noma usafisa ukulungisa izinto ezithinta uhambo lwakho (isibonelo i-visa).
Noma iziphi izinguquko noma izicelo nokho kumelwe zidluliselwe enkampanini ehlela uhambo kuqala futhi hhayi nehhotela ngokuqondile.
Ukubhukisha ngaphambi kwexesha kunika abakhweli uxolo lwengqondo lokuba baya kuba nendawo ethile yokulala nje akuba befika kwindawo abaya kuyo.

Abalungiseleli babahambi babanezivumelwano nehotela ezithile, nagona unokufumana kukwazeka ukubhukisha ezinye indlela zendawo zokufikela, njengendawo zokukhempisha, ngokusebenzisa abalungiseleli babahambi.

Iiarhente zokuhamba zihlala zibonelela ngeephakeji eziquka isidlo sakusasa, amalungiselelo okuthuthwa ukuya / ukusuka kwisikhululo seenqwelo-moya okanye uhambo ngepleyini oludityanisiweyo kunye neephakheji zehotele.
Bayakwazi nokukugcinela ibhukisho lwakho xa usadinga ixesha lokucinga ngesipho okanye usazama ezinye incwadi zokundwendwela kwakho ( umzekelo ivisa).
Naluphi utshintsho okanye isicelo simele siqale kumcebi wohambo singasiwa ngqo kwihotele.
Phambi kwexesha booking inika traveler uxolo lwengqondo ukuba uya kufumana indawo ukuya kulala akuba arrives ngexesha lakhe engqongileyo.
Ukuhamba nee-arhente rhoqo kunikela discounts kwaye ezithile hotels, nangona ungakwazi ncwadi nezinye iintlobo accommodations, efana campsite, kuba uhambo-arhente.
Ukuhamba ucwangciso iinkampani kunikela umdibaniso mathiriyali kuquka sakusasa, ezibanzi zezothutho amalungiselelo ukuba/ukususela airport okanye zidibene set of airplane kwaye hotel.
Babe bayakwazi anisindise indawo xa usenama-kufuneka ixesha ucinga ngxi okanye unqwenela ukwenza ulungelelwaniso ukuba kuchaphazela yakho uhambo (umzekelo i-visa).
Naluphi na utshintsho okanye izicelo kufuneka sithunyelwe inkampani ucwangciso uhambo lokuqala kwaye hayi ngqo hotel.
Ukubhukisha kwangethuba kunika umhambi uxolo lwengqondo lokuba siza kuba nendawo yokulala xa sifika apho siya khona.
Iiarhente zokuhamba zihlala zinika izaphulelo kunye neehotele, nangona usenokukwazi ukubhukisha indawo yokuhlala, enjengeendawo zokuhlala inkampu, kunye nearhente yokuhamba.

Ukubuka ama-cherry eqhakaza, okwaziwa ngokuthi i-hanami, kube ingxenye yesiko laseJapani kusukela ngekhulu lama-8 leminyaka.
Umcabango uvela eShayina lapho izimbali zepulamu kwakuyimbali ethandwayo.
EJapani, imicimbi yokuqala yokuqhakaza kwama-cherry yabungazwa umbusi eyibungazela yena kuphela kanye namanye amalungu ohlobo lobukhosi lwasezweni Esigodlweni saseBukhosini.
Ukudubula kweziqhamo ezibomvu okwaziwa njengehanami, bekusoloko kuyinxalenye yenkcubeko yaseJapan ukususela ngenkulungwane ye-8.
Eli cebo livela eTshayina apho indubulo yeeplamu kwakuyintyantyambo ethandwayo.
EJapan, eyokuqala ipati yecherry blossom yabanjwa ngukumkani esenzela yena kuphela kunye namalungu obuhandibay kwinkundla ze-Imperial.
Ukubukela i-Khangela-natal, eyaziwa ngokuba hanami, wenziwe ukuba yinxalenye Isijapanese inkcubeko ukususela 8th century.
Ngaba wayecinga ukuba ivela China apho plum iintyatyambo baba a ethandwa kakhulu flower.
Kwi-Japan, yokuqala celebrations ka-cherry blossoms baba entertained yi-emperor kuphela ngokunjalo yi-amanye amalungu endibano Yesizwe nobukumkani kwi-royal palace.
Ukujonga iintyatyambo ze-cherry, ezaziwa njenge-hanami, bekuyinxalenye yenkcubeko yaseJapan ukusukela kwinkulungwane ye-8.
Umbono uvela e-China apho iintyatyambo zeplum ziyintyatyambo edumileyo.
EJapan, iintyatyambo zokuqala zetsheri zazibhiyozelwa ngukumkani, zibhiyozelwa nguye kuphela kunye namanye amalungu osapho lwasebukhosini kwiRoyal Palace.
Ukujonga ii-cherry eziqhakaza, ezaziwa ngokuba yi-hanami, zibe yinxalenye yesithethe saseJapan ukususela kwinkulungwane ye-8.
Ingcinga ivela e-China apho iintyatyambo zeplagi zintyatyambo zaziintyatyambo.
E-Japan, imicimbi yokuqala ye-cherry yabucala yirhuluneli eyayingqina kuphela kunye namanye amalungu ohlobo lobungangamsha kwilizwe kwibhotwe laseBukhosini.
Ukujonga i-cherry eqhakaza, okwaziwa ngokuba yi-hanami, ibe yinxalenye yenkcubeko yaseJapan ukususela ngenkulungwane ye-8.
Ingcamango evela eShayina apho iintyatyambo zeplum ziyimbali ethandwayo.
EJapan, iintyatyambo zokuqala zetsheri zazibhiyozelwa ngukumkani, zibhiyozelwa nguye kuphela kunye namanye amalungu osapho lwasebukhosini kwiRoyal Palace.
Ukujonga i-cherry eqhakaza, eyaziwa ngokuba yi-hanami, ibe yinxalenye yesiko saseJapan ukususela ngenkulungwane ye-8.
Ingcamango ivela eShayina apho iintyatyambo zeplastiki zaziyimbali ethandwayo.
EJapan, imicimbi yokuqala yokuqhakaza kwama-cherry yabungazwa ngumlawuli eyibungazela yena kuphela kunye namanye amalungu ohlobo lobungangamsha lwasezweni kwiNgingqi yaseBukhosini.
IFinland indawo ekahle yokuhamba ngesikebhe. "I-Lake of a thousand lakes" ineziqhingi eziyizinkulungwane futhi, emachibini kanye nasemaqoqweni eziqhingi ezingasogwini.
Edlanzaneni leziqhingi nasemachibini awudingi isikebhe.
Yize iziqhingi ezingasogwini kanye namachibi amakhulu kunawo wonke emakhulu ngokwanele ukuthwala noma imuphi umkhumbi kanokusho, izikebhe ezincane noma ngisho ne-kayak inikeza okwenzekayo okuhlukile.
Ukuhamba ngezikebhe indlela yokuzilibazisa yezwe eFinland, ngesikebhe kubantu abayisikhombisa noma abayisishiyagalombili.
Lokhu kufana ne-Norway, i-Sweden kanye neNyuzilandi, kodwa ngaphandle kwalokho kuhlukile ngempela (isib. E-Netherlands isibalo okukodwa kuya kwezingamashumi amane).
iFinland yindawo emnandi yokuqhuba isikhitshane. “Ilizwe lamachweba angamawaka” ekwaneziqithi ezingamawaka, kumachweba nakunxweme I archipelagos.
Kwiqela leziqithi nakumachibi awude udinge isikhephe.
Nangona iqela leziqithi ezisenxwemeni kunye namachibi emakhulu ngokwaneleyo ukuba kungangena isikhephe, izikhitshana okanye ii-kayak zibonelela ngamava ahlukileyo.
Izikhephe yindlela yokuchitha ixesha kwisizwe saseFinland, kukho umyinge wesikhephe kubantu abasixhenxe okanye abasibhozo.
Lena iqhathaniswa nge Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, kodwa ke izimele (umzekelo e Netherlands inani linye kumashumi amane).
Finland ingaba namanani ndawo ukuhamba yi-boat. I - "lake ka-eliwaka lakes" kanjalo sele amawaka Kweziqithi, Lakes, kwaye qokelela ezingaselunxwemeni kweziqithi.
Kwi archipelago kwaye kwi lakes wena musa kufuneka boat.
Nangona engaselunxwemeni kweziqithi kwaye nani likhulu lakes inkulu ngokwaneleyo ze urhuqe naliphi na luxurious inqanawa, incinci boats okanye nkqu Kayak kunikela into eyahlukileyo.
Boating lelona lizwe ke, ezolonwabo indlela eya kwi-Finland, yi-boat kuba ezisixhenxe okanye isibhozo abantu.
Oku lufana Norway, Sweden kwaye Nazi, kodwa ngenye indlela kubalulekile iselwa ezahlukeneyo (umz. E-Netherlands inani omnye amashumi amane).
IFinland yindawo elungileyo yokuhamba ngenqanawa. "Ichibi lamawaka amachibi" linamawakawaka eziqithi kwaye, kumachibi nakwingqokelela yeziqithi zonxweme.
Iziqithi kunye namachibi akufuneki isikhephe.
Ngelixa iziqithi zonxweme kunye namachibi amakhulu emikhulu ngokwaneleyo ukuba angahlala kuyo nayiphi na inqanawa yokunethezeka, amaphenyane amancinci okanye i-kayak inikezela ngamava ahlukileyo.
Ukuhamba ngesikhephe ngumdlalo kazwelonke wokuzonwabisa eFinland, ngesikhephe sabasixhenxe okanye abasibhozo.
Oku kuyafana neNorway, iSweden neNew York, kodwa kungenjalo yahluke mpela (umzekelo, eNetherlands eli nani linye ukuya kumashumi amane).
I-Inland yindawo efanelekileyo yokuhamba ngesikhephe. "I-Lake of a thousand lakes" inamawaka esiqithi, emachibini nakwiingqungquthela ezingaselunxwemeni.
Kwilali yeziqithi kunye namachibi awudingi isikhephe.

Nangona iziqithi ezingaselunxwemeni kunye namachibi amakhulu kunazo zonke ezinkulu ngokwaneleyo ukuthwala nayiphi na inqanawa ngokutsho, izikhephe ezincinci okanye i-kayak inikeza eyahlukileyo eyenzekayo.
Ukuhamba ngezikhephe yindlela yokuzonwabisa yelizwe eFinland, ngesikhephe kubantu abasixhenxe okanye abasibhozo.
Oku kufana ne-Norway, i-Sweden kunye ne-New Zealand, kodwa ngaphandle koko yahlukile ngokwenene (umz. E-Netherlands inani elinye ukuya kumashumi amane).
IFinland yindawo efanelekileyo yokuhamba ngenqanawa. "Ichibi lamawaka amachibi" linamawakawaka eziqithi kwaye, kumachibi nakwingqokelela yeziqithi zonxweme.
Iziqithi kunye namachibi akufuneki isikhephe.
Yize iziqithi zonxweme kunye namachibi amakhulu ngokwaneleyo ukuba angahlala kuyo nayiphi na inqanawa yobunewunewu, amaphenyane amancinci okanye i-kayak inikezela ngamava ahlukileyo.

Nangona iziqithi ezingaselunxwemeni kunye namachibi amakhulu kunawo onke amakhulu ngokwaneleyo ukuthwala nawuphi na umkhombe obuphambili, izikebhe ezincinci okanye nokuba i-kayak inikeza okwenzekayo eyahlukileyo.

Kufana nokugingqela ikalishi elisindayo phezulu egqumeni. Ukuhlukanisa i-nucleus futhi bese kukhululwa amanye walawo mandla.

Isiqhushumbhisi se-fission sisebenza kumthetho othi kuthatha amandla ukudibanisa i-nucleus enee-proton nee-neutron ezininzi.
Kufana nokunyusa itroli usiya phezulu endulini. Ukwahlula kwakhona le nucleus kukhupha amanye alo mandla.
Ezinye ii-athomu zine-nuclei engazinzanga oko kuthetha ukuba zihlala ziqhekeka ngaphandle kokukrokra okuncinci okanye ukungabikho.
I-fission ibhombu ye isebenza ngokusebenzisa inkqubo ethabatha amandla ombane remix kubo njengoko nucleus ngokunjalo ezininzi protonies kwaye nutrons.
Yinto efana rolling a nzima buggy iphezulu ye induli. Ukwahlula nucleus kwakhona kwaye ke abanye ukuba amandla lunikwa.

Nakuba lisetshenziswa kabanzi, ikakhulukazi phakathi kwabantu abangewona amaRomany, igama elithi "Gypsy" kaningi lithathwa njengelokwedelela ngenxa yokuhlanganiswa kwalo nezinto ezimbi eziyiphutha ezishiwo abanye kanye nemibono enganembile ngabantu bamaRomany.
Nangona lisetyenziswa kakhulu, ingakumbi kwabanngengawo amaRomani, igama u-"Gypsy" lijongwa njengesithuko kuba lidityaniswa neengcinga ezimbi fkunye nokubacingela kakubi abantu abangamaRomani.

Nangona widely isetyenziswa, ingakumbi phakathi non-romanys, igama elithi "i-gypsy" rhoqo ithathwe njengoko contemptuous ngenxa yayo yelenqe kunye misconceptions kukhankanywe ngabanye kwaye misconceptions malunga Romanians.

Nangona lisetyenziswa ngokubanzi, ngakumbi kubantu abangawo amaRomany, igama elithi "Gypsy" lihlala lithathwa njengelinyelisayo ngenxa yokudibana nemibono ephosakeleyo kunye nemibono ephosakeleyo ngabantu baseRomany.

Nangona lisetyenziswa ngokubanzi, ingakumbi phakathi kwabantu abangamaRomany, igama elithi "Gypsy" lihlala lithathwa njengempembelelo ngenxa yokuhlanganiswa kwayo kunye nezinto ezimbi ezikhoyo kunye neengcamango ezichanekileyo ngabantu bamaRomany.

Nangona isetyenziswa ngokubanzi, ngokukodwa phakathi kwabantu abangewona amaRomany, igama elithi "Gypsy" rhoqo lithathwa njengelokwedelela ngenxa yokuhlanganiswa kwalo kunye nezinto ezimbi eziphosakeleyo ezichaziweyo abanye kunye neengcamango ezichanileyo ngabantu bamaRomany.
Ukudla kwaseJalimane okubhakwayo kuhle empeleni, futhi eBavaria, kunothile futhi kuhlukile, kuyafana nalokho kwasendaweni engumakhelwane engaseningizimu, i-Austria.
Ukudla okubhakwayo kwezithelo kuvamile, okunama-apula aphekwayo afakwa ezintweni ezibhakwayo unyaka wonke, kanye nama-cherry namapulamu evela ngehlobo.

Okuningi kokudla kwaseJalimane okubhakiwe kubuye kube nama-almondi, izindlubu zomhezela, kanye nezinye izindlubu zemithi. Amakhekhe athandwayo avame ukuhambisana kahle kakhulu nenkomishi yekhofi enamandla.
Uma ufuna uphayi omncane kodwa onothile, zama lokho okubizwa kuye ngendawo ngokuthi iBerliner, iPfannkuchen noma iKrapfen.
Izinto ezibhakiweyo zaseJamani zimnandi, kwaye eBavaria, zinkulu kwaye ngokufanayo nezo zommelwane wayo osemazantsi, i-Ostriya.
Ixhaphikile intlama yeziqhamo, ama-apile ayaphekwa abe yintlama unyaka wonke, wona amaqunube neeplam zenziwa ngehlobo.
Ezinye izinto ezibhakwe eJamani zidla ngokuba nee-almonds, ii-hazelnuts kunye namanye amantongomane. Iikeyiki ezithandwayo zidla ngokuhamba kakuhle nekofu esisitshoqolo.
Ukuba ufuna encinci kodwa enesondlo ipheysri, zama ngokukwengingqi ibizwa ngokuba yiBerliner, yiPfannkuchen okanye yiKrapfen.
Isijamani baked foods ingaba ngenene okulungileyo, kwaye kwi-Bavaria, bamele otyebileyo kwaye ezahlukeneyo, iyafana ukuba kwi-wayalela e-afrika indawo Austria.
Baked isiqhamo foods ingaba ngokufanayo, kunye ephekiweyo ama-apile fitted kwi bakery kuwo wonke unyaka, ngokunjalo khangela kwaye plums ukusuka ehlotyeni.
Uninzi Sasejamani ke baked ukutya kanjalo iqulathe almonds, scavengername lubricants, nezinye umthi lubricants. Ethandwa kakhulu cupcakes ingaba rhoqo kakuhle kakhulu ekhatshwe obugorha indebe ikofu.
Ukuba osikhangelayo encinane kodwa otyebileyo pie, zama yintoni ngokuba Berliner, pfannkuchen, okanye Krapfen.
Izinto ezibhakiweyo zaseJamani zilungile, kwaye eBavaria, zityebile kwaye zahlukahlukene, ngokufanayo nezo zikummelwane osemazantsi, e-Austria.
Ukutya okutya iziqhamo kuqhelekile, iiapile eziphekiweyo zongezwa kwindawo yokubhaka unyaka wonke, kunye neetsheri kunye neplam ukusuka ehlotyeni.
Izinto ezininzi zokubhaka zaseJamani zineeamangile, iivatala kunye namanye amayeza. Iikeyiki ezidumileyo zihlala zibhangqiwe kunye nekomityi yekofu eyomeleleyo.

Asemaninzi amadoda namabhinqa aphilayo akwazi ukusinda ngexesha aye lapha, nabanye abaninzi abanezihlobo zabo ziye zabulawa okanye zasetyenziswa de zafa apho, amaYuda nabangengomaYuda kuyafana.

Uhambo lwesikole seluyingxenye enkulu yekilasi. Kaningi uthisha angathanda ukuyisa abafundi bakhe ezindaweni lapho kungafikeki khona ngohambo lwebhasi.

Ezobuchwepheshe zinikeza isisombululo ngohambo lwesikole olubukeka njengolwangempela. Abafunda bangabuka imivubukulo yasemnyuziyamu, bavakashele indawo yokugcina izinhlanzi, noma bajabulele ubuhle bobuciko belokhu behlezi nekilasi labo.
Ukuhlanganyela uhambo lwesikole cishe enye indlela enhle kakhulu yokucabangisisa ohambweni nokwabelana ngokwenzekile namakilasi wesikhathi esizayo.

Ngokwesibonelo, unyaka ngamunye abafundi abavela eSikoleni saseBennet eNyakatho Carolina baklama iwebhusayithi ngohambo lwabo lokuya Enhlokodolobha Yezwe, unyaka ngamunye amawebhusayithi akhiwa kabusha futhi, kodwa izinhlobo ezindala ziyagcinwa kuyi-inthanethi ukuthi isebenze njengencwadi yokugcina izinto.
Ukuhambela ezemfundo yinxalenye enkulu yayo nayiphi na iklasi. Ngokufuthi utishala uthanda ukusa abafundi bakhe kwiindawo ekungenakuhanjwa ngebhasi xa kusiyiwa kuzo.
Itekhnoloji inikezela isisombululo ngohambo lwentsimi ebonakalayo. Abafundi banokujonga kwizinto zakudala, bandwendwele i-aquarium, okanye babone ubugcisa obuhle ngelixa behleli kwiklasi yabo.
Ukuthatha uhambo phantse yenye indlela yozikhumbhuza kwaye nixoxe izimvo nabafundi kwikamva.

Umzekelo, unyaka nonyaka abafundi abavela kwiSikolo iBennet eMantla Carolina bayila iwebhusayithi malunga nohambo lwabo oluya kwi-State Capital, unyaka nonyaka iwebhusayithi iyalungiswa, kodwa iinguqulelo ezindala zigcinwa kwi-Intanethi ukuze zisebenze njenge-scrapbook.
Isikolo trips zisuke enkulu yinxalenye iklasi. Utitshala angathanda rhoqo njenge ukuthabatha abafundi bakhe ukuba iindawo apho ibhasi uhambo akakwazi ukuza.

Iteknoloji inika isisombululo kuba isikolo uhambo ukuba ikhangeleka ngathi lokwenene. Abafundi banako kuqwalasela Museum archaeology, tyelela intlanzi uvimba, okanye bonwabele artistic ubuhle ngexesha ehleli kunye zabo iklasi.
Yabelana esikolweni trips kusenokwenzeka omnye eyona iindlela ukuze zibonakalise kwi trips kwaye wabelane into eyenzekileyo kunye elizayo iiklasi.

Ngokomzekelo, nyaka ngamnye abafundi ukususela Bennet yesikolo kwi-North Carolina uyilo a iwebhusayithi kwi uhambo lwabo ukuya eyinkunzi lizwe, kunyaka ngamnye Websites ingaba wakha kwakhona kwakhona, kodwa kunoko ke ngoko kugcinwa khona i-intanethi ukukhonza njengokuba yokugcina uxwebhu.
Iihambo zesikolo sele ziyinxalenye enkulu yeklasi. Rhoqo utitshala angathanda ukuthatha abafundi bakhe ababase kwiindawo ezingafikelelekiyo ngebhasi.

Itekhnoloji inika isisombululo kuhambo lwesikolo olukhangeleka luyinyani. Abafundi banokujonga i-archeology yemyuziyam, batyelele ichibi leentlanzi, okanye bonwabele ubuhle bezobugcisa bokuhlala kunye neklasi yabo.
Ukwabelana ngohambo lwesikolo yeyona ndlela ibalaseleyo yokucinga ngohambo kunye nokwabelana ngokwenzekileyo kwiiklasi ezizayo.

Umzekelo, unyaka nonyaka abafundi abavela kwiSikolo iBennet eMantla Carolina bayila iwebhusayithi yohambo lwabo oluya kwisiXeko esiyiNtloko, unyaka nonyaka iiwebhusayithi ziyakhiwa kwakhona, kodwa iinguqulelo ezindala zigcinwa kwi-Intanethi ukuze zisebenze njengendawo yokugcina izinto.
Uhambo lwesikolo luyinxalenye enkulu kwiklasi. Utitshala angathanda ukungena kubafundi bakhe kwiindawo apho kungafikeki khona ngohambo lwebhasi.

Ezi ngcali zinika isisombululo ngohambo lwesikolo olujonga njengolwangempela. Abafundi banokujonga iimbono zenyuziyam, batyelele indawo yokugqibela yeentlanzi, okanye banandiphe ubuhle bobugcisa bokuba behleli kwiklasi yabo.
Ukujoyina uhambo lwesikolo phantse enye indlela efanelekileyo yokuqwalasela uhambo kunye nokwabelana ngokwenzekileyo kunye neeklasi ezizayo.

Umzekelo, unyaka ngamnye abafundi abavela kwiSikolo saseBennett eMantla Carolina bayila iwebhusayithi ngohambo lwabo lokuya kwiSixeko saseLizwe, unyaka ngamnye iiwebhusayithi zakhiwa kwakhona, kodwa iintlobo ezindala ziyagcinwa kwi-intanethi ukuba isebenze njengencwadi yokugqibela.

Zonke nouns, ihamba kunye ilizwi Sie kuwe, ukuphila ngendlela oonobumba abakhulu, nkqu ziphakathi kwe-isivakalisi.

U-Aristotle, isazi sefilosofi, wayenombono wokuthi zonke izinto zenziwe ingxube yento eyodwa noma ezengeziwe kwezine ezingumsuka wezinto zonke. Bezingumhlaba, amanzi, umoya, kanye nomlilo.

Lokhu bekucishe kufane nezigaba ezine zezinto ezikhona (ngesigaba esifanayo): eziqinile, uketshezi, igesi, kanye ne-plasma, nakuba abuye aba nombono wokuthi zingashintsha zibe izinto ezintsha ezakha lokho esikubonayo.

Abantu bayazi malunga nezinto ezisisiseko zeekhemikhali ezinje ngegolide, isilivere, nobhedu kwakudala, njengoko zonke zinokufunyanwa kwindalo ngendlela yemveli kwaye zilula kakhulu kum ngezixhobo zamandulo.
UAristotle, intanda-bulumko, wathi yonke into yenziwe ngumxube wento enye ukuya kwezine. Oko kukuthi umhlaba, amanzi, umoya nomlilo.
Oku bekufana namacala amane emicimbi (ngolandelelwano olufanayo): eqinileyo, engamanzi, igesi, kunye neplasma, nangona wayecinga ukuba bayatshintsha babe zizinto ezintsha ukwenza oko sikubonayo.

Abantu wayesazi ezinjalo ezisisiseko kanti ezibini njengoko igolide, isilivere, kwaye nowekopolo ukusuka antiquity, njengoko ezi ingafunyanwa kwi-ndalo yi-s ke ngoko kwaye ingaba ilula kakhulu ukuqwalasela kunye yamandulo izixhobo.
Aristotle, a philosopher, ebibanjwe ukuba zonke izinto zenziwa kwi mixture omnye okanye ezine nangaphezulu origins zonke izinto. Baba umhlaba, amanzi, umoya, kwaye umlilo.

Oku wenziwe iyafana zine izigaba zawo ka-bukho (enye isigaba): iqinile, okungamanzi, igesi, kwaye latin, nangona baye kanjalo kuba impression ukuba banako tshintsha kwi ezintsha iinjongo ukuba enze phezulu yintoni siyabona.

Abantu babezazi izinto ezisisiseko zeekhemikhali ezinje ngegolide, isilivere, nobhedu kumaxesha amandulo, njengoko ezi zinokufumaneka kwindalo ngendlela yesiko kwaye kulula kakhulu ukugrumba ngezixhobo zakudala.
U-Aristotle, isithandi sobulumko, wathi zonke izinto zinento enye okanye ezingaphezulu kwezi zine zendalo. Yayingumhlaba, amanzi, umoya kunye nomlilo.
Oku bekufana nezigaba ezine zomcimbi (kwisigaba esinye): iziqina, ulwelo, iigesi, kunye neplasma, nangona bekwabambe ukuba banokutshintsha babe zizinto ezintsha ezenza oko sikubonayo.

Abantu babesazi izinto ezisisiseko zeekhemikhali ezifana negolide, isilivere, kunye nobhedu ukususela kwakudala, njengoko ezi zinokufumaneka kwifandesi ngohlobo lweenkobe kwaye kulula kakhulu ukuba uzigubungele izixhobo zamandulo.
U-Aristotle, ingcali yefilosofi, wayenembono yokuba zonke izinto zenziwe ngumxube omnye okanye owongezelelweyo wezine ezingumvelaphi wezinto zonke. Zingumhlaba, amanzi, umoya, kunye nomlilo.

Indlela yokuqala yokuthatha uhambo eyaziwayo ukuhamba ngezinyawo, abantu baqala ukuhamba beqondile eminyakeni eyizigidi ezimbili edlule ngokuvela kwe-Homo Erectus (okusho umuntu ome waqonda).
Ababalandela esikhundleni, ama-Australopithecus bawangahambi ngendlela yokuma aqonde ngokujwayelekile.

Okuchwepheshe ngokuba nyawo-mbili kutholakala emathanjeni aguquke itshe we-Australopithecus kusukela eminyakeni eyizigidi ezingu-4.2-3.9 edlule, nakuba ama-Sahelanthropus kungenzeka ayehamba ngezinyawo ezimbili ngaphambili kakhulu eminyakeni eyizigidi eziyisikhombisa edlule.
Indlela yokuqala yokuhamba yayihamba, abantu baqala ukuhamba nkqo izigidi ezibini zeminyaka eyadlulayo ngokuvela kukaHomo Erectus (kuthetha indoda ethe tye).
Abandulelayo, iAustralopithecus khange ihambe ime nkqo njengesiqhelo.

Ubungcali beBipedal bufunyenwe kwii-fossil zase-Australopithecus ukusuka kwi-4.2-3.9 yezigidi zeminyaka eyadlulayo, nangona iSahelanthropus inokuba yayihamba ngemilenze emibini kwiminyaka ezizigidi ezisixhenxe eyadlulayo.
Wokuqala ezaziwayo ehamba route, abantu baqalisa ehamba ethe ngqo kwezinyanga amabini ezigidi iminyaka kunye kokuhluma ka-Homo Erectus (lithetha umntu thirsty ndaqonda).
Yabo successors, i-Australopithecuses musa ukuhamba ngendlela kuma-oriented hlobo.

Ingcaphephe kuba phinda-phinda futhi bafunyanwa kwi-Australopithecus-altered amathambo ukusuka 4.2-3.9 yezigidi kwiminyaka eyadlulayo, nangona Sahelanthropus enokuba wahamba kwi ezimbini iinyawo elide ngaphambi koko ezisixhenxe yezigidi kwiminyaka eyadlulayo.
Uhlobo lokuqala lokuhamba olwaziwa njengokuhamba, abantu baqala ukuhamba ngqo ezizigidi ezibini zeminyaka edlulileyo ngokuvela kukaHomo Erectus (okuthetha ukuqonda komntu).
Abalandela emva kwakhe, iAustralopithecus, abahambi ngokuthe ngqo.

Uvavanyo lwenyawo olufunyenwe kumathambo e-Australopithecus rock ukusuka kwi-4.2-3.9 yezigidi zeminyaka eyadlulayo, nangona iSahelanthropus yayihamba iinyawo ezimbini ngaphambili kunezigidi ezisixhenxe ezidlulileyo.

Ijalimane bekuyisitha esivamile eMpini Yezwe 2, okwaholela ekusebenzisaneni phakathi kwe-USSR kanye neMelika. Ngokuphela kwempi ukungqubuzana kwezimiso, izinqubo kanye namasiko kwaholela ekubeni amazwe axabane.
Ngemva kweminyaka emibili yempi, ababeyimifela ndawonye empini manje sebeyizitha futhi sebeqalise Impi Ebandayo.

Kwakufanele ihlale iminyaka engu-40 elandelayo futhi kulwe kuyo ngokoqobo, amabutho abambele, ezinkundleni zempi kusukela e-Afrika kuya e-Asia, e-Afghanistan, eCuba kanye nakwezinye izindawo eziningi.

IJamani yayilutshaba lwabantu abaninzi ngeMfazwe Yesibini Yehlabathi, nto leyo eyakhokelela kwintsebenziswano phakathi kwe-USSR neMelika. Ekupheleni kwemfazwe ukungqubana kwenkqubo, nenkcubeko kwakhokelela ukuba la mazwe ohlukane.
Emva kweminyaka emibini ekupheleni kwemfazwe, ababezizihlobo baphetha bezintshaba futhi kwaqala Imfazo Ebandayo.
Ibimele ihlale iminyaka eyi-40 elandelayo ize ifunwe yimikhosi esedabini ukususela eAfrica ukuya eAsia, eAfghanistan, eCuba nakwezinye iindawo.

Sasejamani wenziwe ezenzeka utshaba kulo Ihlabathi Imfazwe 2, ezikhokelela ukuya USSR intsebenziswano kunye Emelika. Yi-kuphele imfazwe ungquzulwano lomgaqo-siseko, kwakunye nemigaqo-nkqubo, kwaye Masiko kukhokelele amazwe ungquzulwano.
Emva kweminyaka emibini zemfazwe, owayesakuba warmongers ingaba ngoku iintshaba kwaye kufuneka kuqaliswe a Yingqele Imfazwe.
Babeza yokugqibela esilandelayo 40 ubudala kwaye ukuba balwe kuzo literally, substitute troops, kwi battlefields ukusuka e-Afrika e-Asia, Epakistan, Ecuba, kwaye abaninzi kwezinye iindawo.

IJamani yayilutshaba oluqhelekileyo kwiMfazwe yesibini yeHlabathi, eyakhokelela kwintsebenziswano phakathi kwe-USSR ne-United States. Ukuphela kwemfazwe, ukungavisisani malunga nemigaqo, iinkqubo kunye nezithethe kukhokelele kwimpixano phakathi kwezizwe.
Emva kweminyaka emibini yemfazwe, abo babefe kunye emfazweni ngoku baba ziintshaba kwaye baqala iMfazwe Yomlomo.

UbuBhuda base-Tibet busekelwe ezimfundisweni zikaBhuda, kodwa zandiswa indlela yothando yobu-mahayana nayizinqubo eziningi ezisuka kuyiYoga yaseNdiya.
Ngokuyisisekelo ubuBuddha baseTibet bulula kakhulu. Buhlanganisa iKundalini Yoga, ukuzindla kanye nendlela yothando olwamukela konke.
Nge-Kundali Yoga amandla e-Kundali (amandla okukhanyisa) avuselelwa ngokuzivocavoca ngohlobo lwe-yoga, ukuzivocavoca kokuphefumula, amazwi aphindwaphindwayo kanye nokubona ngeso lengqondo.

Isikhungo sokuzindla kwase-Tibet iYoga yesiThixo. Ngokubona ngeso lengqondo izithixo ezahlukahlukene imizila yamandla iba ehlanzekile, ama-chakra enziwa ukuthi asebenze futhi ukukhanya kokubakhona kuyakhiwa.
I-Tibetan Buddhism yakhelwe kwimfundiso zika Budda, kodwa zongezelelwa yindlela yama mahayan yothando nangendlela ezinzi ezisuka kwi Yoga yamaNdiya.
Ngokusisiseko, i-Buddhism yaseTibetan ilula kakhulu. Iquka i-Yoga yaseKundalini, ukucingisisa kunye nendlela yothando olungenamkhethe.
Nge-Kundalini Yoga amandla eKundalini (amandla okhanyiso) avuswa ngokuma kweyoga, imithambo yokuphefumla, i-mantra kunye nokubona.
Iziko lokucingisiza kweTibet yiYoga yobuThixo. Ngokubonwa kwezithixo ezahlukeneyo iindlela zamandla ziyacocwa, ii-chakras ziyenziwa zisebenze kwaye ulwazi lokukhanyiselwa luyenziwa.
I-tibetan Judaism lusekelwe iimfundiso ka-Buda, kodwa kubalulekile intensified yi-mahayan uthando kwaye yi-ezininzi nemigaqo-nkqubo ukususela India u-yoga.
Basically & Isikhalazo Buddhism kubaluleke kakhulu simpler. Ibandakanya kundalini Yoga, meditation kwaye indlela uthando iyakwamkela yonke into.
Kunye Kundali Yoga i-Kundali umbane (ukukhanya amandla ombane) ngu ukuvuselelwa nge-yoga basebenzise, respiratory basebenzise, mantras kwaye imagination.
Umbindi we meditation kwi-Slovenia yoga kuba idol. Ngqondweni ezahlukeneyo nezithixo ombane imigca kuba nyulu, i-chakras zenzelwe ukuba umsebenzi kwaye ukukhanya kuzo ubuso ngu inaugurated.
UbuBuddha baseTibet busekwe kwiimfundiso zobuBuddha, kodwa butyetyiswa luthando lwe-mahayana kunye neendlela ezininzi ezivela kwi-Yoga yaseIndiya.
Ngokusisiseko i-Tibetan Buddhism ilula kakhulu. Ibandakanya i-Kundalini Yoga, ukucamngca kunye nendlela yokwamkela uthando.

IZiko laseTibetan lokucamngca ngeYoga. Ngokucinga oothixo abahlukeneyo iintambo zamandla ziba nyulu, ii-chakras ziyenziwa zisebenze kwaye kukhanya ubukho bobukho.
AmaBhuda aseTibetan asekelwe kwiimfundiso zikaBhuda, kodwa zandiswa indlela yothando lobuPhila kunye neenkqubo ezininzi ezisuka kwiYoga yaseIndiya.
Ngokusisiseko ubuBuddha baseTibetan bulula kakhulu. Ziquka iKundalini Yoga, ukucamngca kunye nendlela yothando olwamkela ngayo yonke into.
Nge-Kundali Yoga amandla e-Kundali (amandla okukhanyisa) avuselelwa ngokuzivocavoca ngohlobo lwe-yoga, ukuzivocavoca kokuphefumula, amazwi aphindaphindwayo kunye nokubona ngeso lengqondo.

Iziko lokucamngca lase-Tibetan liyi-Yoga yesiqhelo. Ngokubona ngeso lengqondo izithixo ezahlukeneyo imizila yamandla ibe ecocekileyo, ii-chakra zenziwa ukuba zisebenze kwaye ukukhanya kokubakho kuyakhiwa.
UbuBuddha baseTibet busekwe kwiimfundiso zobuBuddha, kodwa butyetyiswa luthando lwe-mahayana kunye neendlela ezininzi ezivela kwi-Yoga yaseIndiya.
Eyona nto ibaluleke kakhulu kwi-Tibetan Buddhism ilula kakhulu. Ibandakanya iYoga yeKundalini, ukucamngca kunye nendlela yothando eyamkelayo.
NgeKundali Yoga amandla eKundali (amandla okhanyiso) ahlaziywa ngokuzivocavoca ngohlobo lwe-yoga, imithambo yokuphefumula, amazwi aphindaphindwayo kunye nokujonga ngeso lengqondo.
Iziko laseTibetan lokucamngca ngeYoga. Ngokujonga izithixo ezahlukeneyo iintambo zombane zicocekile, ii-chakras ziyenziwa zisebenze kwaye ukukhanya kobukho kuyakhiwa.
UbuBhuda baseTibet busekelwe kwiimfundiso zikaBhuda, kodwa zandiswa indlela yothando lwe-mahayana kunye neenkqubo ezininzi ezisuka kwiYoga yaseIndiya.
UbuBuddha baseTibet bulula kakhulu. Buquka iKundalini Yoga, ukuzindla kunye nendlela yothando eyamkela yonke into.
Nge-Kundali Yoga amandla e-Kundali (amandla okukhanyisa) avuselelwa ngokuzivocavoca ngohlobo lweyoga, ukuzivocavoca kokuphefumula, amazwi aphindwayo kunye nokubona ngeso lengqondo.

Isikhungo sokucamngca saseTibet iYoga yesiThixo. Ngokubona ngeso lengqondo izithixo ezahlukeneyo imizila yamandla iba ehlambulukileyo, iichakra zenziwa ukuba zisebenze kwaye ukukhanya kokubakhona kukhiwa.
Iningi lweMikhumbi yokuVakasha yase-Baltic ehlukile ihlanganisa ukuhlala isikhathi eside e-St. Petersburg, e-Russia.
Lokhu kusho ukuthi ungavakashela idolobha elingokomlando izinsuku ezimbalwa ezigcwele ube ubuyela futhi ulala emkhumbini ebusuku.
Uma uya ogwini kuphela usebenzisa uhambo lomkhumbi olufishane angeke udinge i-visa ehlukile (kusukela ngo-2009).

Eminye imikhumbi yokuvakasha iveza i-Berlin, eseJalimane ezincwajaneni zayo. Njengoba ubona ebalazweni ngenhla i-Berlin ikude kakhulu nolwandle futhi ukuvakashela idolobha akuhlanganisiwe enanini lomkhumbi wokuvakasha.
I-Baltic Cruises ezininzi zidla ngokuquka ukuhlala okongezelelekileyo e-St. Petersburg, eRashiya.
Oku kuthetha ukuba ungatyelela esi sixeko sinembali kangangeentsuku ezithile ngoxa ebusuku ulala enqanaweni.
Xa usiya enxwemeni usebenzisa izikhephe zozikhupha awuzudinga ivisa eyohlukileyo (usukela ngo-2009).
Ezinye ii-cruise zine-Berlin, i-Germany ezimpepheni zentengiso. Njengoba uzibonela kwimap ngaphezulu i-Berlin ayisondelanga tuu elwandle kwaye novakasho kuledolophu alubalwanga kwixabiso le-cruise.
Uninzi enye i-baltic Ukuhamba iinqanawa ziquka longevity kwi-St. Marengo, i-Russia.
Oku kuthetha ukuba uyakwazi ndwendwela i-historic isixeko kuba kwiintsuku ezimbalwa xa ufuna ukubuyela kwaye kulala kwi inqanawa ebusuku.
Ukuba ufuna kuphela yiya coast usebenzisa omfutshane voyage awuyi kufuneka eyahlukileyo-visa (ukususela ngo-2009).

Abanye bahambe iinqanawa depict-Berlin, ebekwe kwi-Egermany yayo neencwadana. Njengoko ubona kwi imaphu ngasentla Berlin kukuba kude yolwandle kwaye utyelelo isixeko ayikho ibandakanywe inani voyage enqanaweni.
Uninzi lweeNqanawa zeBaltic zokhenketho zibandakanya ukuhlala ixesha elide eSt. Petersburg, eRashiya.
Oku kuthetha ukuba ungandwendwela isixeko esinembali kwiintsuku ezimbalwa ezizeleyo ngelixa ubuyayo kwaye ulele esikhepheni ebusuku.
Ukuba uya elwandle kuphela usebenzisa i-short cruise awuyi kufuna i-visa eyahlukileyo (ukusukela ngo-2009).

Ezinye izinto zokhenketho zibonisa iBerlin, eseJamani kwiincwadana zayo. Njengoko ubona kwimephu engentla eBerlin ukude kakhulu nolwandle kwaye ukutyelela esixekweni akufakwanga kwixabiso lenqanawa yezokhenketho.
Uninzi lweeNqanawa zoKhenketho zeBaltic ezahlukileyo lubandakanya ukuhlala ixesha elide eSt. Petersburg, eRashiya.
Oku kuthetha ukuba ungatyelela isixeko sembali iintsuku ezimbalwa ezizeleyo ukuba ubuyele kwaye ulala emkhumbini ebusuku.
Ukuba uza elunxwemeni kuphela usebenzisa uhambo lwenqanawa olufutshane awuyi kufuna i-visa eyahlukileyo (ukususela ngo-2009).

Ezinye iinqanawa zokuhamba zibonakalisa i-Berlin, e-Jamani kubakhenkethi bayo. Njengoko ubona ibalaseleyo ngasentla i-Berlin ikude kakhulu nolwandle kwaye ukutyelela isixeko esidibeneyo kwinqanawa yokuhamba.
Uninzi lweenqanawa zeBaltic zokhenketho zibandakanya ukuhlala ixesha elide eSt. Petersburg, eRashiya.
Oku kuthetha ukuba ungandwendwela isixeko esinembali kwiintsuku ezimbalwa ezizeleyo ngelixa ubuyayo kwaye ulele esikhepheni ebusuku.
Ukuba uya elwandle kuphela usebenzisa uhambo olufutshane lwesikhephe awuyi kufuna i-visa eyahlukileyo (ukususela ngo-2009).

Enye iinqanawa zokhenketho zibonisa iBerlin, eseJamani kwiincwadana zayo. Njengoko ubona kwimephu engentla eBerlin ukude kakhulu nolwandle kwaye ukutyelela esixekweni akufakwanga kwixabiso lenqanawa yezokhenketho.

Oku kuthetha ukuba ungatyelela isixeko ngembali iintsuku ezimbalwa ngokupheleleyo ube ubuyela kwaye ulala emkhombeni ebusuku.
Ukuba uya elunxwemeni kuphela usebenzisa uhambo lwenqanawa olufutshane alunakudinge i-visa eyahlukileyo (kusukela ngo-2009).

Ezinye iinqanawa zokundwendwela zibonisa iBerlin, eJamani ezincwajaneni zayo. Njengoko ubona kwibala ngasentla iBerlin ikude kakhulu nolwandle kwaye ukutyelela isixeko akuhlanganisiwe nanini na ukhenketho.

Izakhi ezinjengekhalsiyamu nephothaziyamu zithathwa njengensimbi. Yebo, kunezinye izinsimbi njengesiliva negolide.
Ungaba futhi nezidungo ezixutshanisiwe ezihlanganisa amanani amancane ezinto ezingezona ezensimbi njenge-carbon.
Ialloys yimixube yemethali ezimbini okanye nangaphezulu. Ungalibali ukuba zininzi ii-elementi kwi-periodic table.
Izinto ezinjenge calcium kunye ne potassium zithathwa njengezinyithi. Ewe, kukwakho nesinyithi esinjengesilivere negolide.
Unako kwakhona ukufumana ii-alloys ezibandakanya inani elincinci lezinto ezingezizo zesinyithi njengekhabhoni.
I-mixture ngu basically a mixture ezimbini okanye ngaphezulu metals. Ungalibali ukuba baninzi ezibini kwi-kanti ezibini tshati.
Ezibini ezifana icalcium kwaye iipateni ezicingelwa-iron. Ewe, kukho ezinye metals, ezifana yisilivere negolide.
Unako kanjalo kuba mixed centers ukuba ziquka ezincinane izixa-mali ka-non-kukutshisa izinto ezifana-carbon.

Igama elithi isilwanyakazane lisetshenziswa izazi zezinambuzane ngendlela esemthethweni yaleli qembu lezi zinambuzane.
Leli gama lidabuka ekujwayelaneni kwakudala neziMbungulu, okuyizilwanyana ezizifanelisela ngokuphila ngokudla emzimbeni wabantu.
Zombili iZimbungulu eziphila ngezinye izinambuzane neZimbungulu ezivamile zihlala esidlekeni, zifanelekele ukuphila esidlekeni noma endaweni yokuhlala yesilwane ezincela igazi laso.
Abafotayo kamva bathatha indawo yenenekazi elidala njengoko lalifuna i-lavatory. UMendoza wadutyulwa phantsi.
Eli gama lisuka kwakudala kukudityaniswa neencukuthu zebhedi, ezizinambuzane ezikwaziyo ukutya abantu.
Zombini i-Assassin-bugs kunye nee-Bed-bugs azikho nocic, zilungelelaniswe ukuze zihlale kwindlwana okanye kwizindlu zomphathi wazo.
Igama microorganism isetyenziselwa yi-entomologists kwi-esemthethweni ifomu eli qela izinambuzane.
Igama originates ukusuka antiquity ukuba bedbugs, izidalwa ukuba adapt ukuba ubomi ngu amehlo kwi-oluntu umzimba.
Zombini izidleleleli kwaye ngokufanayo bedbugs kuphila kwi-nest, fit kuba ubomi kwi-nest okanye kwi-ihleli ye-mammal.

I-Apia inhlokodolobha yaseSamoa. Idolobha lisesiqhingini sase-Upolu futhi linabantu abangaphansi nje kuka-40,000.
I-Aphiya yasungulwa ngawo-1850 futhi yaba yinhlokodolobha engokomthetho yaseSamowa kusukela ngo-1959.
Itheku bekuyindawo yempi esabekalo yemikhumbi lapho kwakuhlangene izaqha khona ngo-1889 lapho imikhumbi eyisikhombisa yaseJalimane, eMelika, kanye naseBrithani yenqabe ukusuka ethekwini.
Yonke imikhumbi yacwila, ngaphandle komkhumbi owodwa wase-Britain. Cishe abantu abangu-200 baseMelika naseJalimane balahlekelwa yizimpilo zabo.
Phakathi nomzabalazo wokuzimela ohlelwe yinhlangano kaMau, umhlangano wokuthula edolobheni waholela ekubulaweni kwenkosi yezwe uTupua Tamasese lealofi III.
I-Apia likomkhulu le-Samoa. Idolophu ikwisiqithi se-Upolu futhi sinenani labantu elingaphantsi nje ko-40,000.
I Apia yasekwa ngo 1850s yaye iyi capital egunyazisiweyo yase of Samoa ukususela ngo 1959.
Ihabha yayisisiza senqanawa yomkhosi waselwandle ngo-1889 xa iinqanawa ezisixhenxe ezivela eJamani, e-US, nase-Bhritane zala ukulishiya elo zibuko.
Zonke iinqanawa zazika, ngaphandle kwenye yaseBritani. Baphantse babeyi-200 abantu baseMerika nabaseJamani abaphulukana nobomi babo.
Ngelixa lomzabalanzo wenkululeko owawuququzelelwa ngumgushuzo we Mau, indibanisela enoxolo yahlangana kwidolophu yanemiphumela yokubulawa kwenkosi u Topua Tamasese Leaof III.
I-apia i-eyinkunzi ka-Saipan. Isixeko ephiwe island ka-Upolu kwaye sele nje abangaphantsi kwe-40,000 abemi.
Appia waba waseka kwi-1850 ' s kwaye waba igosa eyinkunzi ka-samoah ukusukela ngo-1959.
I-harbor waba embi kangako naval site apho Warriors kuhlangatyezwana nazo kwi-1889 xa ezisixhenxe isijamani, i-american, kwaye British iinqanawa wala shiya Durban.
Zonke iinqanawa sank, ngaphandle kokuba omnye British enqanaweni. Phantse 200 Americans kwaye Germans ezilahlekileyo ubomi babo.
Ngexesha elizimeleyo yokuhamba-hamba umbutho yi-Mau ke umbutho a uxolo intlanganiso kwi-town kukhokelele ukubulawa ihlabathi Ukumkani Tupua Tamasele lealofi III.

Izigqi zezikhathi ezithile, okungekhona ukusabela nje kwezinkomba ezingaphandle, kubikiwe ezidalweni eziningi eziphilayo, kuhlanganise amabhakithiliya, isikhunta, izitshalo, kanye nezilwane.
Amawashi endalo azivuselela amandla azoqhubeka esebenza emjikelwezweni okhululekile ngisho noma enkathini ongeke ukwazi ukuyicabanga.
Abanintsi baqaphela izingqi kwimbonakalo nakwizimbo ezithi zixhomekeke ikakhulu kubukho be saykile ezi endogenous nophuhliso lwazo kwixesha lwendalo.
Isingqisho samaxesha ngamaxesha, ezingeyompendulo nje kwimiba yangaphandle yamaxesha athile, sele sibhalelwe izinto ezininzi eziphilayo, nee ibhaktiriya, ifungi, izityalo kunye nezilwanyana.
Iiwotshi zebhayoloji zizenzela ii-oscillator eziza kuqhubeka nokuhamba zijikeleza mahala nokuba akukho zimpawu zangaphandle.
Uninzi phindo ngu Imihlaba kwaye ukuziphatha aqwalasela ngokubanzi zixhomekeke largely kwi ubukho be iyajikeleza ukuba kubonakala phakathi kwaye ngokwenza ka-yendalo clocks.
Occasional rhythms, apho musa react koko ukuba wangaphandle nokubonisa, ingaba axela ukuba abaninzi abahlala izidalwa, kuquka iintsholongwane, fungi, izityalo, nezilwanyana.
Creative clocks uhlaziye zabo amandla okokuba uya kuqhubeka ukusebenza ngendlela free emaphandleni nkqu ngexesha ixesha awukwazi qinisekisa.

IGoma yidolobha laseDemocratic Republic of Congo elise mpumalanga eduzane naseRwanda eliheha izivakashi.
Ngo-2002 iGoma yabhujiswa udaka olushisayo oluvela kuyintabamlilo iNyirogongo eyagqiba eminingi yemigwaqo yasedolobheni, ikakhulukazi maphakathi nedolobha.
Nakuba iGoma iphephile ngokwezinga elithile, noma ikuphi ukuvakasha ngaphandle kweGoma kumelwe kucwaningwe ukuze uzwisise isimo sokulwa okusesifundazweni saseNyakatho Kivu.
Idolobha libuye libe isiqu sokugibela intabamlilo iNyiragongo kanye nokunye kokulandelela amaGorila waseNtabeni okubiza kancane kunakho konke e-Afrika.
Uma usebenzisa i-boda-boda (itekisi lesithuthuthu) ukuhambahamba eGoma. Inani elivamile (lasendaweni) u-~500 wama-Franc wase-Congo uma ufuna uhambo olufishane.
I-Goma sisixeko esithandwa ngabakhenkethi saseDemocratic Republic of Congo kwelo cala lisempuma kufutshane neRwanda.
Ngo-2002 iGoma yatshatyalaliswa ludaka lwentaba-mlilo iNyiragongo eyangcwaba uninzi lwezitrato zedolophu, ingakumbi umbindi wedolophu.
Ngelixa iGoma ikhuselekile ngokufanelekileyo, konke ukundwendwela ngaphandle kweGoma kufuneka kuphandwe ukuze kuqondwe imeko yomlo oqhubekayo kwiphondo laseMantla eKivu.
Esi sixeko sikwayeyona ndawo yokuqalisa ukunyuka i-volcano iNyiragongo, kunye nezinye iintaba ezingaduriyo ukozonyuka ekuthiwa ziiGorilla zaseAfrika.
Ungasebenzisa iboda-boda (iteksi esisisithuthuthu) ukuze uye kwiindawo eziseGoma. Ixabiso eliqhelekileyo (lasekuhlaleni) liyi-500 Congolese Francs xa uhambo lulufutshane.
Goma sisixeko ka-Democratic Republic of congo ebekwe kufutshane Rwanda ukuba attracts visitors.
Kwi-2002 Goma yatshatyalaliswa yi-lava ukusuka volcanic nyirogongo ukuba buried abaninzi besixeko ezitratweni, ingakumbi kwi-ingoma ka-town.
Ngexesha Goma ufumana i-ekhuselekileyo, nayiphi na exceptional ndwendwela kufuneka researched ukuqonda imeko besilwa emntla kwiphondo Kivu.
Isixeko ngu kanjalo trunk ka-Nyiragongo volcano kwaye omnye cheapest ntaba gorilas e-Afrika.
Ukuba usebenzisa boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) kuba kuhamba kuyo Goma. I-avareji inani (Ezasekuhlaleni) ngu~500 of congo francs kuba elifutshane trips.
IGoma sisixeko esikwimpuma yeDemocratic Republic of Congo ngaseRwanda etsala abakhenkethi.
Ngowama-2002 iGoma yantlithwa ludaka olukhulu lwentaba-mlilo iNyirogongo olwagubungela iindlela ezininzi zeso sixeko, ingakumbi kumbindi wesixeko.
Nangona iGoma ikhuselekile noko, naluphi na utyelelo ngaphandle kweGoma kufuneka luphandwe ukuze kuqondwe imeko yemfazwe kwiphondo laseNyakatho yeKivu.
Esi sixeko sikwikhaya lentaba-mlilo iNyiragongo kwaye yenye yeerilla zeentaba ezingabizi kakhulu eAfrika.

I-Goma yidolophu yase-Democratic Republic of Congo ese mpuma kufutshane ne-Rwanda enomtsalane kubakhenkethi.

Kukhona isiko lokuhlala ungalali kuze kuhlwe ngobusuku bePhasika endaweni ethile ukuze ubone ukuphuma kwelanga.
Ngokuqinisekile kunezincazelo ezingokwenkolo yobuKrestu zaleli siko, kodwa kungenzeka kube isiko langaphambi kobuKrestu laseNtwasahlobo lokuZala.

Amaningi amasonto akudala asazibamba Izinkonzo zePhasika njalo ngoMgqibelo ebusuku ngesikhathi sempelasonto yePhasika, nebandla nalo libungaze ngokuhlanganyela ezinzulwini zobusuku kubungazwa ukuvuka kukaKrestu.
Kukho isithethe sokungalali ngobusuku be-Ista kwindawo apho ilanga linokubonakala khona xa liphuma.
Zikhona kakade ingcanciso zonkolo yobuKristu zalenkcubeko, kodwa kusenokwenzeka ukuba yayikho kwangaphambi kwe Chistrian Spring nesiko lokuChumisa.
Iicawa ezininzi zomthonyama ziye zibe Nomlindo we-Ista ngokuhlwa ngoMgqibelo ngempela veki ye-Ista, aze amabandla abhiyoze ezinzulwini zobusuku ebhiyozela ukuvuka kukaKrestu.
Kukho isiko ka-staying belele kude kube ngokuhlwa ka-Ipasika kwenye indawo ukubona ukuphuma kwelanga.
Kukho ngokuqinisekileyo, Christian unqulo meanings le tradition, kodwa ibe phambi-Christian tradition ka-entlakohlaza ukutyeba komhlaba.

Abaninzi phambi kwexesha amabandla ngxi bamba Ipasika iinkonzo wonke mgqibelo ebusuku ngexesha Ipasika impela-veki, kwaye congregation, ngokulandelelanayo, izimanya nabemi kwi-ephakathi busuku ukuze celebrate uvuko Lukakrestu.
Kuqhelekile ukuhlala kude kube sebusuku ngobusuku bePasika kwindawo ethile ukuze ubone ukuphuma kwelanga.
Ngokuqinisekileyo kukho iinkcazo zobuKrestu malunga neli siko, kodwa isenokuba sisiko langaphambi kobuKristu loMthombo wokuzalwa.
Iicawa ezininzi ezindala zisabambe iinkonzo zePasika rhoqo ngeMigqibelo ebusuku ngeempelaveki yePasika, kwaye icawa ibhiyozela ngokwabelana ezinzulwini zobusuku ukubhiyozela ukuvuka kukaKristu.
Kukho inkcubeko yokuhlala ungalali kude kuhlwe ngobusuku bePasika kwindawo ethile ukuze ubone ukuphuma kwelanga.
Ngokuqinisekileyo kukho iinkcazelo zobuKrestu benkcubeko, kodwa kungenzeka ukuba kubekho inkcubeko engaphambi kobuKrestu beNtwasahlobo yokuZala.
Iiveki ezininzi zakudala zazibamba Iinkonzo zePasika ngoMgqibelo ebusuku ngexesha leeveki zePasika, kunye nebandla nayo ibingazange ngokudibeneyo ezinzulwini zobusuku kubungazwa ukuvuka kukaKrestu.

I-Argentina idume ngokuba nelinye lamaqembu kanye nabadlali be-polo abahamba phambili emhlabeni.
Umncintiswano omkhulu kunayo yonke wonyaka wenzeka ngoDisemba ezinkundleni ze-polo eLas Cañitas.
Imincintiswano emincane kanye nemidlalo ingabuye ibonwe lapha ngezinye izikhathi zonyaka.
Ukuze uthole izindaba zemincintiswano kanye nendawo yokuthenga amathikithi wemidlalo yepholo, hlola i-Asociacion Argentina de Polo.
IArgentina yaziwa ngokuba lelinye lamaqela anabadlali abaphambili kwipolo kunye nabadlali ehlabathini.
Eyona tumente inkulu yonyaka iba ngoDecember kumapala ezemidlalo ye-polo eLas Cañitas.
Iithonamenti ezincincane nemidlalo ziyakwazi nokubukelwa apha ngamanye amaxesha onyaka.
Ukufumana iindaba kwiitumente kunye nalapho ungathenga khona amatikiti kwimidlalo yepolo, jonga iAsociacion Argentina de Polo.
