Izinkampani ezithutha impahla zikhokhelwa kahle ngokuthumela impahla ngokushehsa. Ngokuvamile, isikhathi sibalulekile ngamaphepha ebhizinisi, impahla ethengwayo ukuze idayiswe noma enye impahla edingekayo ukuze kwenziwe ukulungisa okusheshayo.
Kwezinye izindlela, izinkampani ezinkudlwana zinezindiza zazo, kodwa kwezinye izindlela nezinkampani ezincane bekunezinkinga.
Uma bebathumele zonke izinto ngebhanoyi, kwezinye izindlela bekuzothatha izinsuku ukwehlisa imithwalo nokudlula kwabahlola amaphepha.
Indlela elula yokuyingenisa ngokushesha ukuthi uyithumele njengomthwalo ohloliwe. Imithetho yezinkampani zezindiza angeke ibavumele ukuthumela umthwalo ngaphandle komgibeli, okuyilapho ungena khona.

Amashishini okuthumela abhatalwa kakuhle ngoku fikisa imithwalo yabantu ngokukhawulezisileyo. Ngokwesiqhelo, ixesha libalulekile neempepha zeshishini, amabhaso namalungu are phindeneyo ukwenzela ukulungiswa kwezinto.
Kwezinye iindlela, iinkampani ezinkulu ziba neenqwelo ntaka zazo, kodwa kwezinye iindlela nakwiinkampani ezincinane kubekho ingxaki.
Ukuba bathumela izinto ngohambo lwasemoyeni, kwezinye iindlela zinokuthatha iintsuku ukuba zidlule kwindawo yokwathula impahla nendawo yokuhlola abantu nezinto ezingenayo kwizikhululo zeenqwelo-moya.

Eyona ndlela yokuyihambisa ngokukhawuleza ibe kukuyithumela njengempahla efakwa kwinqwelo ntaka. Imithetho yohambo ngenqwelo ntaka ayizukubavumela ukuba bathumele impahla engahambi nomniniyo, kulapho ungena khona.

Weziganeko zeenqanawa iinkampani ingaba kulungile ihlawulwe kuba ukuthumela impahla ngokukhawuleza. Ngokubanzi, ixesha kubalulekile kuba ushishino, namaphepha angama-imveliso kumazwe angaphandle kweli kuba ziyathengiswa okanye enye imveliso kumazwe angaphandle kweli luyafuneka ukwenza eziquqa ulungiso.
Kwezinye iindlela, makhulu iinkampani kuba zabo flights, kodwa ezinye iindlela ezincinane iinkampani kuba kokuba iingxaki.
Ukuba babe flew yonke into, kwezinye iindlela bekuya kuthabatha iintsuku yehlisa ukufaka kwaye okokuba paperwork inspectors.

I-easiest indlela ukungenisa kwabo ngokukhawuleza kukuba thumela kubo njengokuba ikhangelwe ukufaka. Kwetitki imithetho ayisayi kuvumela kwabo ukuthumela cargo ngaphandle i-passenger, nto leyo apho kufuneka ufake.

Iinkampani zokuhambisa zihlawulwa kakuhle ngokuhambisa ngokukhawuleza. Rhoqo, ixesha lelona xabiso liphepha leshishini, izinto ezithengiswayo okanye ezinye iiasethi ezifunekayo ukwenza ukulungiswa ngokukhawuleza.
Ngandlela thile, iinkampani ezinkulu zineenqwelo moya zazo, kodwa kwezinye, neenkampani ezincinci ziye zaneengxaki.
Ukuba bebethumele yonke into ngenqwelomoya, kwezinye iimeko bekuya kuthatha iintsuku ukukothula kwaye kudlule abahloli bamaphepha.
Eyona ndlela ilula yokungenisa ngokukhawuleza kukuthumela njengephakheji evavanyiweyo. Imigaqo yeenqwelomoya ayiyi kukuvumela ukuba uthumele imithwalo ngaphandle komkhweli, kulapho ungena khona.

Iinkampani zokuhamba ipropathi zihlawulwa ngokufanelekileyo ngokuhambisa ipropathi ngokutsala. Ngokuqhelekileyo, ixesha libalulekileyo ngamaphepha oshishino, ipropathi ethengwayo ukuze ithengiswe nayiphi na impahla efunekayo ukuze yenziwe ngokukhawuleza ukuqwalasela.
Kwezinye iindlela, iinkampani ezinkulu zineenqwelo-moya zazo, kodwa kwezinye iindlela kunye neenkampani ezincinci zineengxaki.
Xa bebathumele zonke izinto ngebhanoyi, kwezinye iindlela bekuya kuthatha iintsuku ukunciphisa imithwalo kunye nokudlula kwabahlola amaphepha.
Indlela elula yokuyingenisa ngokukhawuleza kukuba uyithumele njengoxanduva olujoliswe kuyo. Imithetho yeenqwelo-moya ayinakukwazi ukuvumela uxanduva ngaphandle komkhweli, apho ungena khona.

Ezinye iindlela, iinkampani ezinkulu zineenqwelo moya zazo, kodwa kwezinye iindlela kunye neenkampani ezincinci ziye zaneengxaki.
Ukuba bebethumele yonke into ngenqwelomoya, kwezinye iimeko bekuya kuthatha iintsuku ukukothula kwaye kudlule abahloli bamaphepha.
Indlela elula yokungenisa ngokukhawuleza kukuthumela njengephakheji evavanyiweyo. Imithetho yeenqwelo moya ayizukuvumela ukuba uthumele imithwalo ngaphandle komgibeli, apho ungena khona.

Iinkampani ezithutha iipropathi zihlawulwa kakuhle ngokuthumela impahla ngokushehsa. Ngokuqhelekileyo, ixesha libalulekileyo ngamaphepha zoshishino, impahla ethengwayo ukuze iyiswe okanye enye impahla efunekayo ukuze kwenziwe ukulungisa ngokukhawuleza.
Kwezinye iindlela, iinkampani ezinkudlwana zinezindiza zazo, kodwa kwezinye iindlela neenkampani ezincinci zineengxaki.
Ukuba bathumele zonke izinto nge-moya, kwezinye iindlela baya kuthatha iintsuku ukunciphisa imithwalo nokudlula kwabahlola amaphepha.
Indlela elula yokuyingenisa ngokukhawuleza ukuba uyithumele njengomthwalo ololiwe. Imithetho yeenkampani zeenqwelo-moya angeke ibavumele ukuthumela umthwalo ngaphandle komgibeli, apho ungena khona.

Nakuba i-AI inomqondo oqinilile wezindaba eziqanjiwe zesayensi, i-AI yenza ingxenye ebalulekile kakhulu yesayensi yamakhompyutha, ebukana nokuziphatha, ukufunda kanye nokusebenza komshini kokuhlakanipha.
Ucwaningo lwezamarobothi luhlanganisa ukwenza imishini yenze ngokuzenzakalekayo imisebenzi edinga ukucabanga komuntu.
Izibonelo zihlanganisa ukulawula, ukuhlela nokwenza isheduli, ikhono lokuphendula ukubhula nemibuzo yekhasimende, kanye nokuqaphela ngesandla, izwi nobuso.
Izinto ezinjalo zibe izimiso ezihlukile, ezigxila ekunikezeni izisombululo zezinkinga ezingokoqobo zokuphila.

Uhlelo lwe-AI manje ngokuvamile lusetshenziswa emkhakheni wezomnotho, ezokwelapha, ubunjiniyela kanye nempi, njengoba kwakhiwe ezinhlelweni zokusebenza zamakhompyutha wasekhaya amaningana nemidlalo yevidiyo.
Nangona iAI inolinganiso olungeyonyani lwesayensi,I AI yenza isiseko esibalulekileyo kwicandelo lwekhompyutha sayensi ejongene nezimbo,ukufunda nobungqondi bomashini.
Uphando kwi-AI lubandakanya ukwenza oomatshini abazenzekelayo imisebenzi efuna isimilo esikrelekrele.

Imizekelo iquka ukulawula, ukuceba nokubeka ixesha, ukukwazi ukuphendula izinto zabathengi ezingalunganga nemibuzo, nokukwazi ukubona ukuba ibisisandla sikabani ebesibhala, ukwazi ukufanisa ilizwi nobuso.
Izinto ezinjalo zibe ngamacandelo ahlukeneyo, ajolise ekunikezeleni izisombululo kwiingxaki zobomi bokwenyani.
Inkqubo ye-AI ngoku ihlala isetyenziswa kumacandelo ezoqoqosho, amayeza, ubunjineli kunye nomkhosi, njengoko sele yakhiwe kwikhompyuter kunye nokusetyenziswa kwesoftware yomdlalo wevidiyo.
Nangona AL sele nomdla uluvo science intsomi, AL lilisebenzisa ebalulekileyo inxalenye computerized science, apho uya kufumanisa kunye ukuziphatha, ufunda kwaye ndlela ka-iingqiqo.
Robotic uphando kuquka ukwenza matshini automate imisebenzi ezifuna oluntu ukucinga.
Imizekelo iquka ulawulo, ucwangciso nendlela optimization le shedyuli, nako ukuphendula divination kwaye umthengi inquiries, ngokunjalo handwritten yokwazisa, ilizwi ubuso.
Izinto ezinjalo zithe ezahlukeneyo imigaqo, apho kugxila ekuboneleleni izisombululo ebomini ke real-ubomi iingxaki.
AL inkqubo ngoku commonly kusetyenziswa entsimini ka-ezoqoqosho, amayeza, engineering kwaye imfazwe, njengokuba kubhaliwe lakhelwe eziliqela wobulali ikhompyutha izicelo kwaye imidlalo yevidiyo.
Nangona i-AI inesimo esomeleleyo sentsomi, i-AI yenza icandelo elibaluleke kakhulu kwisayensi yekhompyuter, ejongene nokuziphatha, ukufunda kunye nobukrelekrele boomatshini.
Uphando lweRobotic lubandakanya ukukwazi ukwenza oomatshini ukuba benze imisebenzi efuna ukucinga komntu.
Imizekelo ibandakanya ulawulo, ukucwangciswa kunye nokucwangciswa, ukukwazi ukuphendula ukuvumisa kunye nemibuzo yabathengi, kunye nesandla, ukuqondwa kwelizwi kunye nobuso.
Izinto ezinjalo ziyimigaqo eyahlukileyo, egxile ekunikezeleni izisombululo kwiingxaki zobomi bokwenyani.
Inkqubo ye-AI ngoku isetyenziswa ngokubanzi kumacandelo ezoqoqosho, amayeza, ubunjineli, kunye nemfazwe, njengoko yakhiwe kwizicelo zekhaya zekhompyuter kunye nemidlalo yevidiyo.

Nangona i-AI inobuchule beendaba ezigqithiseleyo zenzululwazi, i-AI yenza eyona nxalenye ebalulekileyo yeekhompyutha zenzulululwazi, ezijongene nokuziphatha, ukufunda kunye nokusebenza komatshini wobulumko.
Uphando lweamarobothi luquka ukwenza izixhobo zenze ngokuzenzekelayo imisebenzi efuna ukucinga komntu.
Imizekelo iquka ukulawula, ukucwangcisa nokwenza ishedyuli, ukukwazi ukuphendula ukubhula imibuzo yomthengi, kunye nokuqaphela ngesandla, ilizwi ngobuso.
Izinto ezinjalo zibe yimigaqo eyahlukileyo, ejolise ekunikezeni izisombululo zeengxaki zobomi.

Ngokuqhelekileyo i-AI program isetyenziswa kumacandelo oqoqosho, ezonyango, ubunjineli kunye nomkhosi, njengoko kwakhiwe kwiinkqubo zokusebenza zeekhompyutha ezininzi zasekhaya kunye nemidlalo yevidiyo.
Nangona i-AI inesimo esifanelekileyo sentsomi, AI yeyona ndawo ibaluleke kakhulu kubunzululwazi bekhompyutha, ejongene nokuziphatha, ukufunda kunye nobukrelekrele boomatshini.
Ucwaningo lweRobotic lubandakanya ukukwazi ukwenza oomatshini ukuba benze imisebenzi efuna ukucinga komntu.
Imizekelo ibandakanya ulawulo, ukucwangciswa kunye nokucwangciswa, ukukwazi ukuphendula ukuvumisa kunye nemibuzo yabathengi, kunye nokuqaphela ngesandla, ilizwi kunye nobuso.
Izinto ezinjalo ziye zaba yimigaqo eyahlukileyo, egxile ekunikezeni izisombululo kwiingxaki zobomi bokwenyani.
Inkqubo ye-AI ngoku isetyenziswa ngokubanzi kumacandelo oqoqosho, amayeza, ubunjineli, kunye nemfazwe, njengoko yakhiwe kwizicelo zekhaya zekhompyuter kunye nemidlalo yevidiyo.
Nangona i-AI inomqondo oqingqiweyo weendaba kwiinzululwazi, i-AI yenza inxalenye ebalulekileyo yenzululwazi yekhompyutha, ebukana nokuziphatha, ukufunda kunye nokusebenza komatshini wobulumko.
Uphononongo lwezamarobothi luquka ukwenza izixhobo yenze imisebenzi ngokuzenzekelayo efuna ukucinga komntu.
Imizekelo ziquka ulawulo, ucwangciso kunye nokwenza iishedyuli, ukukwazi ukubhula nokuphendula kunye nemibuzo yomthengi, kunye nokuqaphela ngesandla, ilizwi nobuso.
Izinto ezinjalo zibe yimimiselo eyahlukileyo, ezigxininisa ekunikezeni izisombululo zeengxaki ngokoqobo zobomi.

Iprogram ye-AI ngoku ngokuqhelekileyo isetyenziswe kwintsimi yezoqoqosho, yezonyango, ubunjineli kunye nomkhosi, njengoko yakhiwe kwiinkqubo zokusebenza zekhompyutha zasekhaya eziliqela kunye nemidlalo yevidiyo.
Ukuthuka ngoba usekhaya kuza kuqala kunalokho kuthuka okwenzeka uma uvakashele endaweni ongayazi (ngakho ukujabula kuba kuncane), kuthathe isikhathi, futhi kungaya ngokuya kwande.
Izihambi ezikuthole kulula ukujwayela isiko elisha kwesinye isikhathi zikuthola kunzima ukujwayela isiko lazo lendabuko futhi.
Lapho ubuyela ekhaya usuka phesheya, kuzodingeka ujwayele isiko elisha neminye yemikhuba yakho oyilahlile kusukela ezweni lakini.
Lapho uya phesheya okokuqala, abantu kungenzeka ukuthi babebekezela futhi beqonda, bazi ukuthi izivakashi uma zifika ezweni elisha zidinga ukujwayela.
Abantu kungezeka bangalindeli ukuthi ukulinda kanye nokuqonda nakho kubalulekile ezivakashini ezibuyela ekhaya.
Ukothuswa kukubuyela kukhawuleza kubekho kunokothuswa yinkcubeko (kudla ngokubakho ixesha lokuyiqhela, kubakho ixesha elide, kwaye kuba mandundu kakhulu.
Abahambi abadla ngokufumanisa kulula ukuqhelana nenkcubeko entsha ngamanye amaxesha baye babe nobunzima bokuphinda baqhelane nenkcubeko yabo.
Xa uphindela ekhaya emva kokuhlala phesheya, sowuqhele izinto ezohlukileyo futhi sowulahle imikhwa yesiko lakowenu.
Xa waya kwelinye ilizwe okokuqala, kusonkwenzeka ukuba abantu babe nomonde bekuqonda, besazi ukuba abantu abahambele kwilizwe elitsha badinga ukuliqhela.
Amabantu basenokungayicingeli into yokuba ukunyamezela nokuqonda nako kuyafuneka kubahambi ababuyela emakhaya.

Swearing ngenxa yokuba ingaba ekhaya iza kuqala ukuba kwenzeka ntoni xa uthatha ndwendwela i-unfamiliar mmandla (ngoko ke, bevuya uba ngaphantsi), ethabatha ixesha, kwaye sifana ukubonelelwa ngokufanayo.
Travelers abathe zifunyenweyo lula ukuba adapt kwindawo entsha, inkcubeko ngamanye amaxesha ukulifumana kunzima lungelelanisa zabo zomthonyama inkcubeko kwakhona.
Xa ufuna ukubuyela ekhaya ukusuka ngaphesheya, uza kuba lokulungiswa kwindawo entsha, inkcubeko kwaye ezinye yakho ukuba ukuba kufuneka olahliweyo ukusuka yakho homeland.
Xa ndihamba ngaphesheya okokuqala, abantu zazinokuba nomonde kwaye ndaqonda, sisazi ukuba visitors xa zifika kwi-ihlabathi elitsha kufuneka ufumane kusetyenziswa.
Abantu akavumelekanga ukuba ulindele ukuba nilinde kwaye ukuqonda bamele kanjalo kubalulekile kuba babuyela ekhaya visitors.
Umothuko wokuba sekhaya uza ngaphambi kothuko lokundwendwela indawo ongayaziyo (ke uchulumanco oluncinci), kuthatha ixesha, kwaye kunokuba kubi.
Iindwendwe ezifumanisa kulula ukuziqhelanisa nenkcubeko entsha ngamanye amaxesha zikufumanisa kunzima ukuziqhelanisa nenkcubeko yazo entsha.
Xa ubuyela ekhaya uvela phesheya, kuyakufuneka uqhelane nenkcubeko entsha kunye namasiko owalahlileyo kwilizwe lakho.
Xa abantu bephuma okokuqala kwilizwe lasemzini, kusenokwenzeka ukuba babe nomonde kwaye beqonda, besazi ukuba iindwendwe zelo lizwe zintsha kufuneka ziqhelane nalo.
Abantu abanakulindela ukuba ukulinda kunye nokuqonda kubalulekile kwiindwendwe ezibuyela ekhaya.
Ukufuduka ngenxa yokuba usekhaya luza kuqala kunokuba luthuka olwenzeka xa usiya kwindawo ongayazi (ngoko ke ukuvuya kuncinci), kuthatha ixesha, kwaye kungaya ngokuya kwande.
Abahambi abakufumanayo kulula ukuziqhelanisa inkcubeko entsha ngamanye amaxesha bakufumana kunzima ukuziqhelanisa inkcubeko yabo yemveli.
Xa ubuyela ekhaya usuka aphesheya, kuya kufuneka uqhelane nenkcubeko entsha kunye nezinye iindlela zakho ozilahlekileyo ukusuka kwilizwe lakho.
Xa usiya phesheya okokuqala, abantu kusenokwenzeka ukuba babenomonde yaye beqonda, bazi ukuba abakhenkethi xa befika kwihlabathi elitsha bafuna ukuqhelana.
Ukuthathwa kwe-ArcSight Logger nokusebenza kwabantu bangalindeli ukuba ulinde kunye nokuqonda kubalulekile kwizivakashini ezibuyela ekhaya.
Ukuthuka kuba usekhaya kuza kuqala kunokuba kuthuka okwenzeka xa undwendwele kwindawo ongayazi (ngoko ukuvuya kuba ncinane), kuthatha ixesha, kwaye kuya kuxhomekeka kwande.

Indawo ephakathi kwe-Point Marion ne-Fairmont yenza izimo zokushayela ezinzima kakhulu eMgwaqweni omkhulu wase-Buffalo-Pittsburgh, odlula njalo ezindaweni ezingenabantu zasemahlathini.
Uma ungajwayele ukushayela emigwaqweni yasemaphandleni, hlala uphapheme: izindawo eziyimiqansa kakhulu, izindlela eziwungcingo, kanye namajika amabi agcwele.

Ukulinganiselwa kwesivinini okusemabhodini kuphansi ngokuphawulekayo kunasezingxenyeni zangaphambili nezilandelayo — ngokuvamile u-35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — futhi ukukunakisisa kubalulekile nakakhulu kunokungakunakisisi.
Ngokumangazayo, nokho, insiza yefoni ephathekayo inamandla kakhulu lapha kunezindlela eziningi eziningi zomzila, isibonelo, Izindawo Zasendle zasePennsylvania.
Indlela eyoluleka phakathi kwe Point Marion ne Fairmont yenza eyona meko icela umngeni kwimeko zokuqhuba kwi Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, usoloko udlula rhoqo kwindawo ezinezikhuni.
Ukuba awuqhelanga ukuqhuba kwiindlela zasezilalini, hlala uphaphile: iindawo ezehla kakhulu, iindlela ezincinane, kunye neekona zixhaphake kakhulu
Eziposiweyo izimiselo zesantya ziyaqapheleka ukuba zingeneno kunezangaphambili kwaye iindawana ezithile— ikakhulu u-35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — kwaye ukuzithobela kubaluleke nangakumbi kunokunye.
Kodwa okubangela umdla, iinkqubo zomnxxeba zinamandla apha kunezinye iindlela, umzekelo i-Pennsylvania Wilds.
Indawo phakathi Incopho Marion kwaye Fairmont lilisebenzisa kunzima lakho, iimeko kwi highway ka-Buffalo-Pittsburgh, oko yithi rhoqo iphumeza ngokusebenzisa lonely ihlathi iindawo.
Ukuba akunjalo, accustomed ukuba lakho, kwi lwasemaphandleni iindlela, hlala ulwimi: i slopes, i-narrow iindlela, kwaye nasty amagophe bazele.

Isantya umda kwi ezibhodini ngu significantly ngaphantsi kwe kwi edlulileyo kwaye elandelayo iinxenye — idla 35-40 mphknots (56-64 km/h)-kwaye attentive ingqalelo yi-ngakumbi ebalulekileyo kunokuba attentive.
Ironically, nangona kunjalo, iselula app kubaluleke kakhulu stronger apha zininzi iindlela route, umzekelo, wildlife of Pennsylvania.
Indawo phakathi kwePoint Marion neFairmont idale iimeko ezinzima kakhulu zokuqhuba kwiBuffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, ehlala idlula kwimimandla yehlathi engenabemi.
Ukuba awukuqhelanga ukuqhuba kwiindlela ezisemaphandleni, hlala ulumkile: iindawo ezimqengqelezi, iindlela ezimxinwa kunye nemixawuka emikhulu.
Imida yesantya kwiibhodi iphantsi kakhulu kunangaphambili nakwimacandelo angasemva- ngesiqhelo i-35-40 mph (56-64 km / h) -ingqwalaselo ibaluleke ngakumbi kunokunganikeli ngqalelo.
Kuyamangalisa, nangona kunjalo, iapps yefowuni ephathekayo inamandla ngakumbi apha kunezinye iindlela ezininzi, umzekelo, iPennsylvania Wildlife.
Indawo ephakathi kwe-Point Marion kunye ne-Fairmont yenza iimeko zokuqhuba ezinzima kakhulu kwi-Buffalo-Pittsburgh enkulu yesitalato, edlulileyo rhoqo kwiindawo ezingenabantu basemahlathini.
Ukuba awuqhelekanga ukuqhuba ezitalatweni zasemaphandleni, hlala uphantsi: iindawo ezininzi, iindlela zokufowuna, kunye namajika amabi apheleleyo.

Nakuba ukufunda okusekelwe kuyiphrojekthi kumelwe kwenze ukufunda kube lula futhi kuthakazelise kakhudlwana, izibhaxa zenza okwengeziwe.
I-scaffolding akuyona indlela yokufunda kodwa kunalokho insiza enikeza usizo kubantu ngabanye abafunda okusha njengokusebenzisa uhlelo olusha lwekhompyutha noma ukuqala iphrojekthi entsha.
Ama-Scaffolds angaba wekhompyutha futhi abe ngokoqobo, ngamanye amagama, uthisha uwuhlobo lwe-scaffold kodwa kunjalo nangomuntu omncane wocingo lokuhlanganisa amaphepha kuyi-Microsoft Office.
Izibhaxa zekhompyutha zifakwe phakathi kohlelo lokusebenza futhi zenzelwe ukubuza, ukushukumisa, kanye nokuchaza izinqubo okungenzeka ukuthi bekunzima ukuthi abafundi basebenze ngazo bebodwa.
Ngelixa ukufunda okujoliswe kwiprojekthi kumele kwenze imfundo ibelula yaye inikise umdla, Inqwanqwa le scaffolding ithabatha unyawo ukubheka phambili.
I-scaffolding akuyondlela yokufunda kodwa yindlela yoncedo enikezela inkxaso kubantu abafunda izifundo ezintsha njengokusebenzisa inkqubo yekhomputha okanye ukuqala umsebenzi omtsha.
Ii-Scaffolds zinokubonakala ziyinyani kwaye ziyinyani, ngamanye amagama, utitshala luhlobo lwe-scaffold kodwa kunjalo nanomntu we-paperclip kwi-Microsoft Office.
Ii-Scaffolds ezibonakalayo zangaphakathi ngaphakathi kwisoftware kwaye zenzelwe ukubuza, ukukhawulezisa, kunye nokuchaza iinkqubo ezinokuba ngumceli mngeni wokuba umfundi aziphathe yedwa.
Ngexesha ukufunda ngokusekelwe a project kufuneka enze ukufunda kube lula ngakumbi umdla, i-excuses kwenza ngakumbi.
Scaffolding ayiyo ukufunda indlela kodwa ngenye icebo enika uncedo abantu ukufunda izinto ezintsha ezifana usebenzisa ikhompyutha entsha yokusebenza okanye ukuqala entsha projekthi.
Scaffolds kusenokuba computerized kwaye oonombumba, ngamanye amazwi, utitshala ufumana a ifomu scaffold kodwa ngoko ke ngu encinane inombolo ukudibana kwi-Microsoft Office.
Ikhompyutha izitshixo iqukwe isicelo kwaye ingaba yenzelwe ukuba ukubuza, stimulate, kwaye zichaza ukuba iinkqubo zazinokuba kunzima kuba abafundi bangasebenza kwi kwezabo.
Ngelixa ukufunda okusekwe kwiprojekthi kufanele ukuba kwenziwe kube lula kwaye kunomdla ngakumbi, izizathu zenza okungakumbi.
I-Scaffolding ayisiyinkqubo yokufunda koko sisixhobo esibonelela ngoncedo kubantu abafunda into entsha njengokusebenzisa inkqubo entsha yekhompyuter okanye ukuqala iprojekthi entsha.
Izikereti zinokwenziwa ngekhompyuter kwaye ziyinyani, ngamanye amagama, utitshala luhlobo lwesikafula kodwa kunjalo nomntu omncinci oneklip yephepha kwiOfisi kaMicrosoft.
Izikrini zekhompyuter zidityanisiwe kwi-app kwaye ziyilelwe ukubuza, ukukhuthaza, kunye nokuchaza iinkqubo ezinokuba nzima kubafundi ukuba bazisebenzele.

Nangona ukufunda okusekelwe kwiprojekthi kufuneka ibe lula ukufunda kwaye umdla ngakumbi, izibhaxa zenza ngakumbi.
I-scaffolding ayikho indlela yokufunda kodwa kunoko inkonzo enikezela uncedo kubantu ngabanye abafunda ezintsha njengokusebenzisa iprogram entsha yekhompyutha okanye ukuqala iprojekthi entsha.
Ii-Scaffolds zinokuba yikhompyutha kwaye zibe ngokoqobo, ngamanye amagama, utitshala uwuhlobo lwe-scaffold kodwa kunjalo nangomntu omncinci wocingo lokudibanisa amaphepha kwi-Microsoft Office.
Iibhaxa zekhompyutha zifakwe phakathi kwesicelo kwaye zenzelwe ukubuza, ukushukumisa, kunye nokuchaza iinkqubo ezinokuba nzima ukuba abafundi basebenze ngazo bebodwa.
Noma ubani ohlela ukuvakashela izwe elizobhekwa njengesizinda sempi kumelwe athole ukuqeqeshwa okukhethekile.
Usesho kuyi-inthanethi “loKudla kwendawo embi” cishe luzonikeza ikheli lenkampani yasendaweni.
Isifundo ngokuvamile sizohlanganisa zonke izindaba okuxoxwe ngazo lapha ngokujulile, ngokuvamile ngendlela yokukusebenzisa engokoqobo.

IYurophu izwekali elincane ngokwesilinganiso kodwa elinamazwe amaningi azimele. Ngaphansi kwezimo ezivamile, ukuthatha uhambo emazweni amaningana kungasho ukubhalisela i-visa kanye nokudlula lapho kuhlolwa khona amaphasiphoti kaningana.
Indawo yaseSchengen, nokho, isebenza ngandlelathile njengezwe elilodwa kulokhu.
Uma nje uhlala kulendawo, ngokuvamile ungeqa imingcele ngaphandle kokuba kuhlolwe iphasiphothi yakho futhi.
Ngokufanayo, ngokuba ne-visa ye-Schengen, awudingi ukubhalisela i-visa yezwe ngalinye ngokuhlukile kulawo angamalungu e-Shengen, okonga isikhathi, imali kanye nomsebenzi wokugcwalisa amafomu.

IYurophu yikhontinenti encinane kona kodwa inamazwe amaninzi azimeleyo. Phansti kweemeko eziqhelekileyo, ukukhenketha kumazwe amaninzi kungathetha ukuba usoloko uaplayela ivisa nepasi amatyeli amanizi.
I-Schengen zone, nangona, isebenza ngokungathi oku kwe lizwe elinye.
Ukuba uhlala kule ndawo, uza kudlula kwimida ngaphandle kokuba ugqithe kwiindawo ezihlola iipasipothi kwakhona.
Ngokufanyo, xa uneSchengen visa, akuyomfuneko ukuba ufake izicelo zevisa zamazwe ahlukahlukeneyo akwiSchengen, loo nto ikongela ixesha, imali nokugcwalisa amaphepha.

Yurophu yi i-small quantity kodwa sele ezininzi elizimeleyo amazwe. Phantsi eqhelekileyo iimeko, abajikelezayo ezininzi amazwe kungathetha nokubhalisa kuba i-visa ukuphunyezwa eziliqela incwadana yokundwendwela iimvavanyo.
I ariya Schengen, nangona kunjalo, imisebenzi nje noko ngathi kwelinye ilizwe kulo mba.
Njengoko ixesha elide njengoko uhlala kule ndawo, uyakwazi rhoqo emnqamlezweni imida ngaphandle ekubeni yakho incwadana yokundwendwela ikhangelwe kwakhona.

Ngokufanayo, kuba ekubeni a Schengen-visa, wena musa kufuneka ubhalise kuba i-visa ngamnye kweli lizwe ngokwahlukeneyo kuba ngabo Shengen amalungu, abo ukugcina ixesha, imali kwaye sebenza ukuzalisa ngaphandle iifomu.

IYurophu lilizwe elincinci elinamazwe amaninzi azimeleyo. Kwiimeko eziqhelekileyo, ukuhamba kumazwe aliqela kunokuthetha ukufaka isicelo sephepha-mvume lokundwendwela kunye nokudlula kuvavanyo lwepasipoti amatyeli aliqela.
Indawo yaseSchengen, nangona kunjalo, isebenza ngandlel 'ithile njengelizwe elinye kule nkalo.
Logama uhlala kule ndawo, ungahlala uwele imida ngaphandle kokujonga ipasipoti yakho kwakhona.
Kwangokunjalo, ngokuba ne-visa yeSchengen, awudingi ukufaka isicelo sokundwendwela ilizwe ngalinye ngaphandle kwamalungu eShengen, agcina ixesha, imali kunye nomsebenzi wokugcwalisa iifom.

IYurophu ilizwekali elincinci ngokomlinganiselo kodwa elinamazwe amaninzi azimeleyo. Ngaphantsi kweemeko eziqhelekileyo, ukuthatha uhambo kumazwe amaninzi kungatsho ukubhalisela i-visa kunye nokudlula apho uvavanyo lweepasipoti luphantsi.
Indawo yaseSchengen, nangona kunjalo, isebenza ngandlelathile njengelizwe elinye kule nto.
Ukuba uhlala nje kule ndawo, unokuqhelanisa imida ngaphandle kokuba uvavanywe iphasipoti yakho.
Ngokufanayo, ngokuba ne-Visa ye-Schengen, awudingi ukubhalisela i-visa yelizwe ngalinye ngokwahlukileyo kulawo angamalungu e-Shengen, okonga ixesha, imali kunye nomsebenzi wokuzalisa iifom.

IYurophu lilizwe elincinci elinamazwe amaninzi azimeleyo. Ngaphantsi kweemeko eziqhelekileyo, ukuthatha uhambo lokuya kumazwe amaninzi kunokuthetha ukufaka isicelo seVisa kunye nokudlula kuvavanyo lwePasipoti ilingana.
Indawo yaseSchengen, nangona kunjalo, isebenza ngandlelathile njengezwe elinye kule meko.
Ukuba uhlala kule ndawo, ungahlala uwele imida ngaphandle kokuba kuhlolwe iphasiphothi yakho kwakhona.
Ngokufanayo, kuba ne-visa ye-Schengen, awudingi ukubhalisela i-visa yehlabathi ngalinye ngokuhlukile kulawo angamalungu e-Shenden, onga ixesha, imali kunye nomsebenzi wokuzalisa iifom.

IYurophu ilizwe elihle elincinane ngokomlinganiselo kodwa linamazwe amaninzi azimeleyo. Ngaphantsi kweemeko eziqhelekileyo, ukuthatha uhambo kumazwe amaninzi kuthetha ukubhalisela i-visa kunye nokugqithisa apho kuhlolwa khona iiphasiphoti kaningana.
Indawo yaseSchengen, nangona kunjalo, isebenza ngandlela-thile njengelizwe elinye kule nto.
Ukuba uhlala nje kule ndawo, ngokuqhelekileyo awuqapheli imida ngaphandle kokuba kuvavanywe iphasiphothi yakho kwakhona.
Ngokufanayo, ngokuba ne-visa ye-Schengen, awudingi ukubhalisela i-visa yelizwe ngalinye ngokwahlukileyo kulawo angamalungu e-Shengen, okonga ixesha, imali kunye nomsebenzi wokuzalisa iifom.
Kweminye imikhosi, iningi lababakhona emkhosini womculo linquma ukukanisa kuleyo ndawo, futhi ababakhona abaningi bakubona kuyingxenye edingekayo yokuhlanganyela.
Uma ufuna ukubona okwenzekayo useduze kuzomelwe ufike masinya ukuze uthole indawo yokukamisa eduze nomculo.
Khumbula ukuthi nakuba umculo osesiteji esiyinhloko ungaphela, kungaba nezingxenye zomkhosi ezizoqhubeka zidlala umculo kuze kube sebusuku kakhulu.
Eminye imikhosi inezindawo zokukanisa ezikhethekile zemindeni enezingane ezincane.

Kwezinye iifestivali, uninzi lwabaya kwiifestivali zomculo baye bagqibe ngokukhempisha kwindawo eza kuba kuyo ifestivali, kwaye abantu abaninzi abaya kuyo bayijonga njengenxalenye ebalulekileyo yamava abo.
Ukuba ufuna ukuba kufutshane nomfutho kuza kufuneka ukuba ufike kwangoko ufumane indawo yokukhempisha ekufutshane nomculo.
Ukhumbule ukuba nangona umculo odlalwa kwiqonga eliyintloko kusenokwenzeka uphelile, kusenokubakho amacandelo efestivali aza kuqhubeka edlala umculo de ubusuku buhambele phambili.
Ezinye iifestivali siba nendawo zokukhempisha ezilungiselelwe amakhaya nabantwana.
E enye ingxelo, uninzi okhoyo ye-music festival wenze isigqibo inkampu phaya, kwaye abaninzi okhoyo bayibone njengokuba kuyimfuneko inxalenye ntlanganiso.
Ukuba ufuna ukubona yintoni eyenzekayo ezikufutshane uza kuba safika ngokukhawuleza kwaye ngokufanelekileyo ukufumana campsite kufutshane umculo.
Khumbula ukuba xa umculo kwi engundoqo iqonga unako utyibiliko, kusenokuba kukho iindawo festival ukuba uza kuqhubeka ukudlala umculo de emva kwexesha ebusuku.
Abanye ingxelo kuba ezikhethekileyo campgrounds kuba iintsapho kunye ezincinane abantwana.
Kweminye imithendeleko, uninzi lwabo bazimase umnyhadala womculo bathatha isigqibo sokukhempisha kule ndawo, kwaye uninzi lwababekho lubona njengenxalenye eyimfuneko kwindibano.
Ukuba ufuna ukubona okwenzekayo kufutshane kuya kufuneka ufike ngokukhawuleza ukuze ufumane indawo yokumisa kufutshane nomculo.
Gcina ukhumbula ukuba nangona owona mculo weqonga usenokuphela, kusenokubakho iinxalenye zomsitho eziya kuqhubeka nokudlala umculo kude kube sebusuku.
Eminye imithendeleko ineenkampu ezizodwa zeentsapho ezinabantwana abancinci.
Kweminye imibhiyozo, uninzi lwabakhoyo emthendelekweni womculo lugqiba ukwahlula kuloo ndawo, kwaye abaninzi abakhoyo bakubona yinxalenye efunekayo yokudibana.

Khumbula ukuba nangona umculo ophambili ungaphela, unokuba neenxalenye zomthendeleko eziza kuqhubeka zidlala umculo kude kube sebusuku kakhulu.

Isiqhingi saseHong Kong sinika indawo yaseHong Kong igama layo futhi yindawo leyo izivakashi eziningi eziyithatha njengendawo yokuvakashelwa eyinhloko.
Ipharedi yamabhilidi enza umugqa wesibhakabhaka sase-Hong Kong ifaniswe neshadi lebha elikhazimulayo elibonakala ngokuba khona kwamanzi ase-Victoria Harbour.
Ukuze ube nemibono emihle kakhulu ye-Hong Kong, shiya lesi siqhingi uye echibini lamanzi lase-Kowloon eliqondene.
Iningi kokuthuthuka kwase-Hong Kong Island kugcwele ezweni elisanda kubuyiswa futhi ogwini olusenyakatho.
Le indawo abenzi bamakoloni baseBrithani abayithatha njengendawo yabo ngakho uma ufuna ukubona ubufakazi besikhathi esedlule sobukoloni salendawo, lena indawo efanele ongaqala kuyo.
Isiqithi saseHong Kong sinika intsimi yaseHong Kong igama laso kwaye yeyona ndawo kuthathwa njengabakhenkethi abaninzi njengeyona nto kugxilwe kuyo.
Inqwaba yezakhiwo ezenza i-skyline ye-Hong Kong ithelekiswa ne-bar chart emenyezelayo nevezwa bubukho bamanzi be-Victoria Harbour.
Ukuze uyibone kakhuhle i-Hong Kong, sishiye isiqithi uze uye eKowloon waterfront ephambi kwayo.
Uninzi lophuculo lwedolophu yeSiqithi saseHong Kong lwenziwe phezu komhlaba owawukade ulilwandle lwasemantla.
Le yindawo yabakholoniyali base-Bhritane abayithathayo kwaye ke ukuba ufuna ubungqina bendawo eyadlulayo yommandla, le yindawo elungileyo ukuqala.
I-island ka-Hong Kong inika Hong Kong igama layo kwaye yindawo ukuba abakhenkethi abaninzi bathabatha njengoko engundoqo tourist engqongileyo.
I-Pare ka-skyscrapers ukuba ifomu umgca we-Hong Kong isibhakabhaka ngu efaniswa a brilliant bar tshati characterized yi-ebusweni amanzi Adelaide Harbour.
Ukuba kuba eyona iimboniselo ka-Hong Kong, shiya island kwaye yiya a Kowloon-ethile, amanzi echibini.
Uninzi Hong Kong Island ke zophuhliso permeates a ngokutsha babuyela kwilizwe ngasemantla coast.

Umngcelele wabakhi bezakhiwo ezinde zaseHong Kong uye wafaniswa netshathi ebengezelayo ebonakaliswa bubukho bamanzi eVictoria Harbour.
